text: I’ve been a member for about three years. RAC is my idea of the perfect gym! Plenty of barbells, plates, dumbells, cables and cardio equipment. The best features, however are the people - Nehal and Robbie pay attention to all the details, make sure it stays clean, comfortable and organized and that members have what they need for THEIR workout. They have built a community atmosphere that is unique, authentic and awesome! So many great people workout there. Everybody “plays well together!”  I love it!!

resp.text: You hit the nail on the head. “Everybody plays well together.” It’s something else. Thank you for your kind words. See you at THE RAC.

I run and do CrossFit and feel like this is an awesome compliment to both. 9Round has different movements and works different muscles and makes me a stronger athlete.

name: Sean Callahan
text: While stationed at Maxwell for a year I started going to RRCF. This was my second CrossFit gym and I appreciated the focus on the basics and working on the foundation of complex movements that I still had not mastered yet. I originally wanted to rush into movements that advanced athletes were doing at the games but this isn’t what I needed. This made me noticeably stronger and kept me injury free for the entire year. The programming is one of kind and isn’t canned from a website and matches what the athletes at RRCF need. I highly recommend this gym and the staff is great.

name: Brandon Shoupe
text:
Synergy is, by far, the best gym I've ever been a member of. The atmosphere is very friendly and non-intimidating. Hammer and his staff keep the place clean and organized. You never have to ask yourself, "Where are the 25-lb dumbbells?" because they are always in the right place. The locker rooms and showers are also well-kept.

The classes, which are optional, will test you physically and are apparently some of the most intense in the country, as people visiting from out of town comment on how tough they are compared to what they are used to.

One of the reasons I like Synergy so much is because the members are a mix of young, middle-aged, and older people from many different races and walks of life. I've never heard of anyone that felt like they didn't belong.

name: Wayne Benson

text: Awesome Place, Great staff and Trainers! Whether you are a beginner or have been exercising for years, this is the place for you! The support and family dynamic is something I have never experienced in this setting before! I LOVE Burn Boot Camp Madison!!

name: Heather Strawder
text: I’ve been a member since they launched this location here in Madison. If you need some structure to your weekly workout routine, accountability, positivity, uplifting trainers, and challenging workouts that can be modified to meet you at any fitness level, this is the place!! What I love even more is how Burn Boot Camp is always connecting with the community and giving back!! This place is full of inspiration to meet your fitness goals, physically and mentally!! It has truly been a game changer for me, and it really is a family! LOVE LOVE LOVE Burn Madison!!! 💙💙💙

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Stephanie Balch
text: Not even sure I know where to begin,  but I honestly wish I could rate more than 5 stars! I have been going to BURN Madison since they opened. I look forward to going every day, sometimes twice! The facilities are safe and clean, the workouts are ever changing and each camp can be personally modified by the excellent trainers to accommodate your fitness level. I have met so many great people here. 2020 has been a year, I am glad to have BURN to keep my physical and mental health in check!

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Jessica Tyler
text: I love working out at Burn! Burn provides high energy workouts for all ability levels. Burn is a special place and you know that from the minute you walk in. Everyone is friendly, supportive, and encouraging. Since starting Burn I have gotten stronger and been able to set a personal record half marathon and 5k time. Burn is more than a gym and I highly recommend you give it a try!

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Morgan Thompson
text: This place has changed the way I workout. I was never one to like high intensity workouts but burn boot camp has made it fun. To the trainers and the bonds you create with the others is more then I ever expected. I actually enjoy getting up in the morning and going to my workout and I never miss a day off when I’m not at work. The trainers will take time with you to help you reach your goals and genuinely care about helping you reach them. They are great about modifying something to make it work for if you have any injuries or something isn’t working for you. This is more then a gym it’s a family

name: Jesica Romano
text:
First time talking with them I ask how far is their gym from Montgomery ? He said not far we are very close . I said great . I ask about the time schedule for the teens, sadly I work those time frames so he offer that maybe the trainer can pick my son from home when he is on his way to the gym . I said. Thanks , give my location I live close to the YMCA bell rd. And he said ' oh no it's too far'  really?   I told him I wouldn't let just a extranger pick my son. But thanks for the offer. I wouldn't do that. I want it to be there when my son will do the training and then  the gym reply '  that it was a miscommunication with them better call the office.... .. ''
I told him no thank you I clearly understood. That when I asked for distance and where I live he said it was close. But when he offer to pick my son even though I wouldn't do that he said. Oh no that's too far ...   😆 clearly he doesn't know Montgomery.. And doesn't know how to chat with a new customer

name: Will Guy
text: I really love going to Rebar. Great people teach the classes. My son also attends the teen class.

name: Taylor Day
text: I have had nothing but positive experiences at Rebar Performance. I’ve taken classes from almost all of the CrossFit Coaches, and each one is just as uplifting as the next! I know that I am getting constructive feedback from the coaches, and it’s always given in a professional manner. The facility is gorgeous and has nice amenities including free childcare. The members are top notch and friendly. When I walk in, I know that this box adheres to their motto of faith, family, and fitness. All in all, it’s a wonderful experience and you should definitely give them a try. Hidden jewel on Chantilly!

name: Ross Davis
text: Here is a military perspective, this place is great and a must try. Family, faith, & fitness says it all. While I may be use to joining new communities, others are not. I was welcomed here with opened arms. This family has made my time in this community unforgettable. I feel blessed to have met this amazing group.

name: govinda mahajan
text: Good place to train. But beware they will continue to charge your account even after you said to stop. Upon asking they will say...you have to give 2 month notice to stop. They ask me to try cross fit, couldn’t continue for injury reason. I said to stop, but the gym owner continue to charge. Later on agreed to refund partial money and said it was not clear that you would not continue.

name: Jennifer LeMaster
text: I am so thankful for Rebar Performance and all the awesome coaches and members. They have become like family to me. Everyone is so welcoming and helpful. The coaches have encouraged me over the last 4 months and I have come a long way since I started. I am excited to see  my improvements at my 1 year mark.  There are people of all ages and fitness level's. I highly recommend Rebar.

name: Lindsay Mosley
text: Everyone at the gym is very professional and approachable. I don't ever feel insecure about my level of strength or knowledge of what I'm doing. The coaches and teachers explain everything so well that even as a beginner, you will be using the correct form to ensure no bodily harm. I love this place! It feels like a family!

name: Glenn Wilson
text: Family atmosphere. Coaches and staff are all amazing and will personally invest in you to ensure you reach your fitness goals. All fitness levels are welcome. If you are looking to lose weight, get stronger, improve your mobility or all of the above, there is no better place in town to achieve your fitness goals than at Rebar Performance.

name: Wendy Reyes Hudson
text: Montgomery -Pike Roads.. Our Happy place! Leave your ego at the door and expect to meet a community of like minded individuals working on themselves while pushing others to do their best!  Best Place Ever!

name: B Redfern
text:
This place is not for me. I'm by no means new to cross fit and have been doing it off and on since 2005. While this gym may appeal to some it does to fit for me. Being stuck too only the run class time and not being able to make up the workout is difficult. The plethora of cross-functional gyms in the area may account for why they can run this way.
While at first it seemed inviting, for me, the ambiance turned sour when I started missing workout due to the primary reason for my actually being in the area.
Finally was the music. The very first day had tracks I found to be motivating. Second trip the music changed but I figured hey, change up is fine. After approx 9 move visits the music remained the same. On my last visit I said something and the response was "we have diverse taste here and can't always accomidate." Snce the music never changes where is the diversity?  Besides I can only listen to music spouting drug use, gratuitous  violence and the subjugation of women for so long.

name: Samantha Shockley
text: Amazing facility, very clean - the people are even better so friendly and helpful. Thank you for a great drop in experience. I recommend this box to anyone.

name: Blane Matisak
text: I've been to a couple of cross fit places before and this one is by far the best experience I've recieved. It's a great atmosphere that offers a plethora of opportunities, not to mention it's unbelievable staff members that are highly trained and educated in their craft. It is hands down the highlight of my week every time I step foot inside its walls.

name: Amy Rawlinson
text: Rebar has been my 2nd home for the last 9 months, and I am hooked. I spent the summer of 2015 here as well. From elite athletes to individuals trying to take their first ever steps toward fitness, this place has it all. I’ve been doing CrossFit now for 6 years, and their class workouts continue to challenge me every day. The coaches are respectful of members’ personal goals, no matter how big or small. Since I’ve been attending, I’ve also had the opportunity to serve members of the community, local churches through food drives, Christmas gift drives, and projects for members within the gym. This place is truly one of a kind.

name: Sheri Rape
text: My experience at Rebar Performance has been great!  I've been going to the "Timpi Yoga" studio on site for a few months & I couldn't be more happy to have a hot yoga studio to lay my mat! The intructors deliver fun classes that appeal to both experienced yogi's and new alike.  I highly recommend this business & personally believe it is the best hot studio in the Montgomery area, hands down!

name: Kacie Baggett
text: Great facility! The coaches are knowledgeable and encouraging. I've attended both Crossfit and Boot Camp, and I've been very pleased with both. I highly recommend it!

name: Jessica Myers
text: My children absolutely love CrossFit Kids! They are learning so much more than physical fitness. I highly recommend it.

name: Natalie Olmstead
text: Great place to workout. Everyone is so friendly. It is not intimidating. They are great at adjusting for any fitness level.

name: Paula Collins
text: Just started Yoga here and love it! They also do CrossFit. The staff is wonderful and very helpful.

name: Austin Clark
text: Crossfit is challenging, yet it is very fun. I enjoy how we do high reps on everything and it is timed workouts, so I can set my goal and reach it.

name: M
text: Best place in Montgomery to get in shape. Something for everyone  and a great family atmosphere.

name: christopher worthington
text: I have to say that my time I spent here was awesome the staff the members everyone just made you feel welcome I cannot wait until after wrestling season is done so I can join back!

name: Kelly Colley
text: Absolutely LOVE Wendy's classes!! When I leave from hot yoga my body feels detoxed and refreshed!!

name: Charles Pirro
text: Great, kind, knowledgeable staff and good equipment.

name: Jonathan Strange
text: Absolutely Amazing! By far the best Cross fit and Yoga Gym in Montgomery, Alabama.

name: RC Rivers
text: Amazing facility, knowledgeable coaches, and incredibly friendly members all making it a great place to be an train!

name: Jackie Ingram
text: Great place, great people and a awesome workout 🏋🏻‍♀️💪🏼

name: Sidney Brown, Ph.D.
text: Great group of people and workout experience for the beginner or advanced athlete!

name: Michael Stroup
text:
From Day 1 I loved it!
Our diverse group of coaching staff ensures all needs can be met while the same coaches share a uniform care and concern about each individual's fitness needs and him/her as a person!
From Crossfit, Crossfit Kids, BootCamp, Yoga - there is something for everyone!
TRY IT!

name: Kwantrice White
text: Such a welcoming environment, focused on strength and wellness all the way around!

name: Russell Myers
text: The coaches are the best ever.

name: Allen Jackson
text: The best gym, and group of people in town.

name: Bo Tucker
text: Beautiful facility with great coaching

name: Dennis Romano
text: This place is awesome!

name: Justin Denino
text: Had a great experience with this facility. A variety of equipment was readily available and the classes were welcoming and provided an excellent workout. Kristen slayed her spin/combat cardio class with not a second wasted from beginning to end. Awesome workout! 🏋️‍♂️

name: scott tate
text: Mallory is the ultimate trainer as well as the gym owner.  She's extremely intelligent on all parts of conditioning and diet and knows how to adapt a training program to an individual's needs.  The gym is well stocked with modern equipment including machines, loose weights, and a full assortment of training accessories.  All staff are very friendly and the gym is well maintained.  Other services include various cardio and conditioning classes and a staff of one on one trainers.  I can't say enough about how totally awesome my experience here has been. I love Mallory and this gym as her experience as an authentic trainer has upped my fitness level and lifestyle between the training and diet advice.  I've been a member of many gyms, but this is my favorite and I highly recommend it!

name: Joe Booksh
text: Fairhope Fitness is the best gym in Fairhope.   Mallory, the owner, is so awesome and very helpful.     The classes are great too!

name: Emily Elrod (Workzbe)
text: Beautiful facility and Best trainer ever works there. Ask for Sara if you can. Trust me, she is soooo worth it.

name: John J McGuinness
text:
After arriving in Fairhope  a month ago from New York, where gyms had been closed for five months, there was Fairhope Fitness, a 247 access gym With lots of ways to get your body going.. Mallory, who is the owner and trainer herself  has put together a great staff. Her personal story is inspirational,  which is why she’s created an environment where fitness is both an “inside and outside job”.

Fairhope Fitness has a really good vibe where clients can develop a fitness program that works for them which a variety of workout activities including  TRX, weights, cardio and yoga and nutrition counseling.

More than a gym it’s a place for wellness and community.... Love it.

name: Louisa Whitmire
text: I have been working out at this gym for about 8 years.  It has always provided me with the workout equipment I need. They also have awesome trainers and free classes offered with the membership. The gym recently changed ownership and I have noticed the owner has been frequenting the gym more than the previous one. She’s personable and very helpful if you have questions/comments/concerns. I enjoy my workouts there because I can get my pump on with zero interruptions. I also enjoy the fact that the gym is central to downtown Fairhope. Oh and last thing the gym is open 24/7 so if you want to roll up to work out at 12 am you are totally allowed to do that. 5/5 gym experience!

name: Edward Stratton
text: This gym may be small, but it's definitely one of the better ones . No one really bothers you, you can do your workout in peace and move on about your day. Thanks for keeping this gym d-bag free.

name: Tyler Tunstall
text: Good gym but small

name: Dominic Fresch
text: Just dropped in on my way to Florida, Beau “the owner I believe” was quick to answer an out of the area code phone number. Gym was awesome and has everything you need to get fit and strong. If I’m ever in town again I’ll definitely be coming here!

resp.text: Enjoyed meeting you! Glad you enjoyed it. Thanks for the review.

name: nndnfasn
text: Southern Muscle and Fitness has always been a great gym for my wife and I.  It has a lot of options to help you reach your fitness goals.

name: stephen W
text: Nice gym with plenty of weights and machines as well as trainers. Easy parking and modern building.

name: Ilya Unzhakov
text: Fantastic place! Great members, service staff, and atmosphere for an awesome workout! The trainers know their stuff, whether it be for weight loss or for competition prep, and the gym houses several professional bodybuilders. Check it out if you're looking for a good workout!

name: Yvette Hester
text:
I would highly recommend anyone to become a member at southern muscle under the NEW owner beau. I had a situation where I had canceled my membership and charges continued to come out of my account after I talked to the previous owner about my no longer attending.

Although Beau took over the gym back in July, he was fully understanding of the situation and although he did not HAVE to, he refunded me back a significant portion of the money I had lost with the previous owner due to there lack of communication with the vendor who withdrawals money from the accounts.

This owner genuinely cares about the members, it goes beyond a simple membership and a hello here and there! Charter and professionalism speaks volumes. THANK YOU AGAIN! ❤️

name: REM Sosa
text: I worked out around 6am and i had a great experience. The Owner Beau really made the gym run like a family and make everyone feel welcome. Great equipment for Strength and cardio training. SQUAT racks, barbells, dumbells etc. Will def come back if in the area for work. A+++

name: John Jarrett
text: Awesome gym!!! New management is impeccable and you cannot beat the 24 hour access. Very open and welcoming clientele. Highly recommend this gym to anyone in the area. You won’t regret it!

name: Natalia Gutium
text: Love this gym. The owner is very knowledgeable and helpful. Everyone is friendly. Great environment.

name: Ryan Wade
text:
I was told that I was not locked into a contract when I originally joined. I filled out automatic draft information with no problems. I was told the set-up fees were to be waived and monthly charges were $29.95. The auto draft amounts are different most months ($29.95- $59.95) with absolutely no explanation for the difference. I figured because I cut the owners sons hair I would have been told the truth-Guess not.
So if you are into a gym with dated equipment, management that takes hours (or days to return a call), and inconsistent billing this is the gym for you!!
As for me-I can't wait to transfer my drivers license to PROVE to "Paramount Acceptance" billing company that I no longer live in Montgomery so they will stop drafting my account.

name: Jennifer Biddy
text: Locally owned & operated. By far the best gym in Montgomery! 24 Hour Access

name: Rob Smith
text: Extremely difficult canceling your membership here

name: Ed The Man McBride
text: Knowledgeable friendly staff

name: Jessica Meuse
text: Great gym with great instructors! They suggest different options for people with wrist or other issues and are very encouraging, no matter what level fitness you're at! The crossfit community here is great and that alone is one of the reasons I keep coming back!

name: Matt Hanson
text: The knowledgeable staff wants you to exceed your goals ... exemplary CrossFit gym!

name: yandy roman
text: During my time in Alabama i joined this gym. Cory and his staff treated me like family from day 1. Sadly I had to move and i was very dissapointed I had to leave. This is by far the best gym in Montgomery, AL.

name: Rachel Graham
text: Great facility friendly people. Visited for a power lifting competition.

name: Lyn Adams
text: They have a good self defense class for women.

name: MsB arnes
text: Sore today...strong tomorrow.

name: jon vancoille
text: Awesome crossfit Gym!

name: Ed Hinson
text: A great place for movement! They are the best at working with clients to restore range of motion with a holistic approach. All kinds of different classes based on customer needs. They are truly special.

name: Zoe Wendle
text: Excellent studio for Pilates. Modern and the best equipment with top notch instruction and support. As a former dancer I can appreciate the high quality of the thoughtful workouts they prepare and take you through.  Enjoy it.

name: Kathy Fayard
text: I love the staff so helpful and they have so much knowledge about weight loss and healthy ways to loose.  I definitely recommend G&L weight loss if you want to loose the right way.

name: Crystal Sun
text: Great communication and a great flow at this clinic. They take their time with you and they don’t make you feel rushed—such a huge plus in the medical industry.  So happy I found this place!

resp.text: Thank you Crystal!!

name: Antoinette Breau
text: I absolutely recommend coming here to. G&L weight loss clinic. It was very educational and uplifting to know you won’t be going through this alone. The physician was very Thorough explaining the program as well as the nurse. I’m looking forward to my journey of weight loss and it’s very affordable

resp.text: Thank you Antoinette!

name: Destiny Stuller
text: Easy experience, in and out. A little more than I expected for start up/ monthly but definitely worth it

name: Katie Moran
text: Great place for help with weight loss. Really nice and helpful  staff.

name: Sandi Molloy
text: I highly recommend g and l weight loss to anyone struggling with dieting on there own. The staff was super friendly! I was greeted with a smile by Hunter at the front desk. He was friendly, professional and discreet throughout my entire visit. I can tell he wants me to succeed and i was given a variety of printouts regarding food choices, help with workouts, and dietary supplements offered. Thank you so much G and L! Can't wait to succeed!

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to give us feedback!! Hunter is great!

name: Robert Jones
text: Great customer service.

name: Andy ROBERSON
text:
I have started a new chapter in my life. I did some research and found G & L weight loss clinic. The staff is amazing. They take time to explain what to do and how to do it. They do blood work and a EKG to make sure you are ok to do the program. Hunter is my favorite he is so kind and takes so much time with you. He encourages you and makes sure you are taken care of. Thank you to all.
If you want to feel healthier and feel good about yourself I encourage you to just try them you want be sorry!!

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Kelani Mayer
text: Hunter & the staff are so helpful, informative and friendly! The program is well thought out with step by step goals and assistance by Hunter. I highly recommend G&L over any of the other establishments I’ve been to in Baldwin County

resp.text: Thank you Kelani! We are so glad you had a positive experience.

name: Sean Smith
text: The staff at G&L weight loss are very professional and nice.  I really love the new look and always feel welcomed and satisfied.  Hunter is especially detailed and great to work with.

resp.text: Thank you Sean!  We love our new updated look of the office!

name: Rosalinda Hernandez
text: Thank you so much for helping me when I was so depressed over my weight. I feel so much more confident and I couldn’t do it with out y’all! They are so helpful and always make you feel comfortable!

resp.text: So glad to hear you had a positive experience! Thank you for recommending our program!

name: Andra Thomas
text: I just love these guys! They have made me feel important and accomplished!! Totally recommend them if you are serious!

text: I love this place, Hunter was so nice and informative.  So very friendly and knowledgeable. I was in and out in no time. I totally recommend going. I look forward to the program.

text: Awesome staff and service! I highly recommend them! I love the handouts that Hunter made!

text: G&L Weight Loss in Foley Al is most outstanding, greatness place to go to achieve your goal to get rid of those extra pounds. Excellent Program and all the staff are awesome very nice and helpful!!! I recommend this place Highly!!! Love it!!!

name: Charnelle Thomas
text: This is my 1st time coming back since July and omg the place is beyond beautiful ! The new red head is amazing, really nice, very understanding, and gave me good information regarding workout plans, detox water, and vegetables with the lowest carbs!! Love them!!!

resp.text: We are so glad you like our new decor and that you had a positive experience with us!

name: Kala moyers

text: Love hunter! He was very knowledgeable and friendly ! Very excited to start my weightloss journey with him!

text: Great place and very knowledgeable staff. Thank you so much for helping me get started on my way to a better me.

Great staff!

name: Rita Jones
text: Not for me! To intense was not what I expected I suggest anyone over 50  and up make sure your in good health before trying this work out, If health is not up to park  this may not be the place for you.

name: ronald mcbay
text: Didn’t late cancel. Tried to take a class from out of town. I was more than five minutes late. They turned me away.

name: jo h
text: Been going since they open. Great staff. Convenient location.

name: Marissa E. Young
text:
Worked out in here while I was in Birmingham on travel assignment for work, and absolutely loved this gym and coaches so much! This OTF studio was legit the only reason I was sad this work assignment ended ;)
Coach Ashley and Coach Nigel were amazing, and made sure to get to know me while I was in town for 2+ months. What an awesome way to feel a part of something when you're new! Will miss working out with them, and should I end up in Bham again I know exactly where I'll be going OTF Downtown!
Thanks for the great experience!

name: Michael McGrath
text: Great workout been going there for over 3.5 years. Coaches/ staff and equipment are top class.

resp.text: Thanks for the 5 star review Michael! We appreciate your commitment to our workouts. See you in the studio!

name: Ryan Jones
text: Friendly staff that treats regulars, new comers, and random members from our of town like friends and they'll even remember you. Looking forward to many more workouts with this team.

name: Tracy Streete
text: Love this place

text: Clean and well maintained.  Gets seriously busy at certain times though. I'm still working out when is best to work out.

name: Mari Johnson-Fuller
text: It has a lot of great equipment and space. Unfortunately it can get really hot in there especially during the summer. Staff andnowner are great people. Prices extremely reasonable!

text: Well-maintained equipment. Friendly atmosphere,  good price and a lot to learn.

name: Froze 1990
