name: Quiawanna Dallas
text: The best to ever do it! I really need to get back soon!

resp.text: Thank you Q!

name: Charles Campbell
text: I dropped in for open gym. Andrew basically gave me a private coaching session. He went way above and beyond to work through some muscle up drills and cleaned up my power clean technique. He knows how to break down a movement and then demonstrate how to do it. He adapts his teaching to how you learn. If I lived in the area I would call this place home.

resp.text: Thanks for stopping by, it was a pleasure helping you out.  Hopefully we'll see you on future visits.

name: J. Blitz
text: Such a great gym, a close-knit bunch that really felt like family.  Andrew and Jason are great coaches, really knowledgeable and great with people. I started going after a running injury, and I was leery of CrossFit going in. I thought it was crazy and dangerous.  Some CrossFit gyms have a reputation of throwing their clients into the fire with little or no training, leading to injury or just being discouraged. This turned out to be just the opposite. Not only did they help rehab the injury, but I got into the best shape I'd been in since college.  If I hadn't moved out of state,  I'd still be a member. (I still stop in when I can)

resp.text: Thanks J, I hope you are able to find a good box in your new home.

name: Chad Hawk
text: Classic Crossfit. Caring coaches. The effort made to ensure your movements are correct and Drew’s keen eye will keep you safe and get you on you way to bionic in no time at all. Great people and a welcoming community.

resp.text: Thanks, Chad! I'm glad you enjoyed CrossFit high-intensity workouts!

name: Louis Oddo
text: I have done CrossFit in the past. Andrew is another level Coach!

resp.text: Thanks Louis

name: Nicole Karamichael
text: If you want to become healthier and fitter, stronger and faster, MoreFire is where you should come. Coaches Andrew and Jason really know their stuff, and will break down movements for any skill level, and set you on a plan to improve all the pieces that make up your fitness, i.e. strength, mobility, balance, endurance, etc. Guy or gal, no matter your age or current fitness level, there is a starting place for everyone here.

resp.text: Thanks

name: Patrick Pence
text: Dropped in for a class when i was in town. Great coaching!

resp.text: Thanks Patrick, glad we could get you started on you CrossFit journey.

name: Jason Lucia
text: I have worked out for years and trained in and around alot of gyms. Morefire crossfit is by far been my best experience and i have made more progress in 3 years here than i have in the past 10-15 years of training. I have lost over 50 pounds since i started in 2016 and kept it off. Thanks to the unbeatable coaching I can do things i would not ever dreamed i could do. Like handstand walking, muscle ups double unders, and kept raw strength. I have made friends along the way and morefire has become my second family. The community, excellent coaching and dedication from andrew and all the members is superb. I love coaching and training at morefire.

resp.text: Thank you.

name: fxynina
text: Great Gym. The owner is amazing and the trainers work at your pace while being very motivational.  Be prepared to sweat

resp.text: It was great working with you and having you drop-in for a visit.

name: Lilian Amaya
text:
(Translated by Google) A place where you can not only meet your athletic needs. Otherwise you also make new friends. The coach's charisma and patience make this process easier. Andrew is definitely the best when it comes to crossfit.

(Original)
Un lugar donde no solo puedes llenar tus necesidades atleticas.  Si no que tambien haces nuevos amigos.. El carisma y la paciencia del entrenador hacen este proceso mas facil. Definitivamente Andrew es el mejor en la materia de crossfit.

resp.text:
(Translated by Google) Thanks Lilian

(Original)
Gracias Lilian

name: Stephen Williams
text: Excellent place to workout.  Equipment is always nice and clean.  Open to members 24/7.  Affordable.

name: Joe Fondriest
text: Great staff. Nice small gym. Not to busy.

name: B Millz
text: Pretty relax place to workout

name: Justa Jester
text: Staff is very professional and very helpful! Always clean and very Friendly !

name: Michael Hudnell
text: Love the conveince of 24/7 access, especially on holidays.

name: Ariel Martin
text: They will charge you after cancel your account

name: Marchita McDole
text: I love it!!!

name: Jordan Callaway
text: To small

name: AB H
text: Pell City Fitness has a very nice facility and Alana is great, but unfortunately the owner of this gym is so unprofessional, arrogant, and sometimes downright rude. They have dropped prices and promoted new pricing because they say they care about the community but the truth is they have lost several members over the last several months due to the owner’s attitude and the price is an attempt to get people back. I wouldn’t go back if the membership was dropped to $50. It’s just not worth dealing with him. Plus he is actively trying to sell the business without any of his customers knowing. The gym is suppose to be a place to mentally decompress and this environment does not do that.

name: Jami Shear
text: Getting out of bed and to a 5 am class has never been so easy with the staff and people that work out here. Super caring and friendly coaches and an overall wonderful environment to be in. Plus, sharing a prayer after ever workout is the best way to start your day. I could never say enough nice things about this place. Highly recommend!

name: Lori Galloway Cochran
text: This place is so awesome!  The Coaches are encouraging, knowledgeable, professional, and genuinely care about each person.   You feel like family from your first class.  I have spent years looking for a gym like this- and I am blessed to have found it right here in my town

name: Holly Bell
text: Love Pell City Fitness!! Joining was the best thing I could have ever done. I have made so many new friends and we are all encouraging each other in our fitness journeys.  We are truly a family!!!

name: Stephanie Braden
text: If you are looking for a gym that stands above all the other guys, this is the place! To Pell City Fitness, you are not just another “member”. They sincerely care about you and your fitness goals. The coaches are personable and push you to get the very best out of your workout. They truly want to see you hit your goals and hit those goals you never thought was possible. I love the flexibility in class schedules and the fact that they have free childcare! Make your home gym PCF. You will be so glad you did!

name: shay pierce
text: Amazing People/FitFam. Clean equipment. Truly a life changing place. Positive atmosphere. Coaches that genuinely bring you into their family. Highly recommend!!!

name: Christy Bline
text: PC Fitness is my home away from home!! The staff are great and very knowledgeable, helpful And caring!  They will know you by name not number. Whatever fitness level you are you will fit in!

name: Kelly Clark
text: PC Fitness is a family. Scott and his gang are always available to help. If you can’t do something they are going to get you fit to do it. Give them a try!!

name: Bridget Ham
text: Great place and great people.  I never thought working out could be this fun!!

name: Christine
text: If you want the best extended family this is where you need to go. Everyone there is very welcoming and will help you if you have problems with the workout with no judgment ever. Come in and say hello you will not be sorry

name: Neil Allman
text: Even if you don't like working out, you'll love this gym. They are just so dang welcoming and good at modifying for beginners. You can do this, no matter what shape you are in.

name: paula eiser
text: Amazing program and people..helped me get healthy and fit with amazing support and direction!!

name: Jade Martin
text: Awesome gym! Great coaches and a good environment! Everyone is very nice and welcoming!

name: Laura Rogers
text: PC Fitness has become my home away from home. Everyone is so helpful and encouraging.

name: Lindsey Bone
text: Love the environment, the skilled coaches and the encouragement from all of the great teammates!

name: Catherine Salinas
text: Love the owner & it's trainer especially Alana weems

name: Wilson Thomas
text: Great facility with staff that really cares. If you are looking to reach your fitness goals this is the place to go!

name: Nathan Seville
text: Great people! Great coaches!

name: Stephanie Sawyer
text: Loved the yoga class!

name: Curtis Garrett
text: If you to get in shape, crossfit/boot camp will help.

name: Christopher Fulmer
text:
Check out there score on better business bureau... F all because they continue to charge you after you cancel your membership.

Gym is not maintained and is falling apart and dirty. Canceled because it finally got so bad I could not use most of the amenities because of the lack of cleaning.
Bucket in floor to catch water dripping from ceiling.
Once you cancel you are not there concern nor do they care, why well because they will continue billing your cc and would rather burn all bridges to get that extra $20, that is more important to them than the potential to have you come back.

I am now with written proof my membership is canceled still 2 months later still getting charged on my cc and the manager said there is nothing they can do.

name: Alexis
text:
I've been coming here for 2 years now, the staff is excellent and so is the space.
The employees are super nice and they have worked with me on a few matters.
The space is awesome, there's many great things like indoor pool, woman's gym, sauna, classes, training, and the equipment is great.
Awesome hours too.

name: Matt R
text:
Very good gym. The power lifting area is segregated to the downstairs, and the upstairs has machines and an indoor running track. The pool is a good temperature and never crowded. They also have steam rooms and saunas.

The group classes are good, but they have nothing at all on Friday afternoons and evenings.

The gym is remarkably uncrowded prior to 530pm and after 730pm.

name: Sally May A
text: Well organized. Maintained. Friendly and helpful staff. Plethora class choices. Great indoor walking track.

name: Justin Templeton
text: The equipment is not really good, some are okay but that gym is not good compared to other golds gyms. They have the worst bars I’ve used in a super long time. I feel like this place is for older people, there’s nothing wrong with that, but the changing rooms are nicer than the gym itself which is very disappointing.

name: Dewayne Moore
text: I've been a member of Golds gym for several years and I've had my good days and my not so good days but I will say my good has out done my bad the reason iam giving 5 stars on this review is because iam big on customer care and customer service I want to commend Golds gym on one of their employee her name is Noel I think she works in account services she has done an  outstanding job with not only making me feel welcome to Golds but even others just want her to know that words will never express my gratitude to her for going the extra steps to making members feel special and welcome Thank you Noel for being a true leader.

name: Savage
text:
Gym used to be awesome, laid back, and clean. Now not so much. Here are some reasons to never get a membership here.

The weights are out of place, out of order, laying all over the floors, and some weights have Chunks missing out.

Rules are not being followed or enforced. Creating a hazard and an annoyance. Gym bags shouldn’t be left on the floor yet there are bags everywhere. Some people will leave there bags on a machine while they go across the gym to workout. Not allowing people to use the machine the bags are on. I’m not one for rules, but this just hurts gym etiquette and makes lifting here an annoyance.

The movie “cardio” room is pretty cool and a huge selling point of this gym over others. However, they have employees coming in whenever they want to “prep” for boot camp later that night and they kick out whoever is in there. I’ve seen a gentleman address the manager about this but the manager just brushed him off.

I have worked out at many gyms while traveling for work and unfortunately I live nearby this one. Out of all the gyms this is by far the worst managed and maintained.

name: Morrie Chance
text:
Joined Golds in Pelham just before it opened.  Great selection of weights and equipment.  Spacious and clean men's locker room.  Restroom clean.  T V 's everywhere.   Management knowledgeable and friendly.

8 years later things have changed.  Some equipment is faulty or not properly working.  Cleanliness has fallen down.  Plumbing issues in men's room and water fountain.  Constantly changing employees.  A/C is on when it's cold outside.  T V 's not properly working.   The place is falling apart.  Almost always this is due to management issues.  Time to make some changes.

name: TERRY HENLEY
text: Love it here. Go 6 days a week. This my gym

name: Christopher Peters
text: Love this gym, in here 6-7 days a week. Great staff and they have all the machines and free weights you need. Also have pull up bars, pool and steam room. Membership is very reasonable for the amenities!

name: Freddy Diaz
text: Is this gym closing down? I received an email saying they are closing several locations due to Covid-19...

name: Christopher Allison
text:
I cancelled in person in July of 2018. I was told I would be charged for August because that was their policy to charge for an additional month after cancellation. Ok?!?  However, 2 months later I’m still being charged for a membership.  I called and the woman I spoke with claims they don’t have any of the cancellation paperwork I filled out. This is an unethical sham to steal money after cancellation!!!  When you cancel, MAKE them sign the paperwork and give you a copy. Better yet, don’t ever sign up with this gym!.

On top of that, the gym is dirty and in need of a major overhaul. Half the elliptical machines were non functioning upstairs. Obviously a gym experiences a lot of wear and tear, but they could at least wipe down the equipment fully once every couple of days and hire maintenance to keep the equipment functional and safe.

name: Samuel Stuart
text: It’s a good gym for the price. Clean. All of the equipment I use appears to be in good working order. Can’t complain about my experience.

name: Kirk Petty
text: Clean always equipment rarely down staff always helpful

name: Jane Smith
text: This gym knowingly has a fat shamer (Latonya Hammonds) employed as one of their fitness instructors and the manager has decided to do nothing about it. A gym should be a safe place where people trying to reach their fitness goals don't have to worry about the employees degrading them. No one deserves to be bullied and told to "put down the fork" as an insult. Do not give this gym any of your money.

name: Alan Wood
text: I have been meeting with Barbara Tumm for over a year. She gives me a new program each month. I originally got with a trainer because I had issues with my thyroid and I needed help managing my weight. Barbara is thorough in that she is aware of my actual potential level. She challenges me. She asks for feedback. She is encouraging. She notices when I have not been as regular and mentions it for accountability. And she is simply a delightful person!                            - Mrs. Alan Wood

name: L Zigli
text: For a Gym, this one is pretty nice. The trainers are very helpful, even if you haven't paid for a personal trainer they will help you out.

name: Eric Hall
text: I've been a member of this gym for several years after trying Powerhouse and Planet Fitness.  This is the best gym, hands down!  The equipment is great, place clean, and staff is courteous and knowledgeable.  The person at the front, especially Justin, always welcomes you with a smile and encouraging words to start working out.

name: Terry Pisano
text: Same experience.  Silly me, I signed a contract for a year, allowing them access to my bank account.  No problem until I signed up for personal training as well, and decided to use a different bank account.  Big mistake!  Do not allow these people access to any bank account!  They kept charging me for the personal training even though I had PREPAID that.  Trying to get it back was a nightmare!  Corporate merry-go-round was a joke!  Then by coincidence, they wanted to buy a service that I provide, not realizing I was an ex-customer.  Guess what!  I had to threaten to send them to collections to get them to pay the bill!  They finally paid - a year later!

name: Amy Watson
text: Large gym floor with a distinct separation between machines and free weights. Nice running track inside that went around the facility. Members were all friendly and staff helpful. Enough weight for the serious lifter. Day pass $10.

name: Rory Chrane
text: I think these negative  reviews are talking about previous management. Everyone I deal with there  from Benjamin at the front desk to Brett the fitness manager is friendly and accommodating. I feel it is professionally run and is nice and clean. Equipment is in good shape and its not overly packed with people. What more could you ask for?  When people enter contracts they should get it in writing and then everybody stick to their end of the bargain. People are famous for joining a  gym and then changing priorities. If  all the people are  I know that are happy with this gym wrote an honest review,  the overall  rating would be closer to 5 stars. I have the resources and the time to go get training anywhere in towm and I chose this place.

name: Kellie Glaze
text: This gym wasn't very crowded. I wish they had better bars, and more bumper plates, but it got the job done.

name: Leon Henderson
text: A very good gym but could be better in some small ways.

name: Chris Walton
text: Never had one issue with them. I will say the staff has changed since the last people on here had issues. I have been a member for a year and a half now and love it. Always kept very clean, which I really appreciate. The Personal Trainers rock and will help you if they see you doing anything wrong, form wise. Brett is the Fitness Manager and I highly recommend him if you're looking for an awesome workout. I also recommend Austin, he really knows what he's doing and has the schooling to back it up. When I was looking for a new gym I went to a few, Golds was the only one that I felt welcomed and wanted. Will never go anywhere else, but I would love to see tanning beds lol.

name: Zachary Tatom
text: I got a free pass from the franchise’s website sent to my email, drove over the same day, and was told that they don’t honor them. When the guy behind the counter told me I could use the gym for $15, I left. It was a pretty clear bait-and-switch. I wouldn’t trust them enough to do business with them.

name: nate zman
text: Don't get hooked up with this outfit. They are only interested in taking your money. If you try to get out of the contract you will find out what a RIP off outfit they are.

name: Pamela Cartright
text: My trainer Barbara is awesome.

name: Joseph Passantino
text: The cleanliness is lackluster to say the least from men’s locker room bathroom to free weight area to cardio area. I’d personally prefer there to be some type of disinfectant wipe instead of spray and paper towels.  The TVs in the free weight area are struggling. The resistance cables attachments are all detiroated. Canceling here can be a pain as my father had a bad experience with it but the key for keeping me is the location for now. The pool is well maintained though and normally not busy if you are looking to swim

name: Amer Babi
text: Prepare to be scammed if you are going to join this gym because they continuously steal extra money month to month from your banking account and deny it. They also told us that we could break contract whenever we wanted, however, we were unable to do so and were instead charged multiple times under a different name other than gold gym's. That alone should be enough basis for a strong lawsuit against this corporation, not that stealing money from bank accounts was enough, they actually use different names to steal large amounts of money. For us, they stole 600 dollars at one time, and every month about 100 dollars, and there is nothing we can do about it because you need expensive lawyers and a whole other headache just to claim your hard-earned money. I strongly hope you do not get into the same mess that we got into and I strongly advise you not to speak with "mark anthony" because he will stop at nothing to steal your money.

name: Bee Bot
text: Well, let me qualify my statement by saying that I do not normally leave reviews (unless like most people the service is horrific), however, I'm making an exception in this instance.  Name dropping is not always appropriate but I figure in this case why not... I met Brett, the fitness manager, first.  I could go on for days about his  character and personality, but suffice it to say that Gold's is lucky to have him...oh yea, he's great at personal training too!  The front desk staff is awesome as well, especially Will, Crystal, and Benjamin.  There is a lot of comradery at the Pelham Gold's.  I've been a member of several gyms, but I appreciate Gold's Gym (especially the Pelham location).

name: sherry baldone
text:
This review is sent under my wife's name due to some Google issues, but the review is mine.

I joined Gold's this past February and it has been a very positive experience for me; all the staff has been friendly and accommodating.
Both Brett Roney and Austin Franklin have been very helpful in providing good fitness advice for all types of fitness goals (endurance, strength, etc.) and in explaining the use of the equipment.

Buzz Baldone

name: Jacqueline Gamez
text:
I did not sign any contract with Gold's Gym, and I was paying month by month, I stopped attending the gym when they started taking money from my bank account without my authorization, I asked Vanessa the manager to give me "the supposed" contract, she NEVER provided me with anything. I called several times to corporate and they did not want to help me at all. This has been the worst customer service experience with charges that I did not authorized.

Be careful!!!!!!

name: Alex Breton
text: Money hungry gym, all they care about is to lock you in a contract. It’s very hard to get off the contract make sure you read the fine print

name: Alicia Kenerley
text: I love Gold's!! The Pelham location has a wide variety of things to do so you never get bored.

name: Matthew Knotts
text: Excellent people as well as a knowledgeable staff. Go see Jose when you sign up

name: Vanessa Felder
text: Lovely facility, very friendly and helpful staff! I really enjoy my workouts at this gym, and would recommend it to everyone.

name: Chris Sanders
text:
Don't sign the contract!
I can't speak for everyone but in my case they don't do a proper job of communicating the terms of the contract. You will be charged biweekly for a membership fee. Every six months you will be charged $25 (communicated as a $12 yearly fee to me at my initial set up). Also, cancellation/expiration of the contract is not automatic so you will be charged until you physically go into the gym and fill out cancellation paperwork which is subject to a 30 day notice in which case you may be charged once or twice more depending on the date you cancel. A court test call or reminder of an upending expiration would be a fairly simple thing to communicate one would think, especially via email but I suppose not. A lot of it seems shady and underhanded. My advice is to not sign the contract or ask as many questions as possible b/c they won't tell you otherwise until there's an issue.

name: Joseph Duran
text: I work out here every week, they have all the usuals, except for tanning(they have plenty of space they should have that.). The best part is no pushy sales ppl or trainers

name: Снежана Финк
text: Please please keep the kids area sanitized! My sons got HFM virus two times each and third time around my oldest got primary herpetic gingivostomatitis! It’s been hell for me for last few months

name: Ben Glassco
text: Clean, comfortable environment, overall a great place to work out.

name: Jesse riding
text: Joined golds for a month and then moved out of the area. Provided all the paperwork and letter to corporate to cancel membership. Had to cancel our bank card to block them from continuing to charge us. Now getting calls from bill collection saying we owe them money. Gym is nice but golds policy is horrendous. Do yourself a favor and make sure you get copies and confirmations on everything when you get your membership or try and cancel it. They'll play dirty. Planet fitness may not have all the flash but atleast they're honest.

name: Stacie Dené
text:
Every time I would  go to the cardio Theater, I would have to go back to the front and tell them there is not a movie playing. This happened so many times that I began to call before I would go to make sure the theater room had a movie playing.
I all explained to them that my family had down sized (I have a child leaving for Afghanistan) may I please get the couples rate. I was paying for four people and now I only had two people working out. Instead of trying to accommodate the mother of an Active Infantry Soldier who can no longer work out because he is fighting for our Freedom and Country, they were more worried about numbers. I did not want out of my contract simply to down size it.  When they told me I could not go from a family membership to a couples I gave a two months notice to cancel. Then they told me I could not do that. I would not recommend this facility to anyone.

name: Gerville Harlequin
text: New to the area and had a free pass. Was told that I could not use the pass unless I signed up for a membetship that day. Since I was already jacked up on caffiene I bought a $15 day pass. Needless to say I wont be back. To many choices in this area.

name: Randy Miller (Ran)
text: Incompetent staff!! Cancelled a membership 7 months ago and got a bill from collections saying I owe them $220, tried to work something out with them to comeback but they refused to help!

name: Jermaine Watkins
text: My experience them hasn't been the most pleasant. My 2nd time visiting this location I wasn't greeted at all by employee Jose who I saw greeted EVERYONE else besides me. I'm not sure why(the only difference was my race). I had to speak to HIM & ask HIM how HE was doing & he kind of nonchalantly said ok & then proceeded after I had walked off calling me back & loudly telling me I had an issue with my account. For one I've had this issue before with gold's gym. This is only my 2nd month, 2nd Payment & BOTH times it has been issues with me being told different due dates for my membership which in turn causes the membership "fee" to be returned & charged a addt'l "fee"! When trying to explain this to Jose he didn't seem to be very receptive to what I was conveying to him. I then had to contact the GM from the other location to get the matter rectified. On a good note though the GM Ned did a GREAT job at handling the situation & resolving.

name: Jacob Roberts
text: Great gym with lots of different equipment to workout on.

name: Craig List
text: The best gym in BHam for sure. They have a ton of classes and a cool cardio cinema all for free. It is really clean and has new up to date equipment from TechnoGym, Precor and FreeMotion. The track is really cool for running instead of always using boring treadmills. I did a few "sessions" with trainer Kyle and he definitely knows how to give you a good work out, you won't be disappointed. The two of us have a pretty regular thing going on now. The location is convenient just far from downtown if you're coming that way, and it can get pretty busy after work. I would suggest if you can try and go later in the evening to avoid the crowds and get an appointment with Kyle then hit the sauna afterwards for some small talk and hot relaxation. Also the steam room is great for extra privacy. There's no juice bar or anything like that but Pub 261 is just a minute up 31 and a great spot to loosen up a little bit instead of just going home and straight to bed. Kyle is also very skilled in deep tissue massage due to his strong grip and thick forearms, so if you are sore afterwards it's a good way jumpstart the recovery process and get you in the right mood if you know what I mean. I try to sleep 8-10hrs whenever I can but Kyle has so much stamina he keeps me going all night! It makes me feel like we're in college again. There's also a lap pool and racquetball court. It's so nice to have such a close connection with your trainer, kyle makes me feel comfortable and loved plus he is super funny and handsome, the total package but he is all mine boys!  Highly recommended!

name: capitano88
text: Bad, bad, bad, bad,  customer service. I never  signed  a contract  with them, I moved from pelham.  So I cancelled  my membership.  They kept  taking  money out  of my bank account without  my authorization  they suck.   BECAREFULL  PELHAM REDISENTS!.

name: Heather Odaibo
text: I love this gym. I started going here over a year ago and had to take a break because I had my son. Once he was born I joined again and I love it just as much as I did before. I love the zumba class the zumba instructors marissa and traci are great, they make it fun an exciting and easy to learn plus get a good work out at the same time.. I do use the gym for toning and other weight loss fitness and it is always clean, every one is very nice and smiles to me that's a great team there and I will NEVER change gyms.. this one is a all in one for everything you need.

name: Luis Gomez
text: the best gym in Alabama 💪🏾👍🏾🏁

name: Shane Glidewell
text: My Golds gym is the best ever!!!

name: Juan Gante
text: I go almost every day to work out and relieve stress very nice gym you get what you pay could be 10 dlrs cheaper doh

name: Tami Kanashiro
text: Ugh..What can I say,  I hate the management, I had 3 overdraft from an old bank account that I was about to closed because golds gym kept taking money from that account that I CHANGED 3 weeks prior to avoid the charges...I spoke so SOOO many times with the manager Vanessa, but after saying she sent notes to, I guess the department that take of that, FINALLY after 5 months of being bounced around "come back next week, i haven't heard from them yet" this morning Vanessa told me "They can't do anything about it" ..... I just tired of all this, can't wait to switch to LIFETIME FITNESS like lots of ppl have switched from gold's.

name: Iran Chavez
text: Very good place to work out

name: Andrew Ward
text: The pool was terrible. I ended up leaving that gym.

name: Buddha 3g
text: Great atmosphere.

name: Rochelle Newby
text: Best gym ever!

name: Beth Bcalloway
text: Clean, great staff & equipment

name: Juan V Landaverde
text: I like it  lots of machines to exercise, and much more exercise activities.

name: Rebecca Welch
text: Great workout spot, love it

name: Paul McPherson
text: Great place to workout

name: Eric Wilson
text: A lot of different options

name: Tony Melvin
text: Don't really know

name: D G
text: Love this gym!!

name: Javier Lopez
text: very good

name: Anne Guthrie
text: Encouraging staff and coaches! I love tracking my heart rate and calorie burning.

name: Lori Barrett
text: My Orangetheory experience has been a wonderful surprise! I have tried dozens of fitness programs over my lifetime, and Orangetheory far surpasses any other type of offering! The classes are instructor-led, fast-paced, and challenging, and it’s a total-body workout every time! I love that every workout is different! The classes last an hour, but every time it feels like I’ve only been there for a few minutes! I believe that I will be a lifetime member!

resp.text: Thank you SO much for taking the time to share your experience with us Lori! We look forward to being a part of your fitness routine for years to come. See you at the studio

name: Heather Garcia
text: The only exercise program that I’ve been able to stick with!  The trainers are great and know everyone by name.  Kyle and Levi are usually my trainers and they are both wonderful.  I’m getting healthier and happier every day.  Thank you, Orange Theory!

resp.text: Thank you SO much for taking the time to share your experience with us Heather! We look forward to being a part of your fitness routine for years to come. See you at the studio!

name: Kevin Chance
text: I love that the workouts support yet challenge you wherever you are. I feel no less challenged today than when I started this journey two years ago, yet I can look back and see the progress I have made in terms of both fitness and weight loss.  I also appreciate that our studio has enormously attentive and supportive front desk staff, and the coaches are truly terrific!

resp.text: Thank you SO much for taking the time to share your experience with us Kevin! We look forward to being a part of your fitness routine for years to come. See you at the studio!

name: Michael Kennedy
text: It doesn’t feel like a group class. It’s more like a we all have a personal trainer at the same time. The coaches are so in sync with what we need, what we struggle with, and what we want to get out of the classes. I couldn’t be happier with my OTF Tuscaloosa family!

resp.text: Thanks for the 5 star review, Michael! We’re so happy you’re loving the workouts, and pumped that you’re part of our OTF Tuscaloosa Fit Fam!

name: Tray Sloan
text: Seriously so much fun! It was the best gym experience I had ever had and the group setting helps keep you motivated to go more. The staff was incredibly helpful with it being my first class as well!

resp.text: Thank you SO much for taking the time to share your experience with us Tray! We look forward to being a part of your fitness routine for years to come. See you at the studio!

name: Wendy Rawlings
text: I tried several gyms before choosing OrangeTheory, which has more diverse class offerings (different routine every time), a better sound system, spotlessly clean equipment, and really motivational coaches. Also love the feedback from the heart monitor about how hard I’m working.

resp.text: Thank you SO much for taking the time to share your experience with us Wendy! We look forward to being a part of your fitness routine for years to come. See you at the studio!

name: Spencer Sellers
text: I loved how motivating, and willing to help the coach is to everyone. I also loved the intensity and quality of the exercises performed, even with the freedom to go at your own pace throughout it all.

resp.text: Thank you SO much for taking the time to share your experience with us Spencer! We look forward to being a part of your fitness routine for years to come. See you at the studio!

name: Sabrenia Kelley-Lewis
text: I always feel like I'm at my home studio when I visit Tuscaloosa. The staff and coaches are all outstanding.

resp.text: Thank you SO much for taking the time to share your experience with us Sabrenia! We look forward to being a part of your fitness routine for years to come. See you at the studio!

name: michele sudduth
text: Everyone is so welcoming and encouraging. It is a very comfortable and unimtimidating atmosphere and that is because of the attention the SA’s and coaches pay to each member. I have had a very good experience since joining in January.

resp.text: Thank you SO much for taking the time to share your experience with us Michele! We look forward to being a part of your fitness routine for years to come. See you at the studio!

name: Dreaz K
text: Wow! All I can say is awesome. If your nutrition is on point you will torch fat in this class for sure. Its was so awesome your constantly moving and its always something new to keep you challenged. If you love coaching/motivation through your workout and need to shred fat off this is the place to be.

name: Sylvie McDonald
text: Orange Theory is unlike any workout I have ever participated in! The coaches motivate you to push yourself to your goal(s) and the monitor acts as an additional, personal motivator to get into the green/orange/red zones. Other programs I have tried have implemented a cardio routine and minimal weights; more often body weight is used instead of free-weights. When I am in the weight room at OT, I know I am working hard to build muscle. I have never felt as good after an OT workout at any other fitness facility!

name: Alex Cashmer
text: OTF has 100% changed my life. I can't thank them enough for challenging me both physically and mentally to achieve more than I ever though possible

resp.text: Wow Alex, this is awesome! Thank you so much for choosing Orange Theory. We are so glad that you are enjoying it. Thank you for the review!

name: Jaime Maddox
text: OTF-Tuscaloosa has such a friendly welcoming atmosphere! The front desk staff are always there to greet you and answe your questions! The coaches keep everyone motivated and encouraged throughout the class and always make it fun to workout! The music is always bumpin and the facilities are very well kept and clean! I would recommend this place to anyone looking to become fitter than they’ve ever been!

name: Tamara Mozingo
text: I went for my free visit and i am hooked. The coach for that visit was awesome. The staff was all great. I was sore but i made it threw it. Cant wait to go back. So much fun in the group

name: Tina Winchester
text: I have enjoyed my Orange Theory experience.  The classes and trainers keep me motivated and challenged.  I currently feel better about myself than I ever have. I've never been a 'gym' person, so the class format is perfect for me, and it fuels my accountability.  I am thankful for my OTFit Fam!

resp.text: Hi Tina! We are glad we could make you a gym person! We are so happy you find the classes motivating and challenging!

name: Richard Ozols
text: I can’t say enough good things about this club! Cole is an awesome coach and Alise makes the whole experience great! Thank you both for making my visits so good. Can’t wait to get back in town. RTR!!!

resp.text: Hey Richard! We are so happy to know that you love the workouts! We cannot wait to see you again soon!

name: Katrina Pruitt
text: Orangetheroy  work in groups. Which helps motivate you and also the classes burn more and boost your metabolism

resp.text: Thanks for the review, Katrina! We're glad to hear you are enjoying your Orangetheory Fitness experience!

name: Travis Earnest
text: Its a great place to go workout the staff at the front desk is very friendly and the coaches are awesome they are very motivating and encouraging its the best fitness gym I ever tried and im so glad i joined

resp.text: Thanks for the review, Travis! We're glad to hear you are enjoying your experience and that our coaches and staff help keep you motivated.

name: Caroline Gaylard
text: I can always count on a great workout from OTF Tuscaloosa! I can go at anytime on any day because every coach is very enthusiastic about Orange Theory!

name: Lanora Bayer
text: Great place to get a good workout!

resp.text: Thank you SO much for taking the time to share your experience with us Lanora! Don't hesitate to let us know how we can get that 4 star to a 5 star! See you at the studio!

name: Rica Trone
text: Try OT, Tuscaloosa for yourself! You'll love it!

resp.text: Thank you SO much for taking the time to share your experience with us Rica! We look forward to being a part of your fitness routine for years to come. See you at the studio

name: CHRISTIANNE JOHNSON
text: OTF is the best workout class in the US. Each day the workouts are different and help me take on a new challenge. The OTF Tuscaloosa location is very nice. The service of the front desk staff is awesome and the facility is always clean.

name: Scott Collsen
text: Great staff and good coaches to get you through any workout

resp.text: Hi Scott! We are so glad you love the coaches and staff! Thanks for being apart of it all!

name: Brianna Williams
text: Scheduled a workout in my birthday to check out a class at this Orangetheory. I spoke with someone to make the appt. for the class but never got a confirmation email, follow-up call, etc. after the initial conversation and providing my CC info. I was told to arrive at 4:45. I arrived at 4:53. Now I understand that I was a bit late, I get that. However, the class did not start until 5:15 so you would think a place looking to make an impression and gain 2 new clients would at least try to make it work or offer an additional time or option for another class.  However, Alyse immediately let us know we were too late. I said ok and started walking away. My brother asked if there was anything we could do (i.e. giving her a chance to offer another option for a class or try to work with us in some way) Her reply was, “I’m sorry, class is starting really soon. There’s no way we can do everything we need you to do” So, we said ok and left. I called back to get the young lady’s name because I was so dissatisfied with my experience. I was baffled that I was flat out turned away without her taking any opportunity to reconcile the situation. When I spoke with her she mentioned my brother told her I wasn’t a resident earlier as to allude to the fact that perhaps maybe this was the reason she was less concerned with retaining us a potential client. To the contrary, I grew up in Tuscaloosa, have been living in Atlanta for the past 9 years and made the decision just this past week to pack up my life and move back because my mom is battling Pancreatic Cancer for the 3rd time in 4 years and not doing well at all. I probably would have signed up on the spot today because for the last year I’ve been a member at F45 in Atlanta and am very serious about transitioning to a gym based in Tuscaloosa that also has locations in Atlanta. This would be so I can workout when I commute back to Atlanta 2-3 days a week as I still hold my corporate job there but will work remotely here in Tuscaloosa for the most part. To say that I am extremely disappointed with the service is an understatement. I was truly hoping to have a great class, lock down a contract with a new gym that would fit my needs during this difficult and transitional time in my life, & then try to enjoy what was left of my birthday. Sadly, this was not the case. Very poor experience.

name: Adam Graham
text: Very friendly and welcoming staff!  Thank you!

resp.text: Adam, thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience with us! We're glad you had a 5-star experience at our studio!

name: Betty Key
text: Awesome workout facility!! Always a great experience! 🏋🏽‍♀️

name: Janeen Nufer
text: Trainer was friendly, helpful and informative!

resp.text: Thank you SO much for taking the time to share your experience with us Tray! We look forward to being a part of your fitness routine for years to come. See you at the studio!

name: Benjamin Tibbs
text: Really hated having to leave this place when I moved! Staff is wonderful!

name: Kristy Mizzell
text: Great class today! Thanks Katie!

name: EL Polo
text: Yeah

name: Michael Hollingsworth
text: Horrible

name: Lakeidra Mims
text: Reviving

name: Giselle Hollie
text: I’ve been a member at Forge Fitness since 2017! Since the first day I dropped in to check out what CrossFit was all about I’ve been impressed with the professionalism and enthusiasm displayed by the coaches and owners and the sense of community. The owners are awesome and I even got my tire changed by Rich one time! I now have a 13 month old and since he was 6 weeks he’s been going to the gym with me and everyone has been awesome around him! During the pandemic the gym took extra precautions to keep staff and athletes safe. Equipment was cleaned daily, athletes had designated spaces, and when everyone was at home the coaches took videos and sent us At Home WOd’s to keep everyone motivated and moving. I’ve grown so much as an athlete at Forge and I’m stronger and fitter than before I joined. I’m glad to be part of this special community!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much Giselle for your dedication to forge. We have always admired how consistent you have been in your training. Keep up the great work and we can’t wait to see what else you accomplish.

name: Emily Ledet
text: I joined Forge about a year ago as a brand new crossfitter. The coaches and more experienced athletes were more than willing to help me out every step of the way. I have never experienced such a supportive community! We truly are a family. I have grown so much as an athlete due to the top notch coaches and programming and I have met some of the best friends I have ever had here. I can't give this gym enough praise!!

resp.text: You are the best and we totally agree about you being our family.

name: Pat O'Brien
text: I have been going to Forge since 2017. It's great. The coaches are knowledgeable and the community is fun to be around. It's a family owned business and you can tell. Rich and Patti do a great job of keeping things fun but also professional. I have seen this gym grow over the last couple of years. We get new equipment all the time and the facility is Grade A. I definitely recommend Forge to anyone looking for a gym. I found it doing an internet search in 2017 when I moved to Birmingham and it's been a wonderful experience.

resp.text: Well thank you Pat O’BRIEN… for the awesome review!

name: Stacie Jackson
text: Forge is a wonderful place that we look forward to every day. The programming is amazing, the staff is kind, caring and encouraging. The facility is amazing. The members are supportive of every fitness level. I also love the recovery room! I would highly recommend Forge Fitness!

resp.text: Thank you Stacie and we deeply appreciate all the support!

name: Hannah Grant
text: If you are looking for a gym that will take you in as you are and motivate you, this is the place. I am going on 8 months with this bunch and its hands down the best choice I could have ever made! The second you walk in the door on day one you are greeted with friendly, helpful, smiling faces. You will quickly NOT be a stranger! The members and coaches of Forge do not care if it is your first day ever in a gym, first time trying Crossfit,  if you are a scaled or  RX+ athlete, new mother getting back on your fitness journey, whether you're in your 20's or 50's, you will always get cheered on, coached, and pushed the same the same every single day in the best, positive way. With some of the best programming around, the coaches make it easy to be a better you.  They meet you where you are based off your bodies needs whether that's doing 1 rep or 15. Your gym friends quickly become your gym FAMILY that you stay after class with, and share laughs and good talks with. It becomes the best part of your everyday routine. Forge Fitness also features recovery shop options, sauna, childcare, cardio room, basketball court, soccer field, and track. There's a place for all members of your family here. I have been a member to multiple gyms across Eastern-Central Alabama, and you won't find another  home gym like this!

resp.text: This is hands down one of the most thoughtful review we have ever received. We truly appreciate you and all the support!!

name: Armando Guell
text: Amazing facility with a lot of culture in it! Atmosphere is great even when there are no classes going. The owner is a top notch guy, very helpful and passionate with what he does. I will definitely come back here as a drop in!

resp.text: Thank you Armando for the awesome review and come see us any time!

name: Nick Quinn
text: Forge Fitness is more than a gym, it’s a family! This is the most professional well kept gym that I have ever been a part of! Their coaches are very knowledgeable and they have top of the line facilities. You cannot go wrong with this gym!

resp.text: Love you Nick and appreciate you and all the support of Forge!!

name: genamueller30
text: From the first day I walked through the doors the Forge family has treated me like I one of them. It is hard to find a more welcoming group of people. This gym is amazing.

resp.text: You are the best Gena and we appreciate you so much!

name: Amanda Wineman
text: Haven’t been active since high school sports and this place is so accepting and excited to help you. Great supportive community

resp.text: Thank you for the support and the great review!!

name: Appachu Palecanda
text: Great gym and people. Amazing facility and super cool and knowledgable coaches.

resp.text: Thank you App!!

name: Harris Reynolds
text: Holt is such a great coach. Rich is ok too! 😀

resp.text: Love the review and thank you!!

name: Pablo Perea
text: Great box, great community, great coaches. I couldn’t be happier with my gym selection!

resp.text: Thank you Pablo for the awesome review!

name: Win Warren
text: The coaches, the community, the workouts. It's all around the best gym in Birmingham!

resp.text: Thank you for the awesome review and we appreciate you and all the support!

name: ryan peardon
text: Amazing facilities. Amazing coaches. Amazing owners. I’ve been a member for going on 5 months and this place is all around amazing, from the friendly, welcoming, encouraging atmosphere, to the equipment and programming, and everything in between. I’m always glad I joined the Forge family!

resp.text: Thank you Ryan for the awesome review and we appreciate you choosing to being apart of our Forge family.

name: anvesh rocks
text: Great gym with friendly atmosphere.

resp.text: Thank you!!

name: Aditya Anchan

resp.text: Thank you Aditya for the support!!

name: Sophia Hua
text: Was visiting Birmingham from Canada for the weekend and wanted to workout. I'm so glad I got a chance to workout here, great sweaty cardio session! Everyone was super friendly and the gym was very clean. Hope to see you guys again in the future!

resp.text: Thank you Sophia for the 5 star review. How was the Alabama game?

name: Josh Holden
text: Needed to use some equipment to get ready for Comp and they were happy to help. Did wod while I was there and really enjoyed it. Nice people, quality instruction and programming and great environment.

resp.text: Thank you Josh for the review and please come by anytime. Stay strong and stay healthy and good luck with the Comp!

name: TJ Gonser
text: Great culture great equipment great family run business.

resp.text: Thank you

name: Thomas Kopec
text:
I joined last summer (2018) and haven’t been able to be as regular as I would like- but even after not seeing me for a very long time the owner (Rich) recognizes me and stopped what he was doing to have a conversation with me to catch up. Those kinds of experiences really make you feel like you are pet of a family.

The coaches have all been wonderful, as well! They are very personable and interested in your individual fitness goals. They have been helpful with technique and suggesting scale (alternate) exercises when necessary also.

Finally, the other members have all been very welcoming and friendly, which again helps foster an inviting atmosphere.

The facilities are fantastic (they have showers so you can get back to work after a class), and I love being a part of Forge Fitness! No complaints! Come try it out! They let me attend a few classes before deciding if it was a fit for me or not, so come try for yourself!

resp.text: Wow, what an awesome review. It is so good to see you in the gym and we truly appreciate the review. We look forward to helping you meet your goals.

name: Jon Sheets
text: The environment was incredible. The people were really friendly and the staff were so helpful! Definitely going to revisit soon!

resp.text: That’s so much and appreciate the awesome review. Look forward to seeing you again.

name: Shree Bostick
text: Definitely one of the best gyms in the Birmingham area!! I couldn't have pick a better place to call my new crossfit home after moving to Birmingham!! Great atmosphere, people, coaches and owners!! To anyone looking for a great facility to train or get a good workout in at definitely choose Forge Fitness!!!

resp.text: Thank you for the awesome review!

name: Chase Glasgow
text: Just finished up my Basics 101 classes with Paula and it was a blast! Forge is the most welcoming gym I've been a part of. The facility is amazing, spacious, and has everything you could possibly want!

resp.text: Thank you for the review and we love having you in the gym!

name: Mela Donoso
text:
Being new to Alabama and not knowing a lot of people was a bit hard, but since starting at Forge I’ve met some awesome people who have made Birmingham feel like home now!
Even my kids love coming along with me, owners are awesome and so are the coaches and all members!
Truly a family/community feel to this gym!

resp.text: Thank you Mela for the awesome review and we are so glad you are enjoying it! It’s been a pleasure getting to know you and your family. #forgefam

name: Holly Cross
text: I moved to Alabama alone and not knowing anyone. I had never done CrossFit in my life but these people took me under their wing immediately. My home away from home, truly blessed. Highly recommend!

resp.text: Holly, I’m glad you feel that way but we believe anyone that is apart of Forge is family. We are lucky to have you and Boomer as part of the family.

name: Chris
text: Was in town visiting family and needed a place to get in a workout. Rich, quickly responded to my inquiry online and openly invited me to the gym. They had a large variety of equipment for a good functional fitness workout, it was clean and in good shape. The staff was very friendly, as well as all the members. I will definitely visit Forge Fitness every time I come back in town.

resp.text: Thanks for the review Chris and we look forward to seeing you again!

name: John Christopherson
text: Couldn't say enough good things about Forge! The coaches are awesome and always trying to help you improve. The gym is huge, has great equipment and alway kept clean. The showers and sauna are a plus. And most importantly the members are very supportive!

resp.text: Thank you John for the Awesome review and we are so blessed to have members like yourself!

name: Hobie Cole
text: Great environment and the staff are very helpful. Great place to workout. Highly recommend.

name: Caroline Jenkins
text: Forge is an extremely welcoming gym with great crosssfit programming. The coaches are wonderful!

resp.text: Thank you for supporting us and being apart of our community. We couldn’t do it without the love and support of people like you.

name: Anne True
text:
Best gym experience in town. Great coaches and fun workouts. Come to get in shape, stay for the community. Getting to Forge after work is the highlight of my day.

Thanks for doing what you do!

resp.text: Thank you True! We appreciate you so much and it’s been awesome to watch you develop into such a great athlete.

name: Leigha McLendon
text:
Family owned and operated, and they make you feel like part of the family.
For me, a great deal of the attraction to CrossFit is the sence community, and none of the other CrossFit boxes I've been to have as great of a community feel as Forge does.
The coaches care, are knowledgeable, and always have advise and recommendations on how to scale any movement.

resp.text: Leigha, thank you for the warm review and kind words. We are so glad that you have enjoyed forge and we appreciate the support over the years.

name: Libby Loveless
text: Family oriented gym with the kindest people around. Talented, qualified, and intelligent coaches and administrators who support you and your fitness goals! This is a unique Crossfit gym.

name: Aaron Wolff
text: Best CrossFit gym in Alabama!

resp.text: Thank you Aaron for the review and the support!

name: John Gonser
text: Cleanest CrossFit facility I've ever dropped in. Great coaching and a very large gym.

resp.text: Thank you for the review

name: Haleigh Chastain
text: Forge is more than just a gym. It is a community where people come together to workout while forming friendships. I joined Forge 3 years ago when I moved to Birmingham and did not know anyone, now most of my best friends are from the gym. If you are looking for a new gym, I cannot recommend this place enough!

resp.text: You are the best Haleigh and we truly appreciate all your help and support of the years.

name: Grant Scoble
text: Forge Fitness did an excellent job of getting me back in the game. I also was able to learn best practices for recovery by having their recovery center available with my membership. You feel apart of a family as soon as you walk in.

resp.text: Thank you Grant for all the support and encouragement.

name: Kyle Schwab
text: Huge, friendly, affordable, and clean facility.  I highly recommend dropping in for a class and seeing this place.

resp.text: Thank you Kyle and we appreciate all the support!

name: Katie Lucas
text: Forge Fitness is definitely the gym to go to in the Vestavia Hills area. The owners, Patti and Rich, are so personable and friendly. They are always working to help you attain your fitness goals with a refreshing and positive attitude. Great environment, staff, and facilities.

resp.text: We truly appreciate the review and your support!

name: Michael Gonser
text: Extremely friendly staff, I love how big and spacious the place is, soccer field is amazing!

resp.text: Thank you for the review and come see us in Birmingham the next time you are in town.

name: Suzie Spooner
text: Forge is not just a gym, it's a community. A community of athletes with different skill levels. A community where athletes encourage each other to give 100% no matter where you are in your training. Forge offers coaches who are knowledgeable about each movement and who want to help each individual attain the goals they have set for themselves. Forge is a community of  friends. I wouldn't go anywhere else!!

resp.text: You are the best! Thank you for the review and being apart of our community.

name: Lindsay Sport
text: I have been involved in many Crossfit gyms throughout my years in fitness. The quad facility, the forge Crossfit community, and the equipment is the best around!  From the moment I stepped foot in forge I felt nothing but welcomed. If you want to come learn from some of the best at their trade and train in nice, clean, and welcoming environment- then you have found the place.

resp.text: That you Lindsay for all the support and it wouldn’t be Forge with out people like you.

name: Owen Stayner/ThisWorkplace360
text: Excellent space and outside area. This is good way to get to know people while working out.  Great sense of community!

resp.text: Thank you Owen for the support!

name: Alanna Smith
text: The facilities are top notch and you'll be hard pressed to find a more warm and welcoming community!

resp.text: Thank you Alanna and we appreciate all the support!

name: Aaron Scroggins
text: I have been going to Forge for many years, so I obviously enjoy it! I’m in sales and travel for work. I get to go into many CrossFit gyms and none of them compare to the facility we have at the Quad. If you are in town visiting or looking for a change please come and drop in for a WOD.

resp.text: Thank you Aaron for the review and we love having you as part of the Forge community.

name: Leslie Parrish
text: I went to this gym for over a year, and I'm telling you that there's no better gym in Birmingham. The owners, Rich and Chris, along with all of the other coaches, have a firm commitment to doing things the right and most safe way possible. I left this gym in the best shape of my life and with some of the best friends a person could have. So not only will you get a great workout, you'll also make a ton of great friends. I've since relocated to Tuscaloosa, but try to make it back to Forge as much as possible!

name: Pilar Rodriguez
text: Ive been to many Crossfit gyms before. The level of cleanliness and the resources this gym has is incredible. The staff and members are some of the finest people I have ever met!

resp.text: Thank you Pilar for the review. We appreciate all the support.

name: Jim Gonser
text: Dropping in from Kansas one of the greatest places and the nicest people amazing facility

resp.text: Thank you sir for the awesome review.

name: Shandi White
text:
Most positive gym experience I've ever had!  Forge has a created a family atmosphere with the motivation of your favorite high school coach combined with friendliness of your favorite church.

They care about your progress, and they notice when you're not there.  They're not just interested in your membership, they're interested in your success!

Whether you're new to CrossFit or a regular competitive pro looking for a more positive gym experience, Forge in Vestavia is the perfect fit.

resp.text: Thank you Shandi for the awesome review. Your such a great person and we appreciate your support inside the gym and out.

name: ghk142000
text: Just began working out here 3 weeks ago. Very welcoming and fun atmosphere with a lot of great people. Rich and the rest of trainers have been nothing but helpful. Makes working out fun again.

resp.text: Thank you for the awesome review! I can't wait to see what all you accomplish. Keep up the hard work!

name: ly walthall
text: Really great gym. This is a great CrossFit gym. I've been to several and this one is the best. Great floor plan, tons of equipment so you don't have to wait around for someone to finish to do your WOD. The trainer's are fantastic, they will push you to do your absolute best. Not to mention there are several amenities and concessions; showers, energy drinks, recovery drinks, coffee machine, protein supplements and these killer peanut butter balls that are to die for. If your looking for a place to work out that will actually push you and and has a great community, this is it.

resp.text: Thank you for the awesome feedback! You didn't forgot one detail. You are the best.

name: Dan Odle
text: Great gym. Great coaches. Great people. While the workouts are solid and will kick your tail (in a good way), it's the community that makes the difference. We literally build our schedule around our workouts and are thankful for our Forge family.

resp.text: Thank you Dan for the awesome review. You and Stephanie have truly brought so much energy to our community. Forge wouldn't be the same without you both.

name: Parker Smith
text: I've been attending Forge for three years and there isn't a better gym in Birmingham! The attentiveness of the staff and the welcoming of its members is second to none! I give all the credit to them for helping me be in the best shape of my life.

resp.text: We love you Parker and you have accomplished so much in 3 years. Keep up the awesome work and let's see what you do over the next 3 years. Thank you for the great review!

name: Chase Meadows
text: Forge is the only Crossfit gym that I've been to, and it has so far been quite a positive experience. Proper technique is emphasized which has helped me stay injury free and improve my overall flexibility. I joined with the hope of regaining some of my previous quickness so that I could perform better in tennis and flag football, and it has certainly helped in that regard... You'll obviously only get out what you put into it, but all of the coaches are very knowledgeable and more than happy to discuss proper form, nutrition, supplements, etc. with you as well as demonstrate the correct technique of the different lifts when asked.

resp.text: Thank you Chase for the awesome review. We truly enjoy having you as a solid member of Forge.

name: Dalton Roberts
text: Friendly place where the people you work out with become your bestfriends. Have felt at home since the first day I walked in. Very encouraging people at Forge to help you be your best self. Classes all day to benefit your availability. Saturday morning Olympic lifting class and Partner WOD. Let Forge be the best part of your day.

resp.text: You are the best Dalton and people like you are the reason while people keep coming back.

name: Jacob W
text: Incredible space with some awesome members, coaches and owners. One workout and you feel like a part of the family!

resp.text: Thank you Jacob for the review and Yes you are part of the fam. Come back anytime and workout with us.

name: Brandon Simmons
text: I just started traveling to Birmingham for business and wanted to find a place in which to work out while I was in town.  I came across Forge Fitness on Google and messaged them to set up a meeting when I got in town.  I will be going here for the next few months while I am in town.  The trainers are knowledgeable, outgoing, and great motivators.  The place is incredibly clean and the equipment brand new.  Great owners and great members.

resp.text: We miss you Brandon and we appreciate all the support!

name: Jack Eisenhut
text:
Great CrossFit experience!  Chris Wade is a co-owner and coach at this gym.  It was obvious that he is an experienced coach with a passion for what he is doing.

They filled the entire hour giving the expected value to each member.  The class started with a group warm-up, moved to strength component, then the workout of the day and finally a nice stretch/cool down.

Finally, I travel for work and drop into many CrossFit gyms around the country.  If you live in Birmingham area, this is a gym you have to look at.

resp.text: Thank you the awesome feedback and we look forward to seeing you again!👊🏽💪💪

name: Lesley Hendon
text: I just started in June of this year with the hopes of loosing the remainder of my baby weight! Chris and Rich are amazing and have made getting back in to shape something I actually enjoy! I have pushed myself so much further than I ever did in a conventional gym and have seen great results. They explain everything in great detail and coach you closely so you learn the correct way of doing things. I was super intimidated of the whole "crossfit" idea but Forge has changed that perception and made it something I truly enjoy!

resp.text: Thank you for your support Lesley!

name: Haleigh Robinson
text: Great gym with awesome members and coaches. I originally chose Forge because of location, but now there's not another gym in Birmingham I'd ever go to! I've accomplished so much more than I ever thought possible with the help of the Forge coaches.

resp.text: Thank you Haleigh for the awesome review and we love having you as part of the Forge family.

name: Jason Maeder
text: Great gym, great people.  Dropped in for a class while traveling and had a great workout.  Rich and Conrad made us feel right at home.  I'll be back next time we're in town.

resp.text: Thank you for the great feedback!

name: derek schiefer
text:
Great gym!!! Awesome equipment all well maintained. Great lockers and restrooms. We even brought our kids with us and there is a room for them to hang out.

Thanks for the WOD.

resp.text: We are so glad you enjoyed Forge. Thank you for the feedback and we look forward to seeing you again.

name: ryan barkley
text: I've dropped into Boxes all over Alabama, Florida, and Louisiana and these guys might be the friendliest. Really enjoyed the WOD. Great environment to train. Owner is a class act.

resp.text: Hey Ryan!! Thank you for such a great review! We loved having you and you crushed the WOD. Hope you enjoy your volleyball tournament! Come back any time!

name: Tyler Thompson
text: Great CrossFit experience! Great people and great atmosphere. The coaches really know their stuff and are very helpful. Highly recommend this place!

resp.text: Great review and we truly appreciate your energy at Forge. However, we need a Tyler bicep region for every member.

name: Jessica Lovel
text: Great atmosphere, great owners and coaches! My day isn’t complete until I’ve been to the gym!

resp.text: We love you Jess and thank you for the review!

name: Jason Jaegers
text: Forge is a great place to work out. Not only is the facility clean and convenient but the staff is friendly and professional. The camaraderie between the members is as goods as it gets.

resp.text: Thank you for the awesome feedback! Come see us soon.

name: Scotty Bostick
text: Awesome experience! Would rate 6 stars

resp.text: Thank you brother!

name: Tyler Landolt
text: Everyone involved in this gym is amazing! The coaches, the members and the owner all come together to make one amazing community.

resp.text: You are awesome Tyler. Thank you for the review.

name: Jake C.
text: I've been coming to this gym for several years now.  Rich and the coaches at the gym are very enthusiastic and have always been incredibly attentive to my needs.  Caleb and Conrad always take the time to pay extra attention to beginners or people that need additional instruction and always do a great job leading class and keeping things fun.  The gym community is very welcoming to beginners and visitors and the atmosphere is very family friendly.  The gym itself is clean, spacious and well-organized.  I was spoiled by the fact that it had Heat when I dropped into a few other gyms last winter and nearly froze to death.  If you are looking for a superb Crossfit gym to join or just visit while in town, Forge is a solid place to do tough workouts with great people.

resp.text: Thank you so much Jake for being such a valuable asset to Forge. It's been impressive watching you meet your Fitness goals since starting CrossFit. You have done a great job and we look forward to watching you dominate the CrossFit Open in 2017.

name: Regan Claire Hibbs
text: Forge has such a strong sense of community and the new facility is so functional!

resp.text: Thanks for the review. Keep them coming.

name: Stephanie Odle
text: Great community. Great coaching. Great workouts. Love this Crossfit  family. I came to Forge wanting to improve and ramp up my training. Forge has helped me do that. If you're looking for a Crossfit community, you'll find it here.

resp.text: Thank you Stephanie for the awesome review and we really love having you as part of the Forge family.

name: Alphonso Lewis
text: Amazing workouts with a collection of competitive individuals. You could call everybody there one big competitive and  fit family

resp.text: Thank you Alphonso and we love your energy in the gym. The morning crew is looking forward to seeing you at 5:30am.

name: Justin Lobdell
text: Great facility with exceptional trainers that work one-on-one with you to secure your health/safety as well as push you to enhance your fitness skills/level!

resp.text: Thank you so much Justin for the awesome review. We appreciate you supporting Forge Fitness!

name: Brad Barber
text: Big box and a very friendly welcome when I dropped in. I’d definitely recommend Forge!

resp.text: Thank you Brad for dropping in and please come see us again.

name: Sarah Lawson
text: Great space with clean equipment and helpful, friendly staff. Plenty of parking. I'm not a crossfitter myself but I visited with a friend and was impressed by Forge and the people here!

resp.text: Thank you for the awesome review!

name: Bradley Davidson
text: Great experience for a great value. Caleb Dodd is a great coach and motivator. Class times and locations are perfect for anyone, espcially for those who live or work over the mountain.

resp.text: Thank you BRADLEY for the feedback. We look forward to seeing back in the gym this week.

name: Rodney Overstreet
text: I visited this box last Sat for their inaugural WOD. It was really tough and fun. Full disclosure: Rich & Chris are friends of mine. However, they are also enthusiastic, friendly, & knowledgable coaches. The space is large and well designed. I can recommend this box without reservation.

resp.text: Thank you Rodney for all the support!

name: Matt Mogle
text: Great gym with a great community. I've been to other Crossfit gyms around the World and this one is special. It's an incredibly encouraging environment and a wonderful place to watch people continue to get better and excel every day. Really cool to see your seasoned Crossfit veterans working out right next to beginners and encouraging one another throughout.

name: Deborah Pennino
text: Great close-knitted gym with experienced and friendly staff.  It is very clean and has excellent equipment for workouts.

resp.text: Thank you for the AWESOME review!

name: Clarisse Jackson
text: I've never crossFit before and after searching for different gyms, I couldn't be happier to have chosen Forge. The atmosphere, the people and best of all the owners Chris and Rich show true commitment to their members and are able to push you to your limits in the safest way possible. I've tried different classes and exercises but was never constant because I will get bored, well let me tell you; I haven't gotten bored since I started going to Forge, it has been 9 months so far and I don't want to stop. I look forward to my classes and to the people that I've met at the gym. Plus is clean, has A/C and they put great music. So if you are looking into CrossFit in this area, this is the place to be!!!

resp.text: You are awesome and we truly appreciate your support!

name: Stacey Hood
text: Great gym, been to several others, but this place is top level and professional from the moment you walk in. It's everything that anyone could ever want in a CrossFit gym.

resp.text: Thank you for the feedback and we appreciate the support!

name: Brooks Gant
text: Cannot say enough good things about Forge Fitness in Vestavia! Coming from a cycling and running background, I was burnt out and looking for something new and challenging. After speaking with several crossfit gyms in the area, something just felt "right" about Forge and so I joined the 101 class. 9 months later I am probably in the best overall shape I have ever been in! From all the coaches who truly care about their athletes, to the positive and encouraging atmosphere, as well as all the great people I have met, if you have ever thought about giving crossfit a try, I highly recommend checking out Forge Fitness.

resp.text: Wow Brooks, thank you for the awesome review and we truly love having you as a solid member of the Forge Family. Keep up the great work!

name: Sharon A. Moskowitz
text: CrossFit Shades / Forge Fitness is awesome.  I travel to the Birmingham area for work once a month and was looking for a gym/box that has hours on Sunday.  I had heard some not-so-great things about a few boxes but I hadn't heard of Forge Fitness/ CF Shades.  Not only is CF Shades the only place with Sunday hours, but they were above and beyond wonderfully welcoming when I showed up unannounced during their open gym period.  Upon first glance, the gym was very clean, which is not very common among CrossFit and Crossfit-inspired facilities.  The owner, Rich, jumped up from a staff meeting and gave me a tour and after learning of my CF history, invited me to use any and all of their space as well as invited me back through my duration of stay while in town.  They have an awesome workout space out back with a platform, squat racks and a rig and the running course around the building is super safe.  I also met coaches Caleb, Josh and Rebecca who were all very accommodating and friendly.  When I returned for a class, Rebecca coached and I really appreciated her attentiveness.  I'm a CrossFit coach in Denver and because I move relatively well, I tend to get left alone - but I love being coached when I drop into new places and Rebecca was great.  I HIGHLY RECOMMEND travelers and locals to visit.  If you're a member somewhere else in Hometown or Birmingham, switch now.   I'll be back there for sure when I'm in town next.

resp.text: Hey Sharon, Thank you very much for this amazing review. This has to be the best review anyone could ever receive. We truly appreciate what you are doing and we look forward to seeing you next time you are back in the area.

name: Justin Missanelli
text: Friendly environment for fitness.  Competitive for those serious workout fiends. Don't let the afternoon classes intimidate you though, the people are friendly if you just talk to them.

name: Clay Conner
text: Great gym, great people and great results! Highly recommended.

resp.text: You left out great programming and great workouts. We love you Clay and we appreciate everything you do for Forge.

resp.text: Thank you for the awesome feedback!
