resp.text: Thank you for the review. It's been awesome training with you for the last 5 years. Also, it's awesome seeing your passion for fitness and life. Thank you for being apart of the Forge family.

name: Crystal Swann
text: The trainers here are absolutely amazing!  They are constantly cheering you on and always make time for that one on one no matter how large the class is.  If your form is not up to par, they are there to help you correct it. The people that come here are driven and very supportive as well.  It definitely starts my day off right!  And the results???!!!  Absolutely worth it!  Other workout regimens in the past sometimes left me bored or it became too “easy”,  to say the least.  This is always different and challenging each time!  Love being part of this tribe!  #tribe150

name: Kevin Marchant
text:
I enjoy and appreciate all my coaches at ITF150. I feel each one has our best interest in mind and want to help us achieve and reach new goals in our overall fitness.

The workouts are already planned for us, so you’re not wasting time deciding what should I do today. Even thought the workouts are planned, all can be scaled to match the level of each individual.

The ITF150 members are a terrific group that encourage and support one another. Friendships are developed and grown in and outside of the gym walls.

resp.text: Having planned workouts is so nice and makes it easy to keep the consistency. We are so happy to see you in our tribe, Kevin! Keep up the hard work.

name: Laurie Smith
text: I have been very pleased with Iron Tribe. The coaches are beyond fantastic. I have seen great results!

resp.text: That's so great to hear! Thank you for your 5 star review.

name: Laurie Morton
text: Fantastic coaches!!!! They are encouraging, and help no matter what goal or level you are at. Best experience I had at a gym.

resp.text: Laurie, we are so pleased to hear that you had a great experience at our gym! Our coaches are the best!! Thanks for being a part of our tribe!

name: Areli Tarango
text: I can honestly say that this is the best gym out there ! The team is great always looking out for you working with where you are fitness why! Always positive attitudes all around ! I feel In love with this place I even brought along my husband ! A couple who works out together stay together ! 💪

resp.text:
Areli! We're glad you've found a home at Iron Tribe! We're glad to have you with us.

Thanks for your review!

name: Matt Register
text: Irontribe and their coaches not only care about seeing you achieve your goals, they also care about you as an individual. The coaches take time to get to know the people that attend classes, work with you to make sure you are doing the movements correctly and genuinely want to see you succeed. Irontribe creates an environment where anyone, of any fitness level, can feel comfortable coming in daily to improve their fitness.

resp.text: Hi Matt! Thanks for your review. We're glad to have you at the Tribe!

name: Adam Lamb
text: Best gym I have ever set foot in. Coaches are the best  are the best quality you can find!

resp.text: Thanks for your review Adam! We always try to ensure our coaches are top notch to help our members see their goals come to fruition.

name: Mary Blackwell
text: I joined ITF about two years ago with the 6 week challenge.  It has been the best decision I have made.  The staff is super friendly and encouraging.  Each coach is so patient and dedicated to improving our skill set and overall health.  ITF recently added the Prime class and all I can say is it well worth it.  I started Prime about 2 weeks ago and I LOVE it!! Customized workouts and nutrition plans, individual attention and great motivation to improve the areas YOU want to improve.  I love my ITF family and friends!  Thank you ITF!!

name: Living doll Jewels
text: Bait and switch advertising. Offer is for free but it ends up costing 499.00 That's what it costs to invest in yourself

name: Clay Rivenbark
text: Love this place. Luke and Tori are the best. Take their 6 week challenge! Itll change your whole outlook on life.

name: Thomas Picardy
text: Iron Tribe has been one of the best decisions I have ever made and has changed my life. The coaching, the fellow athletes, the facilities are second to none. It has been amazing to see what I have accomplished in just under a year. A healthy and fit body is only the beginning. The effects of this program ripple through every part of my life, as a husband, a dad, an employee, everything. I am seeing at almost 40 years old what I should have been at 20. It is worth every dollar, every minute, ever ounce of effort.

name: Jenna Jenks
text:
There's a lot of good things to say about Iron Tribe, but what I've taken away most was the welcoming atmosphere.

I entered the six week challenge and did not meet my goal. I was close, but even though I failed, I was offered to apply the money I put in towards a membership... The gym even has given me a rain check to apply it in March after I get my tax return, so it's more affordable for me. (so not really a loss when all is said and done!)

The people (coaches and members) I met have been nothing but encouraging. The workouts were well designed to keep you moving to accomplish in less than 30 minutes what many other classes, at other gyms I've attended, it has taken an hour to achieve (which is nice when you are low on time in your day!)

I have a knee injury, and in previous gyms, my disability has made me feel inadequate or ashamed that I could not do what the rest of the class was doing. The coaches knew about my injury (and no matter what class I attended (morning or afternoon) with any coach, they were already well informed of my needs without the embarrassment of having to say as much at every new encounter. They were discreet and quick to tell me alternate exercises I could do, so I didn't feel as if I was the odd man out waiting to be assigned something different or taking away from the class by holding up the rest of the members, so that a coach could assist me.)

Members are at all different fitness levels, and the coaches are very attentive to every one's individual needs, and they are watching you and your progress making sure that you are on point doing the exercises CORRECTLY! (which as long as I've been working out, I hadn't realized how many simple movements I was doing incorrectly!)

I could write a book on all the good experiences I have had just in my six weeks of attending, but I will wrap it up here with a final statement that I highly recommend this gym. It's changed my outlook about what I need for my own fitness journey, and I look forward to returning in March! I actually feel incredibly sad that I have to wait that long to return to my new fit fam!

Special thanks to Matt and Zack for your tireless tutelage and positive attitude/feedback (I know I was all over the place lost on too many occasions! 😂) And thanks to all the members who were so very welcoming to me, I'm truly grateful and am already missing you!

Keep at it! 3,2,1 TRIBE!

name: Sandra Roberts
text:
lifter. Would recommend TCG to anyone.
This gym is great with lots of new equipment. The staff is courteous knowledgeable and very professional.

name: Angie Dunham
text: Love this place! High energy and amaxing staff! Just finished my 6 week challenge! 1 week into it I injured my back. (Doing laundry! ) The coaches did a wonderful job working with me in order to modify my workouts. I am so thankful for all I have learned from them over the last 6 weeks. Very impressed with the staff and happy to have made some new friends! I highly recommend them!

name: Jeremy Hatley
text: These guys are awesome! Fun gym with a knowledgeable staff and great workouts

name: Doug Ferrell
text: 2 years ago I was looking for a fitness program.  This is an experience that you cannot imagine just driving by or reading a post.  This is a family of people with a shared goal.  This is the best investment I have ever made, for myself.  Every morning at ITF we accomplish more than most people do in an entire day.  With the support of this community and exceptional coaches at our side we push ourselves to be better than yesterday or last week.  I have exceeded every goal or expectation that I imagined during the 101 course.

name: Aaron Spigner
text: To say that this place is just a gym would be a lie and an  understatement. More than anything this place is a group of individuals who together form a family. They push and encourage each other to make one another stronger. No one looks down on anyone but rather looks up to each other as they push to be better. I would not be where I am today were it not for this group of athletes and coaches. Thank you Iron Tribe 150! You impact more lives than you know.

name: Tracey Ponder
text: This is by far the best exercise program I've ever participated in......after 6 months of contemplating a membership, in April 2013, I finally dismissed all of the naysayers (you know the type, those folks who had never really tried it, but, had "just heard.......") and I started my first 101 classes.  I was overweight, in terrible shape, and in tremendous pain due to back problems.    Today I am much lighter, stronger, (happier), and my back pain as diminished substantially, and to sweeten the deal,  I have become friends with a great group of folks!  I'm 52 years old and I am in the best shape of my life thanks to Iron Tribe Fitness.  I encourage you to try it.....I promise you'll love it too!

name: Jennifer Kersh
text: Love their push classes, everyone is very friendly the workouts are challenging, would have been 5 stars but class times are limited. Although you do have access to all locations so that's a plus!

name: Stephen Hall
text: If you are reading this you probably have heard something about iron tribe and you're curious.  I heard some negative things before I joined like - "you will get injured, your joints won't last on those crazy crossfit workouts, they are too expensive, iron tribe is snobby overpriced crossfit"  Well - My 3 1/2 month experience has been worth every penny. I'm not where I want to be physically but I am well on my way thanks to these fine people. They are not cheap - but the value and the knowledge you learn is worth it.  They are crazy hard workouts that are intense and sometimes you want to cry and curl into the fetal position - but everyone does the workouts together and finishes every time and it gets easier.....a little. They scale the workouts to prevent injuries - I was really worried about my knees and they work with you so you don't injure yourself. They know their stuff and want to see you make progress not hurt yourself.  They aren't snobby and neither are the people that workout here - just normal friendly people. They are passionate about fitness not just some other gym you pay your monthly dues and get nothing in return. I was 330 pounds 3 1/2 months ago. Ive lost 45 pounds and feel awesome!  I used to pay another gym 25/month and never went for 2 years. I was paying a Fat tax for 2 years - but not anymore! Give them a try - it's worth it!

name: Nilam Patel
text: I would drive by IronTribe 150 and often wonder what went on there. I would see a large open space, not my perception of a typical gym (filled with equipment).  This open space has changed my life. The coaches are wonderful and very attentive to individual needs and capabilities. If you feel your workouts are not challenging and changing your life, ITF 150 will do it for you!

name: Uma Maheswar Yeruva
text: Good Coaches with Decent equipment. Always motivating environment.

name: Timothy Johnson
text: Join this place ASAP! Will change your life

name: Brad Mintun
text: When I first was considering joining IronTribe, I was a bit skeptical.  The coaches and the community won me over.  They are both great and encouraging.  ITF150 has a great community, the gym is clean, the equipment is all in good condition, and the workouts are fun and challenging whether you are just starting or an expert focused on competitions.

name: Josh Firth
text: Worked out at a lot of gyms over the years, including time at several other CrossFit facilities or similar programming.  ITF 150 is hands down the best.  Great coaches who are knowledgeable and personal, and an awesome group of athletes.  It's real community, not just folks you happen to see regularly, but people you want to talk to, get to know, and who push each other to their limits and to be their best.

name: heather dawkins
text: I have completed the iron tribe 6 week challenge. Overall the program itself is really good, and the coaches were wonderful.  I did get excellent results during this time in weightloss, body fat percentage reduction and high lean muscle.  Unfortunately I will not be continuing an affiliation with ITF due to the misrepresentation of this program. I was sold that the 98% of challengers meet their goal, the meal plans are customized and that if for some reason you don't meet your goal you could apply to future classes. What I found is that ITF monthly fees are extremely high even with the so called Challenger discount, There seem to be very few challengers that actually meet the goal and the customized meal plan is merely based on starting weight and goal of weight loss, body fat percentage or muscle gain. There is no consideration of gender or age, which can be a huge factor in weight loss. The only offer is to apply your hefty deposit towards a minimally discounted 12 month commitment, so I am parting ways with ITF. Due to the way I feel they misrepresented this program.  I will be seeking a membership elsewhere, and will never do business with them in the future. I always tell my children nothing is free, and this was a prime example of that.

name: Sacha Skinner
text: I love this place, the coaches and the community! The best thing I have ever done for myself.

name: DMS Color
text: If you are willing to make a commitment - the team at ITF 150 is willing to commit themselves to you. I could not ask for a better group of coaches that truly are dedicated to helping you improve your form, physique, nutrition, and life.

name: Tyler Thompson
text: Absolutely love this place! Great coaches and awesome athletes.

name: Sheila G.
text: I've been a member of Irontribe for a year and a month. I find it the most difficult, challenging, and fun workout I've done in my life.  I'm still on a learning curve, but I can say that I've also made progress!  Before I signed on, I was very worried about re-injuring my rotator cuff.  I let them know about my past injury, Zech and Jon showed me ways to modify my workouts.  As my shoulder got stronger, I've not needed some of the modifications and according to my chiropractor and orthopedic doctor,  my shoulder has fully healed.  I hate weights...really.  But I'm now swinging the 35 pound kettle ball.   The biggest weight I had lifted prior to Irontribe was a 15 pound dumb bell for bicep curls or deadlifts.  With these guys, I've done a 2 max rep 165 deadlift, and I'm learning to do beginner handstand pull ups!  The group environment is fun.  They keep me going.  We cheer each other on.  I find that when you do something difficult, share a difficult experience, like a WOD lol,  we feel connected to the each other and we want to see one another succeed.  We get excited when someone reaches a PR or finishes a tough workout. I'm a school teacher, so I was initially concerned with the cost.  I've found the monetary, time, and physical investment to be worth it. The coaches are the best, they make me smile because they challenge me, they challenge me to put on more weight or work with me on my nutrition and check up my attendance and progress.  Zechariah and Jon, Jen, Brandon, and Joe really care and they enjoy what they do.  They're not only about the paycheck, they're about making better athletes and building a community.  I don't always "enjoy" the workouts.  But I enjoy and love this community.  We build relationships and athletes here.  Five words I associate with Irontribe: Fun, Challenging, Difficult, Progress, Accomplished!

name: Solmi
text: The best..a HUGE AND INSPIRING  FAMILY!

name: Amparo G. Calmaestra
text: Great place and staff!!! #6weeksITF

name: kori rooney
text: Love the 6 week challenge

name: Jay Brothers
text: Great coaches, challenging workouts, and awesome atmosphere.

name: Dan P
text: Life changing.

name: Joseph Felix
text: Outstanding staff

name: Laura Morales
text: Amazing place

name: James
text:
Great gym, so glad I found this place. They have specialty barbells and a monolift, which were the big things I was after.

They also have some good strongman equipment, such as a loadable log, circus dumbbell, and axle bar.

The equipment is in good condition and the facility is always clean.

name: Manned Crown2
text: Other than it being pretty overpriced for two people at the least, it's an AMAZING gym and I go there everyday!! Worth it!

name: Chris Douglas
text:
I was a member of this gym for 3 years, and only gave up my membership because I moved.  It's a wonderful space to lift in, has a great atmosphere, and is very affordable.  The owner, Charlie, is knowledgeable, friendly, and professional.  The other lifters are supportive and welcoming.  I always had a spotter when I needed one. Some of the machines aren't the newest, but they're kept in good shape and clean.  The powerlifting area is more extensive than average.  Strong, Inc feels like the sort of gym my dad used to lift in in the 80s and 90s.  And I think that's a good thing.

I'm genuinely upset to be leaving.  I know that finding a gym of a similar caliber elsewhere will be difficult.  Strong, Inc is a work of love wrought in iron, chalk and sweat.

resp.text: Can’t thank you enough for this review! We are sad to see you go but so grateful to of had you for 3 years! People like you are what make Strong Inc the gym it is! We look forward to seeing you again one day! Stay Strong!

name: Ty Johnson
text: Some of the equipment needs updating but everyone is super friendly and helpful.

name: King Craig
text: Best 24r gym in town,  always clean, great equipment

name: Chong Xing
text: When you see a monolift and a reverse hyper, you know this place means business. This gym is well organized and sectioned (cardio area, dumbbell-bodybuilding area, and powerlifting area), with all kinds of bars and equipment you can think of. I was visiting Tuscaloosa for a week (hi from Mount Oread) and lucky enough to find this place - bought a week pass and enjoyed every single day training there. If you like lifting weights, heavy or light, look no further – this is the place.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind review. It was a pleasure having you and we hope to see you again!

name: Rachel
text: Definitely not your sterile, boring gym! Strong has all the equipment you'd want for powerlifting (and other sports, but I'm a powerlifter, so I'm not as familiar with the others): cages, platforms, combo racks, barbells galore, bumper plates, you name it. The gym is well-worn (i.e. people actually use it) but stays nice and clean. Chalk is allowed and stays cleaned up. The owner (Charlie Lyons) is super helpful and the USPA AL state chair. I was a recent newcomer and welcomed by the crowd; the community is excellent. Rates are great. 24/7 access is super convenient. The women's bathroom area has plenty of room to stretch, which I also like; I prefer not to stretch in the middle of the gym. It's fun being in a gym where you see people lifting 500+ lb every time you go in.

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Hunter Regan
text: This is the gym for powerlifting in Alabama.

name: Wes Duncan
text: I have been seeing Dr. Mann for a year now dealing with sciatic and lower back pain. I have had tons of relief since beginning my appointments. I would recommend his office to anyone. The new locations is super nice and i’m always greeted by his friendly staff. 10/10. If you’re looking for relief and long term results then this needs to be you’re go to.

resp.text: Thanks Wes for leaving us a review! We look forward to seeing you again! Have a great day!

name: Caroline Mauldin
text: I have always had a bad back. Since college I always wanted to go to a chiropractor. After hearing multiple positive experiences from my friends I booked a appointment. It was AMAZING. I’m am not the one to post at all. But they do an AMAZING job. Through the whole process I felt cared for as an individual and left feeling better then I have felt in a long time

resp.text: Thank you Caroline! We appreciate the review! Hope to see you soon!

name: tammy jolley
text: They got me in same day when I was in immense pain and the staff is so nice!! Dr. Mann has given me exercises that have decreased my need for frequent appointments.   I feel they care more about my long-term well-being than about making more money with appointments.   I would def recommend

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave us this review! We are so glad we are able to help you! Keep up the good work on the exercises!

name: Mckayla Sharp
text: The front desk is so nice here!  I had no idea what to expect but Kelsey was super helpful!   I was treated by Dr. Mann.  He was very professional and attentive.  The whole visit went fairly quickly but still felt very thorough and Dr. Mann was able to answer all of my questions.  My back ache is already feeling much better and I am very pleased with my first experience with chiropractic treatment!

resp.text: Thank you for leaving us this review Mckayla!  We are glad you have had a good experience at Advanced Chiropractic.  We strive to make everyone's appointments as enjoyable as possible! We look forward to seeing you again!

name: Billy Elliot
text: Top notch people here. Polite, timely and helpful.  Office is impressive. I’m one of those engineer types and they tolerate me well.  They even check my blue cross blue shield federal benefits before me ahead of time. For my $30 copay I got X-rays and everything.   Thanks again

resp.text: Thank you for leaving us a review Mr. Elliot!  We will see you next time! Have a great day!

name: Rusher Clemons
text: My experience went amazingly well. The staff was so friendly and Dr. Mann really knew his stuff! I love the environment of his office. I will definitely be going regularly! I have also told all of my friends and family about how great this place is.

resp.text: Thanks for leaving us this 5 star review Rusher! We look forward to seeing you again!

name: Russell Ormstedt
text: Advanced Chiropractic is a professional and uplifting environment. The staff is friendly and easy to work including setting up appointments. My doctor who treats me is Dr. Mann who is knowledgeable in his field and the only chiropractor I trust and you should too!

resp.text: Thank for leaving us this review!

name: David Tutwiler
text: In my third week. Has been a huge help to my back and neck. Would recommend to anyone

resp.text: Thank you for the review Mr. Tutwiler!

name: Sky Jones
text: I love the atmosphere. Great and friendly staff . Your treated with care from the second you walk in the door . Dr. man and his staff are the best in Decatur al

resp.text: Thanks for the review Mr. Jones! Have a good one!

name: Drew Gay
text: I had a great experience with Dr. Mann. He really knows what he is doing and I will definitely be back. His staff is also pretty amazing. I promise you won’t be disappointed when you give him a visit.

resp.text: Thanks for leaving us this 5 star review Drew! We hope you have a great day!

name: Brad Herring
text: I really enjoyed Dr. Mann's insight on my pain. His methods have left me feeling significantly less pain after each visit. I will definitely be going back! His staff and his location in Decatur is very convenient for my family. Pay him a visit!

resp.text: Thank you so much for leaving us this review Mr. Herring! Have a great day!

name: L Thomas
text: Great place to get help.  I have only had one visit but it was smooth and simple.  Kelsey at the front desk was extremely kind and helpful.  I got my first adjustment today from Dr. Mann and it was great I already feel better.  They take blue cross blue shield insurance I get through my work.  I am looking forward to my next visit.

resp.text: Mr. Thomas thank you so much for leaving us a review!

name: Jeremy Brannon
text: First and only chiropractor I've been to. I enjoy the atmosphere and the doctor knows what he's doing. All the staff are amazingly helpful and nice.

resp.text: Thank you Mr. Brannon for leaving us this 5 star review!  We always enjoy having you in the office! Have a great day!

name: Matt Anderson
text: My third chiropractor Ive tried, and hopefully my last. The staff is always polite and efficient, making sure appointments are on time and scheduling as easy as possible. Dr. Mann has been able to work loose some tight areas that the other chiropractors and massage therapists could not. He's also has knowledge in the sports medicine arena, making him able to better treat or pre-hab joints that get used heavily/dynamically. I always leave feeling new and usually with a few things I can work on out of his office to keep injuries at bay.

resp.text: Thanks for taking the time to leave us this review Matt!  We really appreciate it.  Dr. Mann really loves working with his athletes!  Have a great day and see you next time!

name: Sarah Snyder
text: Dr. Mann and his staff are friendly and helpful.  They work to help you feel better and are very knowledgeable in how they care for their patients.

resp.text: Thank you so much for leaving us a review Sarah! Have a great day!

name: Bill Weatherly
text: Had great success here.  Doctor explains well and is very professional. Office is very clean an well organized. I appreciate this clinic’s attention to detail as well. Hard to find these days.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave us this review Mr. Weatherly! See you next time!

name: Jesus Tavarez
text: Quick and great service. Overall would recommend and would come again.

resp.text: Thank you for leaving us this review! We look forward to seeing you again!

name: Karla Reiser
text: The staff is wonderful always smiling the doctor is great since seeing him I feel better then I have in over two years I honestly recommend them

resp.text: Thank you so much for leaving us this review Mrs. Reiser! We look forward to seeing you again!

name: Jenny Klee
text: After being cooped up from trying to quarantine and then from winter driving me inside my neck and back were killing me.  I called and they were able to schedule me the same day.  After taking X-rays Dr. Mann said I had sciatica and degenerative disc disease.  Thankfully he says both of these are treatable.  After my first treatment I am already feeling a little better!  I look forward to my next visit!

resp.text: Jenny- thank you so much for leaving us this review.  We are thrilled that you have had such great results! Have a great day and we will see you next time!

name: Brayleigh Still
text: I woke up hunched over like an old lady one day.  My backs always been bad cause I’m a nurse.  I googled the place with the most good reviews and ended up here.  Everyone is so helpful here.  The doctor even went and got my purse and insurance card for me out of my car so I wouldn’t have to crawl and get it myself.  My back died on a Thursday and Dr. Mann had me at work on a Monday. You won’t find a better chiropractor!

resp.text: Thank you for leaving us this review Brayleigh!  We look forward to seeing you again!

name: Savannah Hogan
text: So this might be a little long winded but I have to tell you about my experience here!  My daughter was the first of us to use Dr. Mann.  She came in for really bad neck pain and headaches.  Dr. Mann said it was related to what is now being called 'text neck.' In two weeks of treatment she was completely better! Not only that it's been months now and she feels great- and still playing on that phone! The second patient was my son.  We were told he needed tubes in his ears because he had chronic ear infections for months.  It broke my heart thinking about that so I was chatting with Dr. Mann on one of my daughters visits and he told Chiropractic can be successful in treating that without tubes. So we gave it a try (child adjustments are different and very gentle if you didn't know) and low and behold after months of ear infections they were COMPLETELY gone.  We were thrilled- not to mention we saved hundreds avoiding surgery.  The next patient was me!  I do pure Barre and I was having trouble with my low back and knee.  It turns out that I had mobility issues.  Couple weeks of work and my workout is now a breeze. And finally my husband.  He's had back issues before but not quite like this recent one.  He works at a computer all day.  This time the sciatica was going all the way to his foot.  He is currently finishing up his rehabilitation with Dr. Mann and is already pain free!  I am so glad we came here first! No pain, no drugs, we feel great, and at a fraction of the price of surgery. Make this your first stop!!!

resp.text: Mrs. Hogan we are so happy to have met you and your family.  Thank you for taking the time to leave this review!  We look forward to seeing you all again soon! Have a great day and have a great year!!!

name: Cricket Wireless
text: My appointment went very well.  Wait was short and everyone was helpful.  I was recommended Dr. Mann by a co worker and I am very pleased with my care.  Also thank you for getting me in on short notice

name: Caleb Thomas
text: Great staff, very friendly and affordable payments. Dr. Mann takes great care of my back and really corrects the issues!

resp.text: Thanks Caleb! We appreciate you leaving us a review! Have a great day and we will see you next time!

name: Debra Thomsen
text: Dr Brian has the brightest smile and healing knowledge. Chelsea has the most wonderful greeting and is able to work in appointments for those aches and pains. Heath is so helpful and clear on his instructions on the table. Those hot pads are the best. You won’t go wrong getting adjustments for your back, hips and knees from Advanced Chiropractor!

resp.text: Thank you for leaving us a review! See you next time!!!

name: mark mcalister
text:
I would stay away extremely overpriced. It was $235 for a new patient set up every visit after would be $99. The exam was minimal, no new x-rays and didn't even look at my old ones before slapping me with the bill. For chiropractic care this is egregious.
After this visit i went to another practice new patient was $30 which included x-rays and a much more thorough examination.

resp.text: Good Morning! $18 is our average patient copay!  If you have questions on what your price would be please call us at 2563518500 so we can give you correct quotes.  Also, our exam guidelines follow both that of the Journal of the American Medical Association and the Journal of Chiropractic Medicine ensuring we deliver complete and thorough examinations every time! X-rays should only be taken on an as needed basis. If a chiropractor is taking x-rays on all patients without medical necessity we urge you to report this to the State Board of Chiropractic as this is either based on greed or severely outdated research and considered below the current standard of care. In all honesty, we believe this to be a fake review left by a competing Decatur chiropractor as the information in your comment is misleading and inaccurate.

name: R Mitchell
text: Dr. Mann helped me with my back pain.  I had been getting worse and worse for months and I was having to miss work.  Everyone here is always nice and my back feels strong and pain free again. Thank you

resp.text: So happy to hear you were pleased with your care at Advanced Chiropractic Mr. Mitchell.  See you next time!

name: Casey Miller
text: Dr. Mann was exactly what is looking for when I was searching for something to help with my back pain. My other doctor just wanted me to take pills and then an orthopedic surgeon said I need an operation.  I didn't want any of that so I went here. The staff is very nice and the Dr. Mann is very professional.  He said even though I was in severe pain that he could still help me. Sure enough here I am now doing everything I need to without any pain. It has been 2 weeks since I have been.  I am   Thankful and grateful. Definitely recommend this office.

resp.text: We are so glad you found us Casey! See you soon!!!

name: Dana Bradley
text: Incredibly appreciative for all the help I received here.  I didn't make it here until after a month of muscle relaxers and an MRI.  I was scheduled for an appointment with my orthopedic doctor but my appointment was 6 weeks away.  I was really just looking for something to hold me over.  I took my report to Dr. Mann and I was told not only could help me he believed he could keep me from having any surgery and possibly no more meds.  I had my doubts, especially after he told me I had a disc in my lower back that was bulging.  To my delight, I began sleeping better each day.  After 2 weeks work wasn't so bad.  After 1 month I felt so much better I cancelled my orthopedic visit.  I don't know why the chiropractor isn't everyone's first recommendation when something hurts.

resp.text: We are so glad we could help you Mrs. Bradley!  We hope you are well and look forward to seeing you and your family in the future!!!

name: Brylee Young
text: Really nice people. Super great and very helpful. Highly recommend.

resp.text: Thank you so much Brylee! Hope you have a great day!

name: Luke Appleton
text: Highly reccomend this office to anyone trying to avoid pills and surgery for their back pain.  My back had steadily gotten worse and had reached a point that I couldn't take it anymore.  It hurt at work and as affecting my sleep.  Went to my MD and they just gave me a prescription. I'm not a pill head so I looked this place up.  Very little wait time here. I sat for less than 5 minutes waiting the whole visit. Sat for about 30 at my MD.  I used Dr. Mann here.  He went over what was going on.  I recieved treatment that day.  I had no idea how much sitting in a bad chair could affect my back.  I have since conpleted my rehab and feel great.  Even better than before it started bothering me.  Definitley worth the visit.

resp.text: Thank you for leaving us this review Luke! We are glad you had such great results during your time here! We strive to be leaders in rehabilitation and wellness care!  See you next time!

name: Autumn Troxel
text: My headaches and low back pain are gone!  I used to get headaches regularly. They weren’t usually debilitating but they were constantly there and just annoying. I would find myself in a bad mood just from the pain always being there. My lower back started after I had my child and I just couldn’t get it to go away. I found this place online and they were able to get me in the same day. My wait times are always very short at advanced chiropractic. I cannot stand going to an office and sitting for an hour waiting.  I think my longest wait was less than 10 minutes.  The office is very clean- they clean between every patient. They also take blue cross blue shield insurance which was great. I’m hoping to get my husband in soon for neck issues he had after a car accident.  Overall very pleased with my care here and happy to support local business in Decatur!

resp.text: Thank you so much for leaving us a review Autumn!  We love that you have had such great results!  Let Mr. Troxel know we deal with a lot of auto accident victims and have great success! See you next time!

name: Robin Varner
text: I would recommend Advanced Chiropractic to everyone!  The staff is so  nice!  I came for back pain.  Dr. Mann was patient and kind.  He walked me through everything and made sure I understood what my problem was.  I felt 100 percent better after finishing here.

resp.text: Thank you Robin for sharing your success with us at Advanced Chiropractic! See you next time!

name: Kaz Baumgard
text: EXCELLENT service and treatment here.  My sciatica and back pain are gone.  I understand better now how to avoid back pain as well.  My blue cross blue shield PEEHIP and secondary covered my bill entirely.

resp.text: Thanks for leaving us a review Kaz!  Happy holidays to you and your family!

name: Jerod Stevens
text: Feel like new now.  Thanks for all the help. Will definitely be sending you some business. Take care!

resp.text: Glad we could help Mr. Stevens!  We appreciate that! See you next time!

name: Gabby Rochester
text: Great clinic! Great hours too super convenient. I was having pain in my back and down my leg. I started this week and can already tell the difference! I have received great adjustments, some home exercises, and decompression therapy. Front desk was very accommodating, the doctor was very insightful and showed me why I’ve had so many problems with my back! I was especially impressed with the suggestions Dr. Mann gave me to avoid flare ups and actually help me fix why it was happening instead of just living at the chiropractor forever.  I also purchased their holiday massage special. It’s a 3 pack of one hour massages for $99. Can’t beat it! It’s always a little nerve racking to try a different doctor but I’m so glad I chose this place on my google search! Five stars for sure!!!

resp.text: Thank you for the review Gabby! Glad to here you have had such great success! Thank you for choosing Advanced Chiropractic!

name: Tiffany Hightower
text: Dr. Mann and the staff are amazing! The best chiropractor I have been to. Dr. Mann worked with me for a couple of weeks and now I feel much better! I would highly recommend them to anyone. Also Kelsey and Heath are the best! Everyone is always in a great mood! I love it!

resp.text: Thank you Tiffany! We always enjoy seeing you at the office.  So glad to hear that you had success with our practice!  Have a great day!

name: Jennifer Landry
text: Dr. Mann is a great chiropractor.  It looks like it's been said her a 100 times but I wanted to say why my treatments here allow me to say how much I mean that and miss being in Alabama!  I spend most of the year in Atlanta now because of work.  I have tried and tried to find a chiropractor here that was as good as Dr. Mann but I haven't been successful.  I called Dr. Mann before one of my appointments in Atlanta and asked if he would mind talking to my chiropractor (bless him for doing that) Even after an in depth conversation about the type of treatments I was receiving with Dr. Mann in Decatur I still wasn't getting the same level of relief from my Atlanta chiropractor that I was receiving at Advanced Chiropractic.  My neck is just not the same when I go to other places.  I only get to be adjusted a few times a year by Dr. Mann now because of the move and it's one of the worst things about not being home.  But every time  I am in town seeing Dr. Mann is on the list!  Another thing I always appreciated about Dr. Mann's office is there is always a plan.  He doesn't just say 'see ya' at the end of your appointment.  If I am working on an injury I always know when I need to be seen again.  If I am on wellness I know I need to be back monthly.  Other places I have been don't give any direction and it just seems less professional.  Be thankful for what you have here!!! He's the best! Thanks again Dr. Mann!

resp.text: Thank you so much Jennifer for leaving us a review! We always asked to be updated by your family when they come in for treatment about what you and yours are up to these days!  It sounds like the husband and kids are  adjusting to the move pretty well! We miss seeing you guys every month now that you've moved to Atlanta!  And yes anytime you are home give us a call and we will work your whole gang in.  Hope to see you soon!!!

name: nathanael west
text: This is a great place to get adjusted! They are friendly and make you feel welcome! I started going a couple months ago and I feel great! I suggest you give them a call!

resp.text: Thank you so much Mr. West for taking the time to leave a review!  We are thrilled to hear that you had such a positive experience with Advanced Chiropractic!  We look forward to seeing you in the future.  Have a great day!!!

name: Miles Blackwell
text: This is the chiropractor you've been looking for.  I'm a fan of all things wellness and am a believer that the chiropractor can save you from surgery. I am also very picky about the places I go for treatment and advice. I had just relocated to the area for work.  My supervisor had also just moved here and said I should give this place a try.  I called ahead and asked about the services provided and some questions about my new insurance.  I had my appointment that evening.  The office is more modern looking than some of the other places in town (past experience has taught me sometimes old building means outdated doctor). The staff and doctors are all nice people and I can without a doubt say that was the best treatment I have ever been given.  My last chiropractor was a good friend and great person but was a smaller build. Just guessing but I think that really was the difference in treatments and let me tell you it was significant. I come in about once a month and it keeps me doing everything I like (and some of the chores that I don't).

resp.text: Thanks for the review Miles!  We work hard to make sure we maintain a professional environment and stay up to date on the latest research on wellness and rehab treatments.  Thank you again for taking the time to leave us a review!!! See you soon!

name: Tiffany Nichole
text: I haven't felt this good in a long time! No more pain! No more headaches! Going to work isn't so painful anymore. I'm getting much better sleep at night. I can do just about anything I want to now. I'm not afraid to tackle a garden or the laundry! I'm so glad I gave this place a try. In the very first visit I could see the difference. After a few weeks I felt like a new person. I originally only came here because I had just moved to Decatur and driving to my old chiropractor was getting to be a hassle. On my first visit Dr. Mann discussed new treatment methods that he had seen some success with and I decided to give the rehab a try before just going to my regular Wellness treatments. Like I said in just a couple weeks I could see the changes. I used 2 feel tingling from my back almost weekly. I now haven't felt it in weeks. I used to have to avoid certain Hobbies that I enjoyed because I was afraid my back would go out. Thanks to Doctor Mann I now have no fear of my back going out on me. That in itself is huge for me! And yes this office is super convenient! Right on the Beltline across from publix!!!

resp.text: Thanks Tiffany! We are glad we were able to help you!

name: Keisha Talley
text: My son and I come here for chiropractic treatment.  The front desk is always stellar and I have great trust in Dr. Mann. We always come her first for any pains or injuries we might have.

resp.text: Thanks Keisha for leaving us a review!

name: Rachael Gardner
text: Wonderful and nice people and they helped my back significantly

resp.text: Thank you so much Rachael for taking the time to  leaving us a review.  We are so happy to hear that you were pleased with your results at Advanced Chiropractic!  See you next time!

name: Jamie Reynolds
text: Just finished my visit and I am very impressed. Office was very easy to find. It’s on the Beltline in Decatur. No long wait, very nice staff. My appointment with the doctor went well. Dr. Mann is very friendly and approachable. He answered all my questions and we were able to start my treatment today.  Looking forward to coming back tomorrow when he says we will go over my x-rays together.  My copay was only $20 with my insurance. Already feel a little better! Looking forward to getting a good night of sleep!

resp.text: So glad you had a good experience! Thank you Jamie for leaving us a review and thank you for choosing Advanced Chiropractic!

name: Blaine Roberts
text: I love going to Advanced Chiropractic the staff is extremely nice and very helpful. They are also quite knowledgeable about the products they offer. The atmosphere is very enjoyable and the massage therapist is excellent as well. One of the best chiropractic offices I’ve ever been too.

resp.text: Thank you for the review! We hope to see you soon Mr. Roberts! Have a great day!

name: Danny McGee
text:
I originally came here because of the office hours. I don't get off till 4:30.
My old chiropractors office wanted me there by 4:45 to be seen. Advanced Chiropractic is open till 6:00.
I must say I have been very pleased with the switch. I highly recommend Dr. Mann! When I first came here I was contemplating another back surgery. Dr Mann ,through adjustments and suggestions on exercises, has improved my quality of life.  My job can be physically demanding at times. Dr Mann keeps me going! I have never had a problem getting an appointment when I have had a bad day. His office staff are friendly and helpful. The massage therapist is great to.

resp.text: Thank you so much for leaving us a review! It had been a pleasure having you join our office.

name: Jonathan Franks
text: I was pretty happy with my chiropractor back home so finding a new place was not the most exciting thing for me.  I had been using the same chiropractor that my parents introduced me to when I was was young so I wanted to find the right doctor for me and my family.  I moved to Alabama as part of the construction happening in Madison right now and will be here for at least a year.  I found this place on google and called to schedule a consultation.  The office was nice. Front desk was helpful. Dr. Mann was very  professional and gave me the same level of treatment I was used to getting in back in Tennessee.  He also had some new ideas that were actually very helpful at work.  The machinery I sometimes use put me in bad positions and could flare me up for days. I’m a golfer too and he is going to try and get me back on the course.  My swing has been causing some radiating back pain in to my leg.  This place also works out with my schedule. I don’t get off of work until 5 sometimes but can still make it to the office since they are opening until 6. I’ll Be trying the massage therapist soon too.

resp.text: We are happy you found Advanced Chiropractic too Mr. Franks!  We understand that seeing a doctor for the first time can be a little nerve-racking.  We do our best to ensure a thorough and pleasant first visit while answering any questions you may have to help put your mind at ease.  We see a lot of construction workers- both supervisors and laborers.  We keep the office open a little later just so you all commuting back in to town can be seen.  Better hurry with the massage our yearly Christmas Special ends today! See you soon!

name: CT Accounting
text:
Started here for my back issues.  I really thought I got it from my dad but Dr. Mann said a lot of it has to do with lifestyle as well.  I had great results here.  Instant relief, followed by weeks of improvement.  Visits never took that long- barely sat in the waiting room before me treatment begins and I was moved to the next parts of my treatment were with little to no wait.  At the end I did have a few question but Dr. Mann stayed with me to answer my questions.  Nothing beats being able to sleep, wake up, go through a demanding day, and still feel great every day.  I will most definitely keep using Dr. Mann and his clinic on a regular basis.

Update 12/23/19-  It has been months since I have had even the slightest pain! I am back to exercising 3 days a week and doing pretty much anything I want, pain free.  I honestly have had days that I forgot that I was ever in pain all the time.  My son's basketball season started up which means lots of driving and uncomfortable locations I must linger in for hours, multiple nights a week.  With the instructions Dr. Mann gave me my back has held up and I have not missed a second of a single game.  They were able to work me in this morning for an adjustment before I hit the road for the holidays.  Dr. Mann even came out to my car to help me setup me seat cushion to keep my back from acting up on the long drive we have to my wife's family gathering in North Carolina.  I cannot say enough about how happy I am that I found Dr. Mann's office.   Until next time! Thanks again you guys! Have a Merry Christmas!

resp.text: Thank you for leaving the review!  We are so glad you have had such great results!  Chiropractic is great for many things!  We believe in keeping the body pain free and healthy so you can keep doing the things you love to do!  If we wait until pain arises then new damage has occurred and some parts of the body just don't grow back like the original pieces!  We are trying to change the narrative of health care by not only fixing the problem but preventing it from coming back as well. See you next time at Advanced Chiropractic!

name: Hannah Criscoe
text: I feel so good, me and Kate never felt better

resp.text: Thank you for leaving us a review!

name: Daniel Jones
text: Yesterday I woke up and my back had reached a point that I just couldn’t handle anymore. I had been trying to work through it for weeks.  I work second shift so at 11 I began going down the list of chiropractors in Decatur.  I found out that a lot places were closed by lunch and some were taking more time off for the holidays.  When I called advanced chiropractic Dr. Mann said he would keep the office open for me. I arrived after 12 and noticed that the office actually closed at 12.  He still took me in, did my exam and took my xrays himself.  I’m a plant supervisor and I would not have survived the night without Dr. Mann’s help.  I look forward to next week and getting more relief. Thanks again doc

resp.text: Mr. Jones we are glad we were able to help you.  Our proudest moments are getting people back to living life- both work and play!  We look forward to seeing you again! Thank you for leaving us a review and have a good day!

name: Rhett Maples
text: This was my first time seeing a chiropractor. I’ve had back pain for months that would come and go but this time it was worse.  The aching and nerve pain were keeping me awake at night and bothering me throughout the day.  My doctor told me it was time to see a surgeon.  I asked around and was recommended Dr. Mann by multiple friends.  I decided to go in for a consultation.  After talking Dr. Mann said he felt he could keep me from having surgery. And he was right. After 2-3 weeks I started noticing the pain was decreasing. By the end of my rehab I was getting uninterrupted sleep and getting through the work week with no issues.  I feel confident in my back again. I saved thousands by avoiding surgery and didn’t have to worry about the risks of surgery.

resp.text: Thank you for the review! Glad we could help you!

name: Sydney Noel
text: I’m very health conscious so I needed to find someone who could conveniently meet all my needs. Chiropractor, massage, health questions things like that. I found this place about 2 years ago and I am thankful I did. Through headaches, back pain, and pregnancy Dr. Mann has helped me even more than I could have imagined. The office is also very easy to get to. My last visit was just for a wellness adjustment and some diet advice.  Dr. Mann always takes time to answer any questions which is really hard to find these days.  I recommend everyone see a chiropractor and use this place if you’re looking for the best office to meet all your health needs!!

resp.text: Thank you for leaving us a review Sydney! We are proud to offer a variety of services and products to our patients. Our goal is to be the one place you need for all of your wellness and rehab needs. Thank you using us for so many years. Happy Holidays!

name: Kristina Warren
text: Recently moved to the area and was looking for a new chiropractor. I made the HUGE mistake of visiting Dr. Mann. Very unprofessional. Sort of “know it all”. He would not listen to any of my problems he just kept talking. Other than that I received my adjustment which was fine but then he wanted me to come back 3 times a week! I have a life. I don’t have time for that. The staff was very kind and attentive. Maybe I’ll just try a massage next time.

resp.text: We have no record of a 'Kristina Warren' ever being in this office.  This false review has been reported to the local authorities and Alabama Chiropractic Board.

name: Donald Priest
text: I use Advanced Chiropractic for my low back pain problems.  I see Dr. Mann regularly and he keeps me going.  I try to go once a month so I can keep working.  It has been several years since I have had any issues.  The entire staff is very friendly and I have sent him several of my friends and family for their health needs.  My wife uses their massage therapist regularly and is very pleased with her visits their too.  They have great hours and are very flexible.

resp.text: Thank you for leaving us a review!  We are so glad you have had such great improvements over the years.  Dr. Mann enjoys seeing families come in!  We appreciate you spreading the word about Advanced Chiropractic! Have a great day!

name: Eric Flannigan
text: Highly reccomend for low back treatment.  Had lots of trouble with mine in the past. Dr. Mann was recommended to me by my boss.  They take blue cross blue shield so it was very convenient. Nice office and helpful staff. I also appreciate that Dr. Mann will answer any questions I ask. All around a great office that really sets the standard for Decatur.

resp.text: Thanks Mr. Flannigan for taking the time to review us! So glad we could help you!

name: Whitney Brown
text: My experience here has been nothing short of amazing. When i called to schedule my appointment, the receptionist was more than willing to get me in around my work schedule. When i first walked into the office, everyone was so friendly and welcoming. I cant say enough about Dr. Mann. He listened to everything i felt that i needed to tell him. He took his time explaining to me what he was doing and why. He recommended exercises to do between visits to help strengthen me back up. After he adjusted me, I felt so much relief. He eased pain that I have had for months. When I left, I felt like a new person. My only regret was not coming to see Dr. Mann sooner!!

name: State Farm Aspirant
text: Dr. Mann treated me quickly both visits and I only had to go twice before my pain cleared up. He gabe me some quick daily exercises/ movements to do to keep me from having to continue making visits. I feel like My pain was actually healed instead of made to feel better and just Going back again and again for relief. I have regained full mobility with no back/neck pain because of work OR when I get up in the morning. Super nice guy and probably the most helpful doctor I’ve ever been to.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review!

name: avery summerford
text: I just moved here for work from Tennessee.  Somehow during the move I hurt my back so badly that I couldn't move.  I had always had a chiropractor in Nashville but obviously that was no longer a choice.  So I got on my phone and began searching for a local one.  My chiropractor back home told me to find one that was 'up to date' and that it might be hard to find in a smaller city like Decatur.  I found advanced chiropractic and checked the website.  I found that they do a lot more than just heat and adjust their patients.  I called and scheduled an appointment the same day. The office is very modern looking and Dr. Mann may be even more knowledgeable than my last chiropractor.  I'm already feeling much better.  The receptionist is also very good with describing insurance coverage as mine was a mess.  Overall- great office. This will be my last chiropractor!

resp.text: Avery I'm glad you found us and thank you for your kind words!  It has been a pleasure getting to know you!  Yes- we see A LOT of back pain and we try our best to get patients in as soon as possible.  Again- thank you so much for taking the time to spread the word about what we do at Advanced Chiropractic.  We look forward to seeing you on your next visit!

name: Judy Letson
text: Had a very good first experience with chiropractic here. They accept insurance. My treatment for sciatica was a success. I will continue to use Dr. Mann in the future!

resp.text: Thank you Ms. Letson for leaving us a review and thank you for choosing Advanced Chiropractic!

name: Eli Mann
text: This place literally changed my life!! I’ve had HORRIBLE posture from gaming on my laptop and Dr. Mann fixed it! It took some time and effort, but he was there for every step. Such a kind and caring doctor unlike others around!

resp.text: Thanks for the review!

name: Katy Bevin
text: Today was my first visit and it went well.  The receptionist was very friendly and helpful.  The doctor is fantastic.  He took xrays, explained my causes of  pain and told me they would be able to help me.  It was my first adjustment so I think it went well with what I know so far. I'm looking forward to coming back and finishing my rehab. I reccomend this place to anyone with back pain.

resp.text: Thank you for leaving us a review Katy!  We are glad that you enjoyed your experience in the office!  We look forward to seeing you again!

name: Greg Reily
text: I had a catch in my back for months.  Sometimes sharp and achy. Sometimes i would get tingling or numbness down the back of my leg. This place popped up on google with the highest and most ratings so I called and they scheduled me very quickly.  First visit was good. Little bit of paperwork but nothing bad compared to other doctors offices.  Dr. Mann is a nice guy.  Answered my questions and explained what was going on. Began treatment that day. I feel great now. It's been a month since I've felt anything at all. I definitely recommend to anyone looking to avoid pills and surgery in the Decatur area.

resp.text: Glad we could help you Mr. Reily!

name: Christy Burnham
text: The girls up front are amazing and so sweet and very informative.  I started out with a massage the first time and she did an amazing job. I came back to get adjusted and I walked out feeling like a brand new person. He went over different ways to help me!

resp.text: Thank you Christy!

name: Veronica Tiddle
text: I woke up one morning with excruciating pain in my lower back.  It hurt to move at all.  I found Advanced Chiropractic online and they were able to schedule me right away.  After my first visit my pain decreased some. 2 weeks later I was feeling a lot better.  They really go the extra mile here to help you.  Dr. Mann and the staff are kind, friendly, and understanding. I highly recommend this place!

resp.text: So glad we were able to help you!

name: Valerie Jones
text: I could barely walk when I came to Dr. Mann.  I had lifted something heavy, and the urgent care doctor said that I had bulging disc. I was in so much pain! But Dr. Mann was very gentle and kind and in a matter of a few days I was feeling better. It took a few weeks but I was completely pain free. I would highly recommend advance chiropractic to anyone suffering from back pain. The staff are very friendly and helpful. And the whole experience has been a good one.  They make you feel like family!

resp.text: Thank you Mrs. Jones! We are so glad we could get you back on your feet!

name: Linda Lawrimore
text: Having past experience with a chiropractic practice I can honestly say that Advanced Chiropractic Rehab and Wellness is superior in all aspects of their work.  Dr. Brian Mann is a knowledgeable, helpful and friendly chiropractic physician. He is concerned about your well being and teaches you how to help yourself at home during the course of your rehabilitation.  I have made enough progress on my neck (which was in really bad shape) and my back (ongoing history for years) that I am confident I will get to the improved point I need to be.  Relief of pain and discomfort is a blessing and so is Dr. Mann.  His staff is friendly, helpful and at your side at all times during your visit. They are a great asset to the doctor's practice.   I can think of no other place I would want to go for chiropractic treatment when I already have the best!

resp.text: Thank you so much Mrs. Lawrimore!

name: Verizon Wireless
text: Thanks for the help doc! The ergonomics presentation was great! Our necks are already feeling a lot better! We'll see you soon! We highly recommend Dr. Mann to anyone who works on screens all day!

name: Derron Smith
text: I've been coming to Advanced Chiropractic and seeing Doctor Mann now for about 2 years. I figured it was time that I gave him some acknowledgement. Honestly, I started coming here out of convenience.  It was right on my route home. I figured all chiropractors were pretty much the same. However the older doctor that I was seeing across town, turns out was very behind the times. Dr. Mann has updated treatment methods and a streamlined practice. I never really have terrible back pain but I never really knew how good I could feel until I started seeing Dr Mann. My visits are always fast- and I don't mean that they are rushed- just never any wasted time. So if you are deciding what you ahould do about your back or neck or any health needs you might have- you have found the right place.  They'll get you fixed up in no time.

resp.text: Thanks Derron! We appreciate your review!

name: Angie Thom
text: Dr. Mann and his staff are the best around! My back pain has improved dramatically in the short time I've been a patient, and I would highly recommend him to anyone seeking chiropractic care. I am always seen quickly with little to no waiting, and the staff is friendly and efficient.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind review Angie! We always enjoy seeing you!

name: Wendell Atkins
text: I used to see another chiropractor in town. I tried this place because they had massages too. My knees and hands usually always hurt and keeps me from fishin. When I left after one visit I already feel better. It was a great experience.  Will definitely be back

name: Kris Small
text: Okay, So I've dealt with my back pain for many years I've seen chiropractors for many years and I am a licensed medical provider and I am honestly dismayed by this place, I told the D.C. what exactly was wrong and he ignored me. Attempted to realign a part of my body that didn't need it and when he was done after 6 minutes in the room with me he managed to not fix the issue at all now I'm out over $100.00 and absolutely  no relief for a simple pinched nerve, oh but he did set me up on the "maintenance plan" which is 3 visits a week at $65 per visit that's $780 a month! That's more then my mortgage for what every single other chiropractor has been able to fix and treat in one visit for under $50.00. Please be wise and heed this as a warning. I do not recommend this place for anyone. They may be a legal D.C. but it's as close to a scam ad you can get legally.

resp.text: Kris- you are being dishonest. Health expenses without insurance can be tough, but that is no excuse for your dishonesty in your review. Cameras show your time in the office was approximately 40 minutes; less than 5 minutes in the waiting room- standard for any first visit. Furthermore, we offer the lowest cash prices for new patients in town and also very flexible payment plans.  You were told the prices before you came in. Our cameras even show you were in high spirits until it was time to pay your bill.  And instead of talking to us and working out a payment plan we watched you go into your car and leave this angry review.  Also, what you tried to tell us was ‘wrong’ with you was actually incorrect and probably the main reason you’ve had to deal with your back pain for years instead of actullay being ‘fixed.’ While we have great respect for you and your field, you have to remember- you are not a doctor-  for instance a chiropractor in a car accident should heed the EMT’s instructions because that is what they have been trained to do.  You are also confusing your terminology- maintenance is for wellness patients- and is an optional once a month visit for those who have complete their ‘rehab’ plan to help stay ahead of injuries and reduce wear and tear on the body. Rehab plans are what you were trying to quote. Certain injuries take time to heal and a proper plan for recovery. You are absolutely right Kris- We do things different at Advanced Chiropractic.  We get so many patients who have seen chiropractors that take shortcuts to treat their injuries and the patient continues to deal with pain for years.  Our goal at Advanced Chiropractic is to HEAL the injury. We have found that if we simply make pain go away we are no different than a pain killer or opiate.  However, with our custom made rehabilitation plans you can escape that continued damage, year after year, which is so important as many parts of the body don’t grow back when you repeatedly injure them.

resp.text: Thanks Mrs. Stacy!  Always good to see you!  I hope you continue having success in your path to wellness!  You are right proper movement is the key to wellness not just going through the motions!  And YES questions are great! They empower the patient! Hope your family is doing well and we will see you next time!

I would recommend that anyone in a car accident go here ASAP for care you can trust.

name: Sarah Killian
text: I get really bad headaches. I’ve tried over the counter medicine and it did nothing. Went to a specialist and after several weeks still no significant results. A friend of mine told me to try her Chiropractor because she had great results for her low back. They take insurance (I didn’t know that at the time) so that was helpful. My first visit I Came in and the front desk was very helpful. I soon met Dr. Mann and after listening to my history he took some x-rays. He examined them and decided it was safe to begin treatment. Said what I actually had was a cervicogenic headache and that he was confident we could reduce the number of headaches I was having.  Within the week my headaches were almost totally gone. After two weeks of no headaches I am now down to just monthly visits to make sure they don’t come back. My only regret is that I didn’t go sooner. Thanks Dr. Mann!

text: DO NOT LET THIS MAN TOUCH YOU!!!! I've been going to chiropractor for 10 years have always felt much better afterwards. After leaving his office I've been in bed for days from pain. resp.text:
Hi Ashley, we believe you have mistakenly reviewed the wrong office- we have no record of an Ashley Smith ever being treated in our facility. At Advanced Chiropractic, our patients' x-rays are always reviewed with the doctor on the first visit before treatment begins to ensure a safe, quick recovery.  'First do no harm' is a rule we strictly adhere to- as should all doctors. We are so sorry you received a poor standard of care at another clinic. Please give us a call at (256)351-8500 and we will help you recover from the injury you have endured.
Also, when you retrieve the x-rays from the other office you visited we'll review them for no charge- just mention this post..

Said I needed surgery.  I got to talking to a friend and he hsaid I really oughta give Dr. Mann a try. I'm sure glad I did.   In about 2 weeks I was feeling a lot better. In a month I was pain free.  I was told by 2 people I absolutely had to have surgery.  Been 3 months now with no issues and with my insurance my care cost harldy nothing. Thanks Dr. Mann

name: Slade
text: When I first visited Crossfit Candor I was skeptical and scared. I was over 300 lbs, in the worst shape of my life, and other gyms and diets did not work for me. Three months in my life is changing. I am becoming healthier, stronger, and most importantly I can move again. The coaches have been top notch. They have monitored my progress, making sure I am able to do each exercise and that I don't injure myself in the process.  The exercise is hard but it will make positive changes in your body and mind. The best part is the community. Everyone  wants to see you win.

resp.text: We are so proud of you, Slade!  Keep up the awesome work!  We are all here cheering you on!

text: I was skeptical to try CrossFit but I’m so glad that I tried CrossFit Candor. After trying five different gyms in town-this gym feels like home. resp.text: We are so thankful you tried us out!  Thank you, Robin!

name: Mary Caillouet
text: Candor is here in Tuscaloosa waiting to change your life. From reaching your fitness goals to giving you a community that makes this town feel more like home, Crossfit Candor offers a well-rounded experience. After working out here for about 18 months, I can say that Candor is so much more than just a gym to me. Lance and Jamie work tirelessly to build a place where their members feel welcome and challenged so they are set up to thrive. They have phenomenal coaches, and because of that I have some pretty awesome friends that workout next to me everyday. I could not recommend this place enough!

resp.text: Thank you for being such a big part of us! :)

text: I could sing praises about this place all day long! From the community, to the engaging and talented coaches, to the dedicated members... ITF has gotten me into the best shape of my life and has also helped me learn to push myself in other areas. Give Iron Tribe a shot. You won’t regret it.

text: I am a new member but my experience thus far has been so much fun! The encouragement that I receive from staff and other members is incredibly refreshing.  I love this gym and would highly recommend to come and check it out.

text: We love Iron Tribe Fitness! Our family has been involved with the community for the past 5 years and truly enjoy every aspect. I feel challenged by the workouts and encouraged by the team/ athletes every time I come in-- the coaches and staff are wonderful!

name: Keith Roberson
text: The IronTribe experience has completely changed my life. At 62 years old I am more fit than I have ever been! Anyone who sees a before picture can't believe it's me. Plus I have tons of energy I didn't have before. The coaches are always great at making sure you are using proper technique and pushing you to places you never thought you could go! And, I've made a lot of new friends. Working out at IronTribe is something I hope I never have to give up.

text: Peggy is awesome! Jonathan is pretty good too. If you like HIIT workouts and want to get strong quickly, Iron tribe is the way to do it. I also like that they write down the results of your workouts so you can see yourself improving.

name: Thomas G
text: I love my Iron Tribe family! The coaches are incredible! This is a professional and encouraging place to build muscle and health!

name: Philip McDaniel
text:
As my 6 week challenge comes to an end.  Let me reflect on this.  It has been a GREAT ride.  All the coaches at Iron Tribe on 280 are amazing.  They push you to be better and they are there to encourage you on your tough days.  A couple take aways are this.  If you have a question about ANYTHING, ask the coaches, they are there to watch you succeed!!!  They will tell it like it is and what you need to do to stay on track.  They are AWESOME at this.  The second take away is this, STICK,STICK,STICK to the meal plan.  It is there for you to succeed!!!  It’s all laid out and the online community is GREAT, if you have question for them ask about recipes, nutrition items that come up while shopping etc…  The online community is another AWESOME way to stay in touch and stay accountable.

THANK YOU TO THE COACHES AND ATHELETES AT IRON TRIBE 280!!!  IT HAS BEEN AN AWESOME EXPERIENCE!!

Philip

I recommend my therapist, super affordable, flexible schedule,   i am improving a lot with his recommendations of what to do and what to eat too.

name: Stephen Ferlita
text: Knowledge is power and this is what you get working with Dan.  I have been battling cancer with conventional medicine but I knew I needed to do more to beat this diseas.  Dan helped me with nutrition and supplements to work side by side with the chemo and also elevate the side effects from the chemo treatment.  He used evidence based studies to guide me for my type of cancer.  He is so knowledgeable about the body inside and out. The best news I am cancer free as of Jan 2019.  He is so passionate and has a great personality.

name: B. Morgan
text: I have been having deep tissue massage from Dan Hendrix for more than 12 years.  He is the best.  Previously used several others but no one has his particular combination of expertise and knowledge of exercise science and nutrition.  My years of being his client should speak volumes about my opinion of his therapy.

name: Patricia Hendrix
text: Dan is very thorough and knowledgeable in massage therapy techniques as well as nutrition, personal training and yoga instruction. He takes the time to provide his clients with the most recent medically evidenced- based information available and takes a very holistic and caring approach. An extraordinary practitioner.

name: Terrell Clark
text: I've been to 4 or 5 massage therapists in the Prattville/Montgomery area and my experience with Dan Hendrix was by far the best I've had. Dan is knowledgeable about muscles and their functions which allows him to massage the body adequately. He takes the time out to work with his clients and gives them tips that can be used at home. Dan has more than 30 years of experience and he knows how to customize his massage to his clients needs. I highly recommend Dan Hendrix because of his professionalism and extensive knowledge.

name: renea johnston
text: After being on crutches for five weeks because of a tibial plateau fracture in my leg, my back was thrown out due to my body misalignment.  The pain in my back made me immobile.  Dan Hendrix went over and above to repair the injury to my back.  With his therapy, I was able to move again, pain-free, within a week.  He also did therapy on my leg which accelerated my ability to walk sooner without the crutches.  Thank you, Dan Hendrix...because of you, I can enjoy the holidays!

name: Vonda B
text: I have nothing but good things to say about Dan Hendrix.  He does an AWESOME deep tissue massage.  Additionally,  he is very knowledgeable when it comes to, diet, exercise,  and supplements.  I feel like a million bucks after a massage by Dan Hendrix.

text: I enjoy working out here. I like the gym hours. It really works for me. There are times when I see person's that don't clean the equipment or remove weight from machines, but I love the gym itself. I'm hoping you'll eventually get into a larger building and add other equipment.

Not only do we have remarkably clean facilities filled with top of the line, brand new equipment, there are lots of friendly, helpful people.  The leadership, including dedicated and well trained staff and managers, are a team who really care about you reaching your fitness goals in an environment that makes working out fun.

name: IVEY 96
text: Great gym. The only thing I wish the gym had was heavier dumbbells like 120’s and 130’s. Hopefully we can get them one day.

name: Mitzi James
text: Nice clean place. Helpful employees

resp.text: Mitzi , thank you so much! We love our members and are proud to bring you a gym you are proud to share with others.  😊

name: MARLENE Copeland
text: Not crowded and I can go workout anytime.

resp.text: MARLENE, thanks for your review!

name: Lai-Barrett Roberts
text: Awesome place to workout and get fit!!!

resp.text: Lai-Barrett , Thank you for choosing Workout Anytime Valley for your fitness journey and giving us such a great review.  Our members are our top priority and we look forward to assisting you in reaching your goals!

name: William Jones Jr
text: Friendly staff, clean facility and good price

name: Curtis Ogletree
text: The best gym ever

resp.text: Curtis , we are so glad to hear you are enjoying your experience at WOA Valley.  We appreciate the positive review and having you as a member.

name: Gary Atkins
text: Love the convenience and the massage chair

name: John Hancock
text: Where can I get the information of reopening?

name: Frank T
text: Great Experience and Staff

resp.text: Frank , thank you so much! We love our members and are proud to bring you a gym you are proud to share with others.  😊

name: Antonio Williams
text: Awesome

resp.text: Antonio, thank you so much for the ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ review! We're thrilled you are enjoying our  fitness center, and  so appreciate you  taking the time to support our gym.

name: James Andrews
text: New equipment and a helpful staff

name: MICHAEL LOTT
text: Great staff, clean and tons of equipment

name: Roniegus Lyons
text: Nice facility, has everything

name: Scotty Willis
text: Great place to workout!!

name: Millicent Fannin
text: Nice

name: Capreena Jones
text: Love it...

name: krystal Miller
text: Love it love it love it

name: Lisa Johnson
text: Love this place!!!!

name: Jason Smith
text: 24 hour access.

resp.text: Jason , thank you for the great review! We're glad you are enjoying the 24/7 access.

name: Samarian Brown
text: Great environment

name: Richard Weathers
text: John is friendly & easy to deal with. The members are generally decent though the culture in gyms is different these days - few people unload their weight once they're finished or put plates back in any kind of order. This is common at just about every gym in the area so I don't hold it against any staff. I do 'cleanup' as a matter of habit no matter the condition a station is in when I get there, keeps me warm between sets. There is a competitor in town that has the same hours but I don't see myself switching at any point in the future. Sure, it would be nice if they had more space but this actually works in my case by forcing me to change my routine occasionally and give my body something it wasn't expecting. The crowd is a nice cross section of people & suits me.

name: Lorelei Hobbie
text: I can't wait to get started...wish me luck...skinny girl here I come!!

resp.text: Thanks for the great review Lorelei and thanks for being a member with us!!

name: Strontium Cat
text: Fun small town gym with convenient 24 hour access.

resp.text: Thanks for the great review Strontium Cat!!

name: Sarah Robinson
text: This is my favorite place to train. The music is always upbeat and at the perfect level. Bathrooms are spotless, mirrors are clean (for), and it always smells nice. The manager is SO helpful, and always answers my questions. 😊

name: Thomas Van Pelt
text: Was in town for a few weeks.  This place gave me a great price for the short time.  Awesome music and never too crowded.  Small but has everything you need.

name: Michael Johnston
text: Very clean and well kept gym. Great management. Overall best gym in the river region!

name: Nick Stewart
text: Great management ! Willing to help you with anything you need! I love the motivational music, and the temperature of the gym is great year around !

name: Robert May
text: Good gym . they need to enforce the rules.about age limit in side but is allway clean nice t.v.s music is not to load like most places.

name: Ashley Slatton
text: Good equipment, clean, friendly and helpful staff. Members have access 24/7 .

resp.text: Thanks Ashley!!

name: Shannon Dean
