I was mentally preparing myself to possibly meet my maker, HOWEVER, I survived.  I not only survived, I succeeded.   I was ready for a change so kudos to me (go Bev) for sheer determination!  However, A TREMENDOUS amount of credit is definitely due to Rock Brown, Romen McDonald and the other fabulous trainers who were there to guide us through the workouts. I will say, the workouts were tough for this former couch potato, but I will say more emphatically…THEY WORK!  Between the workouts and the diet, if you follow the instructions (FTDI), you will lose the weight and shape up!  Take it from me, if you want to look and feel better either TAKE THE CHALLENGE or join up to work out with the guys at Squad Fitness…totally worth it!

Thank you Camp Challenge at Squad Fitness / Trussville
From a grateful COUCH POTATO NO MORE,
Beverly Shelton

name: Kelley Javinett
text: I started the Camp Challenge 7 weeks ago. When I first started, I was unsure of how well I would be able to complete the Challenge with my work schedule and my childcare. I also really like to eat, so I was worried about that too. For every excuse I could throw out, Romen had a solution to offer. I used to run a good bit before my second child was born, and I had not gotten back into shape since his birth (he's two and a half). Months and months of running didn't do for my body what the Camp Challenge did in six weeks. It's the 20lb in 6 week program, not the 6lb in 20 week program! The workouts are hard, but never boring, always challenging, and (I kinda want to say fun). If there's a part that you hate, you know it's gonna be over soon. Even though it's hard, you get stronger quickly and I find myself wanting more at the end of the hour. It makes it easier to go back the next day and I miss it when I can't make my workout. At week one, I was doing pushups on my knees and couldn't do a burpee. In week 6, I'm doing of pushups on my toes (with good form) and I can burpee and wall sit with the best of them. The trainers are encouraging and push me to do more than I think I can, which is exactly what I need to get stronger and in better shape. I lost two dress sizes, and feel FREE to put on anything in my closet because I don't have to be self-conscious anymore. I didn't hate trying on swimsuits last week, and actually bought three because they all looked good and I couldn't decide. THAT is a victory in and of itself! The diet isn't bad at all if you like veggies, and I virtually stopped having headaches (which I'm guessing were related to my sugar consumption). It takes planning and prepping, but it's totally do-able, and it made me get creative in the kitchen. And if cooking and prep are not your thing, they even have a meal service that you can purchase too! NO Excuses! You get support all the way. I joined the gym at the end of my challenge because it's a positive, self-care habit in my life now, and I can't do without it.

name: Lynn O
text: I started Firm Body Bootcamp October 30th and have lost 13 lbs. I'm a 54 year old post menopause and was at a plateau. I was spinning, BodyPump and hiking, but my metabolism had come to a standstill eating low carb.  I started bootcamp and the 21 day Holiday meltdown and lost 7 lbs the 1st week.  I feel much stronger and Romen helps you work on areas where you are weak, giving you alternatives to help build you up.  Thanks Romen!!

name: Beverly Rodgers
text: Awesome place and awesome trainers

name: DELY HINDS
text: My favorite exercise place 💃

name: Angela Oquinn
text: Love the workouts

name: Margaret Madison
text: The entire staff is awesome!!  So friendly everyone is always smiling and very helpful.  Jonathan, Aston & Bo & the entire staff really have helped me get back to my exercise routine which is very vital to me.  They push me each visit and I push myself!!  I am very grateful!!  They are very professional and know how to get you moving the correct way!!  I cannot tell you how much that means to me!!  Thanks again!!

name: Jerry Ross
text: My second time to be treated at Therapy South (shoulder first and back this time) and I couldn’t be more pleased with the results.   Problems corrected with no surgery and no drugs and that was my goal.   Wonderful, knowledgeable staff that makes you feel so welcome.   I highly recommend Therapy South based on me experience.

name: Joyce Parker
text: I did 6 weeks of therapy for pain in my back, which had been bothering me  for 8 months. All the therapists who worked with me were informative and helpful, and very patient. The atmosphere at Chelsea is calm and relaxing. I highly recommend TherapySouth Chelsea.  My pain is 99% better!

name: Danielle Gardner
text: I have known Robbie since my daughter went to him for many knee & ankle issues as a competitive athlete. Then came me with multiple issues with my ankle, leg, and hip issues. Robbie truly takes time consulting with his patients and getting them back to their daily tasks. With my multiple sclerosis and falls, I needed help getting me stable again. It took a long time and still going to him as needed, but he gives you the individual time you need. When he isn't there, he makes sure that he places you with another PT that can give you the skills & exercises that you need. Also, he helps you to have exercises thru Therapy South online portal when you are done with your therapy sessions to make sure you are continuing improving at home. That is definitely a good source for any patient. I' &m very blessed to have such good health care outside of the hospital.

name: Joan Garrett
text: I’ve been to other therapists, but the therapists at Therapy South are by far the best. They know their stuff, but they’re also friendly and fun to be around.  You’ll definitely feel better after working with them.

name: Kelly O'Neil
text: I highly recommend TherapySouth Chelsea. Bo and his team were very professional and helpful to my knee problem. Everyone I worked with was so nice and personable, at the same time, was very knowledgeable and helpful. If I should ever need any type of physical therapy in the future I will definitely be returning to TherapySouth Chelsea. Thank you so much for the excellent care I received, and for restoring my strength in my knee to fully recover from my previous surgery!

name: David Patterson
text: Following my left knee replacement surgery on December 22, 2020, I chose Therapy South in Chelsea for my physical therapy.  I based my decision on the convenience to my home.  I was very pleased with the professional care I received from my therapist Bo Dawson.  I steadily progressed with  his hands on skills and goals he set for me.   He communicated with me and made sure I understood what outcome I could achieve.  I plan to use Bo or one of the other therapist when I I follow thru on my right knee replacement surgery.

name: Tony Wheeler
text: I highly recommend this clinic!  They are such a great group of people. Bo Dawson was my therapist for the last year but I have worked closely with all of them. As a team, they helped me recover through the most traumatic experience of my life. Bo, Nathan, JB, Robbie, and everyone else... thank you all, for everything!

name: Janet O
text: Although needing physical therapy is not a pleasant situation, the staff here are wonderful and I can’t say one negative thing about my experience with them. JB was my main therapist and he was always pleasant, professional, and encouraging. All the staff are so helpful and I am glad I chose Therapy South Chelsea. If I ever need PT again, I will definitely go back to them.

name: Michael Seymour
text: TherapySouth Chelsea has an amazing staff! They are all very friendly, knowledgable, and hardworking! You can tell they truly care about their clients and want them to get better, not just linger in perpetual therapy. They make you feel like a part of the family, not a patient or customer.

name: Paula Davis
text: Friendly, knowledgeable staff. They were a pleasure to work with and my son recovered quickly. Would definitely use again!!

name: Greg Jordan
text: These guys are great. Caring, professional and very helpful. This is the third time I have used their services. I highly recommend.

name: Dave Urech
text: Very clean.  Knowledgeable and caring staff that makes it a bit fun!

name: Matt Mason
text: The staff are knowledgeable and extremely personable. They ask good questions, explain how the body is working or why it's not working so well, and how to get you moving in the right direction. If you like, they'll print out exercises so you don't forget any home workouts that they encourage you to maintain. They're even on the ball administratively and do a great job helping you schedule your visits. I don't normally write online reviews but they really are the total package. I wrote this as a small thank you for the great experience I've had.

name: Alex ellison
text: I am beyond impressed with my experience at therapy south and with my PT Bo. I was sent there with some strange symptoms post c-section. It turns out my issue was not physical therapy related but Bo called my physician to make sure I was seen immediately. He has since followed up twice to check on my progress. I really appreciate the extra care this team takes especially since I was only in need of an evaluation.

name: Tanya Adams
text: I highly recommend TherapySouth. They are a very caring staff!!! They do a great job!!! Thank you soo much for helping me!!!!

name: Monica Steelreath
text: I had a great experience at TherapySouth in Chelsea, AL. The Physical Therapists and Assistants were all professional and nice. I had a total knee replacement and I felt that the staff had an interest in my healing process. Hannah always greeted me with a smile. Nathan and Abby adjusted my needs for a speedy recovery. I would definitely recommend TherapySouth Chelsea for your Physical Therapy needs.

name: Seth Boman
text: Friendly staff! Highly recommend!

name: Shirley Robinson
text: The treatment and care I received at Therapy  South in Chelsea after a total knee replacement was excellent.  All personnel  were friendly and  caring.  Special  thanks to   Mitchell  as he worked  more  closely with my  treatment.  I  would  definitely  recommend  this facility  for your  physical  therapy.

name: Myra Shaw
text: I am so appreciative and thankful for the support I received at Therapy South! I was always greeted by my name and with a smile from Hannah! Nathan, my therapist was not only knowledgeable but supportive and encouraging as I worked to get back “back to walking on two feet”. If I ever need PT again, I will be sure to go back to Therapy South!

name: Ariana Mejia
text: My experience with everyone at TherapySouth Chelsea was absolutely amazing. My physical therapist was Bo, and I really appreciate how knowledgeable and personable he was. I highly recommend TherapySouth Chelsea!

name: Rodney Perkins
text: I had the greatest experience at the Chelsea, Al Therapy South location. Nathan and Bo are what  true customer service is like, these therapists not only got me going again they made my visits a dream. I strongly recommend these guys if anyone needs physical therapy. 👍🏽👍🏽👍🏽👍🏽👍🏽

name: Pat Thienpont
text: Therapy South is clean and all the people I have come in contact with are very nice and professional. I have already recommended them to several of my friend’s.

name: Pat Lonvworth
text:
TherapySouth Chelsea and Robby Head are top of the line!  Robby is very professional.  He  helped me during my recovery from hip replacement surgery.  With his caring guidance and mastery of his profession (he has his Doctorate in Physical Therapy and over a decade of experience), I regained my strength, balance, and agility.

I have already recommended Robby to a friend who also had hip replacement surgery.  That friend agrees with my assessment of Robby.  She is very happy with his service.  She in turn recommended her husband who suffers with back issues to Robby.  All three of us are so happy to work with Robby.

Robby is a young man of high character, professionalism, and wisdom.

Pat Longworth Krauser

name: William Chesser (Kenny)
text: Everyone there are knowledgeable and there is no wait time for appointments

name: Elisabeth O'Dell
text: Awesome place for physical therapy! Everyone has the knowledge, expertise, support and guidance to help you through the rehabilitation process....I know, I was a patient and ALL of the staff helped make my recovery a hard, but extremely wonderful experience!! Came in with a walker and left walking on my own two feet. Many thanks and extremely grateful for all of their help and support, especially my PT Bo Dawson!!! They ROCK!

resp.text: Thank you Elisabeth! I'm glad you are doing so much better!

name: Phyllis Mayfield
text: The PTs and assistants are all friendly and professional.  They take a personal interest in the clients.  The facility is clean and they follow the state guidelines for COVID-19.  Nathan, the therapist working directly with me is very knowledgeable and exhibits a true desire for me to improve.

name: Roy Coffey
text: Thank you to all the staff at Therapy South, I am very pleased with my care. Thank you Bo for your exceptional knowledge of what needed to be done so I could avoid knee surgery. Thank you also for be a very kind young man,  I am very grateful. I highly recommend Therapy South, all the staff were very caring and knowledgeable. Martha Coffey

name: Jeffrey Chick
text: Professional, personable, and friendly, showing me great care and concern. And, best of all, Bo got my shoulder straightened out! The exercises he gave me to do at home were very effective! I will be taking all of my future PT needs to Therapy South!

name: Lena Davis
text: I highly recommend Therapy South in Chelsea. The staff is friendly, knowledgeable and caring. When I arrived for each appointment, I was asked how my ankle felt, any issues I was having and then I was told what was going to be done that day for therapy. My therapist Bo Dawson was super to work with!

resp.text: Thank you Lena! We really enjoy getting to know each of our patients and creating a plan that will help our patients achieve their personalized goals!

name: Geneva Talmadge
text: I actually ate at Joseph's table and loved it

name: Danny Cox
text: What I liked most was the constant attention and the one on one care I received. They stayed on top of my progress and showed attention to detail. If and when I need therapy care I will return to TherapySouth Chelsea for that care.

name: Pat and Emily Dubay
text:
My experience at Therapy South Chelsea was with Bo, Nathan and Mandy.  They were all great to work with and very professional and helped me out tremendously.  The facility is very nice and clean.
I really appreciate them getting me on the road to feeling better.

resp.text: Thank you Pat and Emily for your kind words! We love seeing our patients get back to doing the things they love!

name: C Kiser
text: Following full ankle reconstruction, a tendon graft and heel re-positioning, Therapy South and my primary therapist, Bo Dawson, did a fantastic job of helping me regain my range of motion, flexibility and function. I have used Robby Head's team at the Chelsea location on several occasions over the years and was satisfied each and every time. Highly recommend them!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words! I'm glad you are doing so well!

name: Robbie Kirk
text: Caring and personable staff. Patient-centered treatment plan, not just a standardized generic approach. Therapists are constantly researching and learning new innovative methods, especially their occupational hand therapists. I had an unusually difficult tendon repair on my left hand. Three total surgeries due to severed tendon, subsequent rupture, then finally a bizarre autoimmune rejection of the deep tissue stitches. These folks never gave up! They researched ideas to help me improve my flexion and thanks to their efforts, I have finally regained my ability to play the guitar. I will forever be indebted!

name: Ann Limbach
text: When I first struggled to get out of the car for my first PT appointment and my therapist, Bo Dawson, came to help me get out of the car, I thought my total hip rehab was going to be a long difficult process.  Now, 8 weeks post surgery, I am walking normally without even a cane!  My treatment was individualized and personal with achievable challenges and goals injected with humor to relieve any stress.  I saw this happening with other patients as well and the smiles were infectious!  Recovery from surgery is not easy but the team at Therapy South Chelsea makes it a positive, achievable experience!!

resp.text: Thanks Ann! We love serving the people in the Chelsea area!

name: Ron Owen
text: I was very pleased with the attention and care received from the staff that worked with me (Bo, Nathan and Abby).  They all are very knowledgeable and helpful.  Bo's plan of action really helped and the home exercises are simple and should keep the progress that has been made!  I highly recommend TherapySouth CHELSEA.  This was actually my 2nd series of visits... The 2nd issue was a doctor referral in hopes to delay or avoid the need for a knee replacement.  When PT was suggested, I requested TherapySouth CHELSEA because of the care that I received before, not to mention the location for me is absolutely perfect!

name: Ronnie Nabors
text: TherapySouthChelsea made my recovery so easy it almost seems like it never happened. I destroyed my shoulder and had a lot of repair work on it. The professionals here are all caring, and great at their job, I had the pleasure of working with them all over the 3 months of rehab. I used to joke they had to draw straws to see who got stuck with me LOL. If knowing that someone cares about you as well as your healing, this is where you need to be. Thanks again to all my friends there, may you be well.

resp.text: Thank you Ronnie! I'm glad your experience was such a good one!

name: Robert Craig
text: Everyone at Therapy South in Chelsea has been wonderful!  My primary Therapist has been great!  She makes sure I accomplish all the stretches and pulls I need get these muscles back in shape.  Amanda Spalding has lots of experience and will work you over as you improve. Great group!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words Robert!

name: Fred Kendrick
text: Therapy South Chelsea was amazing with my Physical Therapy / Recovery from Total Knee Replacement.  Robby and his entire staff did a phenomenal job from getting my range of motion back to all the strength training.  Very grateful for all of there hard work and support for their patients.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words Fred! Glad you are doing so well!

name: John McPherson
text:
My experience at Therapy South was excellent. Amanda’s (my PT)  knowledge of the problem and solution produced almost immediate relief. The scheduled treatments went well with a clear plan until complete recovery was accomplish. The staff and other employees were always courteous and helpful.
- John

resp.text: Thank you John! Thankful you are back to doing the things you love to do!

name: Paula Tolbert
text: Therapy South is an excellent provider and work with each client to meet each specific need.  The physical therapists truly care for the clients by listening - really listening and taking time to understand what issue needs to be dealt with.  They then create individualized plans that will improve the clients issues.  I highly recommend Therapy South!

resp.text: Thank you Paula! Glad you are doing so well!

name: Jenny Riddle
text: The entire staff is friendly, professional, and truly cares about helping you get better. The atmosphere is cheerful, and I'm always in a better mood when I leave. I have full confidence in all of the therapists abilities, and they've treated my shoulder well. I'm also now a big fan of dry needling, when it can help! They are like physical magicians :)

resp.text: Thanks for your kind words Jenny! We love our patients and love seeing them achieve their goals!

name: Matt Jons
text: The crew at Therapy South Chelsea is fantastic. I would recommend anyone needing PT that lives in the Chelsea area, to go here if you want the very best recovery and overall experience. I had a serious injury & surgery and am very active in life sports. The staff knew they had to get me back in peak shape so I would be able to compete and enjoy sports again. I want to give a special thanks to Erick for helping me get thru this process. It was not easy, but he knew what I needed and encouraged me to be patient and assured me that I would achieve a total recovery. Also, the receptionist, Hannah,  is very efficient & pleasant to work with. A business is only as good as their people and their ability to work as a team. This place is A+ in the people & teamwork department.

resp.text: Thank you Matt! We strive to give patients the best quality of life by providing exceptional care while they are with us!

name: Joanne Williamson
text: The team was very professional and knowledgeable. I would recommend them to anyone needing therapy.

resp.text: Thank you Joanne!

name: Donald Slee, Jr
text:
I have chosen Therapy South Chelsea for the second time in two years to provide me with therapy services to assist me with recovery from my second total knee replacement.  My first experience (in February 2016) led me straight back to the team at Therapy South Chelsea in February 2018 for therapy to assist in recovery from my final total knee replacement.
I was very impressed with the level of expertise, quality of service and the professionalism of the Director (Robby Head), Therapists (Abby and Erick) and the Office Administrator, Hannah, who assisted me with "juggling" sometimes last minute appointments due to a difficult work schedule.
Following my surgery, I was quickly put into a program which aided in restoring full mobility and avoided what I have heard is typical "stiffness" due to the formation of scar tissue.
I can recommend, without any hesitation or reservation whatsoever, Therapy South Chelsea as the premier provider of Physical Therapy in our area.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words Don! We are thankful to have been able to get you going after both of your surgeries.

name: Kris Findlay
text: Very helpful!

name: Billy Studdard
text: The entire staff of Therapy South is both professional and friendly. While the mechanics of rehab may not always be pleasurable the environment in which you rehab can be, Therapy South in Chelsea is a pleasurable place in which to rehab because of the quality of the people who work there. They are professional yet a joy to be around. I would recommend them and will use them again in the future as the need arises.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words Mr. Studdard! We enjoy working with you!

name: Ryan Jones
text: Definitely had a great experience at this Therapy South location. Robbie was wonderful to work with, as well as all of the other staff that I was fortunate enough to work with. If you need physical therapy in the area, this is THE place to go!

resp.text: Thank you Ryan!

name: Elizabeth Cooley
text: TherapySouth Chelsea is where I would recommend anyone, post-surgery or with chronic pain, to go for physical therapy. The therapist are phenomenal in all areas of their field. They listen and work with you according to what is going on with your body. I've done my physical therapy after ACL replacement surgery and my knee is stronger than it has ever been. I'm currently doing therapy on lower back issues and I'm getting better each day. I've even got my mom going for pain management. This is the place to go for physical therapy. I think of the physical therapist and Hannah, Kelly and Andrew as if they were my family, that is just how much they care. I feel so blessed that they are located in Chelsea, AL.

resp.text: Thank you Elizabeth! You were a pleasure to work with and we are happy to have helped you achieve your goals!

name: Clark Kelley
text: Every one was great and professional

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Ashley Arrowood
text:
My journey with physical therapy began during the most painful time in my life to date.  I never imagined the experience would become so personal.  At my first visit, I met with Robby to discuss all my issues.  He has a genuine nature, a respect for where you are in the process, and a drive to see you return to wellness.  He took the time to evaluate me and was methodical in his design of a plan that worked not only in the clinic but could be transitioned to home. He championed me through tough times with kindness, professionalism, and a warmth that led to a trust which is necessary for the recovery process to be successful.  He is a credit to his profession and an asset to TherapySouth.
Throughout the following weeks, I worked with Abbey.  Abbey is truly a pioneer in her field.  She is focused and attentive during every session, kind, compassionate, knowledgeable, and helpful.  When I was doubtful, she was always there to encourage me, being honest with me about the challenges I would face, yet reassuring me that I would one day be able to return to a life filled with many athletic endeavors.  Abbey is understanding and genuinely takes a personal interest in how you're feeling.  She always made sure to explain every exercise in depth and also how it would aid in my progress going forward.  I feel lucky to have been guided by Abbey along my PT journey, for it was her encouragement that pushed me through when I was at my lowest.
Hannah is also extremely helpful and efficient.  Being the face you see when you first walk in, she is cheerful and always greets the patients by name.  TherapySouth has an amazing team and, more importantly, great teamwork.  It is modern and very nice, clean, and an extremely well-run practice.  I couldn't be happier with my experience with something I wasn't at all looking forward to.
Thank you to the TherapySouth team for always answering my questions with interest and patience.  You guys have truly made my recovery a more pleasant experience.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words Ashley! I am thankful you are doing so well!

name: charles lewis
text: Love you guys!!

resp.text: Thanks Mr. Lewis! Glad you are doing well!

name: amanda Carter-williams
text: I love this gym. Top equipment with a friendly atmosphere. It's clean and very well priced.

resp.text:
Thank you for your 5 star review  😊.  We appreciate you  taking the time to support our gym today.
YIt is always our goal to make our club the place to be for all health and wellness support. Thank you again!

name: k.l. bryant
text: It's okay the machine are to close together. I feel like the space isn't quite big enough for all the equipment squeezed into it. The pro is you can workout anytime whether staff is there or not.

resp.text: We appreciate your ⭐⭐⭐⭐. If there’s any way we  can earn that last star, let us know 😊

name: Katrina L. Menefee
text: It's okay place to workout. The only con is the equipment is close together.

resp.text: We appreciate your ⭐⭐⭐⭐. If there’s any way we  can earn that last star, let us know 😊

name: Jason Vaughn
text: 1st day, and was great, thank you!!

resp.text: Thank you for your 5 star review  😊.  We appreciate you  taking the time to support our fitness center today.

name: Mitchell Bonds
text: Friendliest staff around! Every time I walk in they greet me with a smile. I would choose Workout Anytime Fitness over any other commercial gym. Everybody that works out here is friendly and shares the equipment. They keep the weights, bathrooms, and the machines very clean. Highly recommend this gym.

resp.text: Mitchell , thank you for the awesome 5 star review and recommendation.  We take great pride in being able to offer offer our Workout Anytime Jacksonville members and guests the best fitness experience possible.

name: Stacey Gibson (Stacey DeLane)
text: For a commercial gym, it's pretty nice. Good selection of equipment, fairly friendly staff, convenient hours and location. The only negative points are that there is no space for doing pre-workout stretches or yoga, nor mats available for those activities, and there aren't doors on the entrances to the locker rooms (which i prefer for privacy purposes). Aside from that, it's a pretty quality place.

name: David Fendley
text: You can work out any time, day or night, and you feel safe.

resp.text: David, thank you for your review. Because we strive to get better daily, feel free to stop by the front desk and let us know what we can do to earn your five star rating! 🙂

name: Patrick McConnon
text: I work out here almost every day or every other day and I love the fact that it’s close to my house and convenient. Specifically 24/7

resp.text: Patrick, thank you for the review. We truly appreciate you as member!

name: Daradoo1989
text: Haven't been by yet to workout,  but definitely will!  I got a brochure for 3 free days to try before making the commitment!  The folks up here are super nice as well, everyone feels like a family in this small block,  and will give you some giggles along with some workout!

name: Tiffany Medley
text: Clean facility and taking precautions to keep members safe

resp.text: Tiffany, thank you for your positive review; we work hard to make sure our members are well cared for at our gym, and very much appreciate your 5 star confirmation of our efforts!

name: Trooperjeeper
text: Pretty nice place to get fit..

resp.text: thank you for your review of our gym. We appreciate our members so much, and continually strive  to make our gym the best place in the city for our members!

name: David Bunn
text: Over the years I have worked out in a lot of gyms, there is something about this gym that I just love. The staff is always friendly and helpful  and recently a slight re-arrangement of equipment opened up the free weight area and just made it flow better. Little things like that tell me that the staff is watching the members and trying to make things better and make their workouts better, good on them and good for us. Coming from a member since day one in Jacksonville, Thanks

name: Bryanna Hurtado
text: I went there to do the free 14 day trial to see how I liked it. Well first of all the guy that was there took forever because he was new. That's okay but why have the new guy by himself? And he didn't know anything about the 14 day trial, but said I could do the 7 day. Unfortunately if you do these trials, I was told I can only come during operating hours and also only 3 times during the 7 days and only 7 times during the 14 days after I had to go online and fill in the information myself. I wanted to go to this place because of the overnight hours and if i can't go then, then what's the point? The associate wasn't really the problem, it's the company and their policy that makes no sense.

name: James Harris
text: The gym was good got my membership in December and signed the 12 month contract  but unfortunately I had to move in May I still paid for the 12 months but continue receiving invoices after the 12 months but just recently I had a family member die which has put my family in hard times so I called the offices to discuss why I was still being charged and they told me that I had signed the contract in April which is false so I tried to talk with them and they wouldn’t help told me I had to pay 100$ Even though my contract should have expired and email there manager so I did and I still haven’t received a reply so if your decide to workout here don’t sign anything they will scam you!!

name: Kaitlyn Hernandez
text: You would think for a “24-hour” gym they would be able to accommodate 24 hours a day. Well here I am outside the locked door with no one at the counter and no one answered the phone number printed on the door.

resp.text: Kaitlyn, Thank you for  bringing these items to our attention. We strive to maintain a club of excellence and high standards and will use this information to make some improvements and hopefully bring some resolution and satisfaction to valued members, such as yourself. We appreciate your input.

name: Kenneth Fagan
text: Anytime Fitness in Jacksonville, Alabama is a sorry business. Recently, I cancelled my contract with them. My cancellation date was through 11 June 2019. On 2 June, I went to get in to workout and I couldn't get in. Today (7 June), I called them about coming in to workout and the representative said I can only workout when the staff is there. I said what? I am supposed to be able to workout anytime until at least 11 June. So, they don't stand behind their advertisement of workout anytime. That is false advertisement. They do not care about their customers. They are only there for the almighty dollar. This is a horrible business. Do yourself a favor and don't use them. They will take your money and provide sorry service. This was a terrible experience.

name: Robyne Turner-Butler
text: They charge you thing one day and then charge you something else days later. The management is rude and unprofessional.

name: Cody Auman
text: Great place to get a pump. I go early in the mornings and hardly anyone there. I can use what machines or free weights I need to. Got the membership. Definitely will be at this gym from here out.

name: Michael Choron
text: This company is all about making their money..    Way to many people and memberships versus workout equipment.. you have to go super late or super early to get your workout in.. Their not convenient in anyway.. staff doesn't enforce main rule of staying of your cell phone while working out.. I sat for 30 mins while other customer was talking on their phone while sitting on a machine.. I couldnt finish my workout due to this.. they have camera's and see this.. like I said, their just worried about their money..i would suggest going to a different gym..

name: Sydney Burt
text: This is the gym I went to before I moved 5 hours away and when I went in to cancel the membership they said I'd be charged 1 more time because of the 30 day cancelling policy. Which was fine because I understood so I went a few more times before I actually moved && it was never cancelled they currently owe me $120 in fees because they keep charging to my debit card that I only use for emergencies so it keeps going in the negatives and have yet to return my calls. "The money will be returned it 5-7 business days" and it's been 3 weeks and I still have nothing. So everyone pay close attention when you cancel your membership here. The manager Patrick is absolutely NO help. & I'm calling their corporate tomorrow.

name: Carlos Barlow
text:
Nice to see the employee's taking care of the gym & it makes the members willing to help.

Ok update on the gym.. machines are worn out and the last couple of managers have been notified but it's up to the owner to get it done!

Our locations are individually owned and operated, but certainly  the owner of this location does value all his members, and would want to know about anything negative attached to his gym. We will forward this review to the location owner right away. Thank you,   Workout Anytime Corporate Headquarters.

text: I was in Jefferson on business and tried to get a temp membership and further tried to use their 14 day free pas as advertised on their web site  but The lady working the front desk was inhospitable,  unaccomadating and short tempered  (probably from the roids). I’m glad that she turned me away, the gym on McClellan is far superior.

text: Great gym so far . I just joined two weeks ago for the new Anniston location that opens in june . I got two free months at the Jacksonville location since I payed for a whole year only $165. Loving all the clean and new equipment....

name: frank baker
text: Dynamic Krav Maga and Fitness is a great place to learn a very practical form of self defense. Every class teaches practical moves that could be used immediately if you were put into a bad situation. The owner, Marty, is a genuinely nice guy who has a passion for teaching self defense. The assistant instructors are very knowledgeable and most have a background in several different martial arts disciplines. The students in the classes are all very friendly and ages and genders vary. The fitness classes also give a great workout and will help you in getting fit for self defense. Overall I highly recommend Dynamic Krav Maga and Fitness. If you're interested in self defense, you can't go wrong with Krav Maga. If you're thinking about trying it, give Marty a call or text and he can set you up with a free class so you can see if it's for you.

name: Brenna Sullivan
text:
I really love this place. I've learned so much about self-defense, my over-all health has improved (fat lost, endurance and lean muscle gained), plus I have a lot of new friends. Marty, the owner, is a great guy and a great instructor. The other instructors are great as well.

(Also, speaking from personal experience- this is a great place for super-out-of-shape recovering couch potatoes to start :p )

name: Jessica Sena (Communications Consultant)
text:
CrossFit done right!
I fell in love with the constantly varied, high intensity workouts over 10 years ago when I first discovered CrossFit (in my early twenties). Eventually, I got out of the everyday routine and before I knew it, 8 years had gone by. Last February (2019) I got up the nerve to get back into CrossFit and found Oddity (formerly Nomad). I could not have chosen a better gym! No longer in my twenties and several pounds heavier than during my initial CrossFit days, I was intimidated to "start all over". But the coaching and camaraderie are second to none at CrossFit Oddity! A year later, I am stronger than I have ever been. The progress has been phenomenal.
CrossFit is not for everybody. But if you want the best workout (and community) of your life, can humble yourself enough to be coached (and love loud music) ...you'll fit right in at Oddity. My hour in the gym is my favorite hour of every day!

resp.text: Thanks Jessica!  We love having you (and your dog)!

name: Mike Giles
text: Great gym and a great community.  Coaches are great a tailoring the workouts to fit my skill levels.  Everyone can do CrossFit and Oddity makes sure that everyone can be successful.

name: Lindsay Badiuk
text: Very welcoming and catering to modifications

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words! We look forward to seeing you in the future!!!

name: Lauren Sharif
text: I was a novice starting CrossFit and the coaches there scale to EVERY fitness level and are heavily focused on form. David does an incredible job coaching while maintaining a relaxed and fun atmosphere to learn and workout. The community this place has cultivated is a blessing to anyone that enters. Come drop in and try it for yourself.

resp.text: Thank you for the positive review! We strive to make sure everyone gets a good workout and has fun while doing so!!!

name: Andrea Brooks
text: My husband and I joined Oddity a few months ago as complete beginners to CrossFit. We were intimidated by what we knew about CrossFit, but Oddity provides an atmosphere that is truly accommodating of all skill levels. The coaching is great, we always get a great workout, and we never feel ashamed of our beginner status! If you’re on the fence about trying CrossFit, come give Oddity a try.

resp.text: Thank you! We want everyone to get a great workout and feel welcome regardless of their fitness level.

name: Alex Kijowski
text:
Came for the CrossFit workouts, stayed for the workout story time.

Whether you’re looking for a box to call home, or a place to drop in to, you won’t find better than Crossfit Oddity.  They’ve got the best coaches around, and they emphasize proper technique to make sure nobody gets hurt, making us all better athletes as a result.  And they have YOGA!

THANKS ODDITY YOU'RE THE BEST

name: Dominic Zelenak
text: I've been a member of this gym for several months and it was a great choice. I would recommend this gym to anyone who wants to start or continue doing CrossFit, or who wants to practice their Olympic lifts. Class times are very flexible and there are open-gym time slots regularly. The staff is knowledgeable, welcoming, and receptive to your goals.

name: Sean Rheams
text:
I used to travel the country for work and have had the pleasure of dropping into some amazing boxes across the country. I moved to Madison at the start of 2019 and joined Crossfit Oddity from the start. They are one of the top gyms in my books. The coaching staff is top notch, the community is better, and the atmosphere is so much fun!

if you have not had the pleasure of stopping in, then maybe you should! The people are friendly and very welcoming!

name: John Alexander
text: Great CrossFit gym without the ego. Will tailor a plan for anyone.

name: Aimee Doubleday
text: Whether you are new to the area or just need a drop in gym while you're in town for work - CrossFit Oddity is the place for you. I've been a member for almost 3 years now and couldn't be happier. Friendly people and the coaches are top notch. Don't take my word for it - drop in for a visit to see for yourself!

name: Tim Hurley
text: I moved to Madison in early 2019 and Oddity (then Nomad) was the 2nd Crossfit box I tried in the area. This was a mistake it should of been the first one I tried but boy I am glad I did. From the moment I cam to the day breakers class everyone has been so welcoming and helpful. This is by far the best box in Madison and Huntsville area. Amazing coaches, programming and great member . If you're in the area and need a box come by Oddity

name: JayJay
text: The coaches and other members (#fitfam) are what keep me motivated and returning to Crossfit Oddity. Even after an injury, the coaches worked with me to modify every single workout so I would not have to quit. Being a part of this gym and family is what helps me stay focused to be a stronger, better person in all areas of my life.

resp.text: Glad you are sticking with it and we love having you working out with us!

name: Brad Henley
text: I have been part of Crossfit Oddity (then Nomad) for the past 7 years. My fitness wouldn’t be where it is today without my CrossFit Oddity community to push me and keep me accountable! If you are on the fence about trying Crossfit, I recommend giving Oddity a try. You will be welcomed by great coaches who care about impacting your fitness journey!

resp.text: We are happy to have you as a member of our community and as a coach!

name: Jessica Teach
text: This is an awesome gym and awesome community! The workouts are always great and there is additional programming geared at building strength and for RX+ . The owner and head coach is super knowledgable and spicy and strives for you to get the best workout for your capabilities!

name: Bonnie Beddingfield
text: Highly recommend! I love the personalized coaching we are given during workouts.

resp.text: Thank you! We do our best to make sure everyone gets some personal attention!

name: Chad Fowler
text: Great atmosphere of people. Class time to fit any schedule. All fitness levels are welcome.

resp.text: We are glad you found the gym to be welcoming.  We strive to make everyone feel at home.  Loud music, kinda sweaty home, but home.

name: Laura Alexander
text: Great vibe, great community, great programming. And they have YOGA!

resp.text: Glad you like the yoga, we are happy to offer it!

name: janelle cordova
text: Dropped in for a tough and fun workout with a great and welcoming group.

resp.text: We glad you liked the workout!  Come back anytime!

name: Charles Dean
text: Best Coaches around! This is my happy place.

resp.text: We are happy to have you!

name: Chris Lindsey
text: Great Gym and even better people that push me to get better everyday!!!  Come check us out.  You’ll be glad you did!!!

name: Jamie Russell
text: I joined CrossFit Nomad about a month ago and I absolutely love it! I am a beginner. CrossFit was extremely intimidating to think about even starting for me, but I knew I wanted to at least try it.  All of the coaches have been so awesome. They walk me through every step of each workout. I have been to several different class times and everyone has the same supportive and upbeat attitude. I couldn't have picked a better place to start this new journey!

name: Trey Stinson
text: You won’t find a better atmosphere to come hangout, get fit and make some friends along the way.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words!

name: Dale Anton
text: The staff at CrossFit Nomad is amazing - they are knowledgeable and helpful. They teach and encourage the clients to do things properly and because they are so upbeat they get the best performance out of me. The "box" is well set up, it is clean and the equipment is well cared for. This is the most un-gym like experience I've ever had at a gym. There is no posing and the vibe is cooperation not competition. That's not to say that we aren't encouraged to do our best. In fact the way the staff models being good people who are very fit does in fact encourage me to do my best and a bit more. #nomadforlife #crossfitnomad

name: Adam Christiansen
text: Huge concentration on form here, which is the main knock on crossfit. Won't be dissapointed.

name: Heather Cole
text: I moved from Nashville almost 2 years ago and immediately looked for a hot yoga studio. This studio far exceeded my expectations! I’ve enjoyed every class I’ve been to.  I appreciate the variety they offer and the knowledge of each instructor I’ve practiced with. From kickboxing and barre to traditional yoga classes, I’ve been challenged from each one. The facilities are clean and welcoming! You won’t be disappointed trying out a class!

name: Functional Chiropractic
text: This place is great.  I have been doing hot yoga for 15 years.  This has become my favorite place.  One thing I love is the variety of styles and classes.  I send people here all the time because you can easily start as a beginner or be just as easily be challenged if you have been practicing hot yoga for years.

name: Whitney Painter
text: I love this place! I cannot say enough about how knowledgeable the instructors are and willing to help. They are very skilled and masters of their trade. I have recommended this place to my friends, who love it too! Great place:)

name: Tarun Gupta
text: I have been going to HYOH since 2013. This studio is amazing! It provides a perfect ambience for Hot Yoga. The instructors are genuinely there to help you. They have classes for all levels. Great place to make life long friends. With new ownership, sky is the limit! I wholeheartedly recommend this studio. Give it a try, you will be glad you did!

name: Teri Hasemeyer
text: I am loving all the amazing positive changes going on here at HYOH. I have come here since the studio opened in 2010 or so, and the teachers and staff and ownership are just getting higher quality and kinder and even better customer service. I highly recommend hot yoga and highly recommend this studio!

name: Beth Guthrie
text:
I recently had my first experience with Hot Yoga at this studio, and walked in not knowing what to expect. I have a couple of co-workers who were very enthusiastic about practicing hot yoga and said that this was the place to go - I was not disappointed.

The owner of the studio was in conversation with another student when I came in, but made sure to greet me and make me feel welcome. There was a very brief form that I had to fill out with basic information to help the staff make sure you're prepared for your experience, and then after a brief tour I entered for my first hot yoga class.

The class itself was awesome, and was a challenge - but I noticed that because of the room being heated I didn't experience as much tension in my muscles as we worked through the poses. The instructor was very willing to help accommodate those of us who couldn't enter certain poses, and she was also quite helpful in adjusting form or making suggestions on how to modify your pose to get the most out of it.

Between the welcoming staff/instructors, pleasant atmosphere, and variety of yoga classes offered, I will DEFINITELY be back again!

name: Chung-thuy Pham
text:
I loved my experience at this studio!! I think the $20 introductory month is such an incredible value. I took advantage of this and went to as many as 4 classes in one week!

Seek out the classes with Neal or Megan if you can. The classes with these instructors are tough, but Neal and Megan will help you get into the correct form and alignment. They will also help talk you through how to get into and improve on the more difficult poses. They're both very kind and encouraging =)

Unfortunately, I live 30 mins away from the studio and with my college student budget I won't be able to continue classes here. Once my budget allows it, I would love to come back and take classes here again!

name: Ciara Holmes
text: Just moved to the area back in June and have been trying to find a hot yoga studio. Did a lot of scouring in the area and come to find out there aren’t a whole lot of options. Decided to give this studio a try. Took a Yin class with Kris. The class was ok. She talked a lot during the class which I thought was slightly frustrating, her instructions could have been better, and she was on her phone for the most part. The studio was nice, the space however I don’t think is meant for a hot yoga studio persay. The hot aspect is where I felt like the studio fell short. Granted it was just a warm class, the warmth wasn’t consistent, and that may be due to the fact it’s forced heat. I was wanting to sweat and do yoga, I barely broke a sweat. I couldn’t find anywhere on the website or mind and body where they specify what type of heat they have going on.

name: Alex Cross
text: I'm confused. Is this a dog kennel or yoga studio. I came here to do yoga and the first few times were fine. Then last night there were dogs everywhere. I dont want to put my bare feet on dog urine.I shouldn't have to take my shoes off and walk on the same floor that dogs use the bathroom on. Leave the dogs at home.

name: Bailee Barrilleaux
text: I have done regular yoga before and  was curious about this 'Hot Yoga' place. One of my friends convinced a group of us to go and I loved it! I thought I would be uncomfortable in the heat, but I adapted to it and barely noticed by the end! After my class, I felt refreshed and not as tired and/or worn out as I expected, but i still felt like i had a good work out. Also, the teachers were very patient and kind to beginners, such as myself, so do not worry if you have never done yoga before! I  recommend taking a class to everyone!

name: Elizabeth Duling
text: Love this place!  They are encouraging and every time I go I love it more!  Plus sometimes you get to see cute puppies too!

name: Liz Helton Bullard
text: The manager was rude and condescending to me when I went to try my first class, so much so that I wanted to leave and drive back the 20 minute drive that I made out there to enjoy a workday evening yoga class. I arrived to the studio ten minutes before class, and the manager proceeded to lecture me for almost ten minutes about "being late" and "interrupting others in their practice," when, if she had let me go into the room, I would not have been late at all. She insisted that I fill out forms that I had just previously filled out online when I signed up for the class online earlier in the day. The forms asked for all of the exact information (emergency contact, address, experience with yoga...) that had been filled out extensively on the online form, but she made it out to be that I was neglecting a step and trying to casually sidle in late. There were only six or so people in the class, and the manager's lecturing brought me into class about 1 minute late. She reminded me as I went in that "this is Huntsville; it's different." My address lists that I am from Chattanooga, and I don't know if she was trying to make some comment about the caliber and status of clientele attending Huntsville studios as opposed to Chattanoooga ones, or not... but I can say that I am much more impressed with every Chattanooga studio I've been to than this one, which just left a bad taste in my mouth with its snobbery :/ The class was completely unremarkable, sadly. I'd had high hopes for it, especially after the huge deal that the manager made about entering late.

name: Ria Ghosh
text: Best yoga studio in town! Clean studio! Lovely & knowledgeable teachers!

name: Kathryn Story
text:
Clean, Innovative, Inspiring, Enlightening...

What a wonderful addition to Huntsville! <3

name: Streeter Michael
text: I have been doing yoga for many years and I have been practicing Ashtanga, bikram, vinaysa flow, and yoga nidra ect. Robyn and here staff provide a very strong practice and challenging atmosphere. Just like anything else you get out of it what you put in. This place is yoga I know this because I come from a studio in Hilton Head South Carolina at the Jiva yoga center where they teach yoga and the philosophy of yoga. Yoga saved my life and it started in Hilton Head and now I can continue it at the hot yoga center. In closing I just want you to know I start yoga at almost 300 lbs and over a three year period I lost 86 lbs. At the age of 44 I am in the best shape of my life and better then when I was in Special operations with the US Army Rangers.

name: Brad G
text: Great studio with heat and humidity. Instructors work with you (I'm a newbie) and keep the class moving along and enjoyable.

name: Whitney Sirten
text: Love them!!!

name: Janice Kluge
text:
I have been a client at “Chambers Total Body” for a decade and have recommended Mr. Chambers many times. During the time of Covoid he invested in safety precautions above and beyond. He continues to keep sterile environment and his individual attention for personal training is outstanding! There is 30 minutes between clients- for complete turnover.

I was in the studio when the two men came in that gave the ONE star review. They walked right in and did not say anything to the owner. They had materials in their arms that made them look like SALES PEOPLE. And that happens a lot! A LARGE SIGN IS ONTHE DOOR to wear a MASK! Anyone who would give a review like that- after just walking in without calling ahead and already breaking rules- is not really the type of person who comes to workout in this location. I have met many clients over the years. That review was just completely UNFAIR and should be deleted.

name: Meaux La Soule
text: extremely rude when me and a friend walked in just to ask about his services. immediately shoo’d us out of the door like we didn’t belong there. it ruined my day and i won’t be going back.

resp.text: I'm sorry your interpretation of our interaction was that you don't belong here and that you were treated rudely. Our business has clear signage stating, face coverings required. The health and well-being of our clients are extremely important and it's our responsibility to keep the space in which we work as safe as possible for them.  While, It's unfortunate that this rating is reflective of your experience it is in no way reflective of our services.

name: Gary Roubin
text:
Marlon Chambers is the consummate professional trainer. Whether you are 40 or 70y., physical activity is the key to longevity and quality of life. Marlon is able to formulate a circuit of exercises to tune up your core, strengthen your lower extremities and for men," keep you shoulders wider than your waist". And he mixes it up! The workouts match your increasing fitness, your mood on the day and the inevitable appearance of irritated joints and muscles. If consistency is you goal, you will enjoy the experience and be disappointed when you have to miss a session.
As an Interventional Cardiologist, I have a professional interest in fitness and health. I have been working with personal trainers for 30 years. Marlon is the best!

name: Val Walton
text: I am very thankful I have Marlon Chambers as a personal trainer. He is a great motivator and a testament that you do not have to have a hard, drill sergeant attitude to get fitness results. Chambers Total Body, LLC has one-on-one regimens that are designed to do what its name says work your "total body." You will see results, provided you do the work.

name: Anna Schmidt
text: I've been training with Marlon for 3 years now.   Along the way, I've had some major health challenges that Marlon has been instrumental in helping me through.   I'm now strong, agile, slim, and most importantly able to do all those things in life that I really love.  I really appreciate the one on one focus and the way he has individualized a very core-focused program for me.  He even puts my favorite music on and has it ready for me when I walk in.  The facility is immaculately clean and well kept.  The atmosphere is professional and comfortable.  I highly recommend Chambers to anyone considering personal training.  You won't be disappointed.

name: Jimmy Adams
text: Marlon Chambers is a great trainer, working to style the workouts to the client's needs. I have been working out with him Marlon for almost two years and enjoy it. Marlon is also very friendly, and funny frankly. I highly recommend him.

name: john nixon
text: I loss 20 pounds in the first month and the training has improved my energy level.  Marlon is a well trained professional . I highly recommend Chambers Total Body.

name: Paige Daniel
text: My husband and I are long-term clients of Chambers Total Body.  The customized programs and one on one attention is great in helping you meet your goals.

name: Shreyashi Ghosh
text: My son has been associated with this since he was 4 years old and it has been one of the best journeys he have had so far (he is 7 now). They give each of the students personal attention and treat everyone as part of one big happy WorldClass family. My son enjoys it and so do we.

resp.text: We are proud to have the opportunity to be part of your son's journey! Thank you!

name: Brenda Guerrero
text: Every person here is as committed, friendly and professional as you would wish they could be. There is no most accurate description of the experience than being here as part of the big tae kwon do family that Master Scarsella and team have accomplished. Every person that I can name, will be exceptional, from desk to the mat, to mat and office. So happy to be here.

name: Jennifer Campbell
text: We love Master Scarsella's World Class Tae Kwon Do!! My son has learned so much and absolutely loves going to class. The instructors are all wonderful and are very constructive in their teaching. I'm so glad we found Master Scarsella's!!

resp.text: Thank you! We are so glad to have your family part of our school!

name: Rachel Petry
text: We love MSWCTKD!!! We continue to have an excellent experience at this dojang. We have 2 kids that are students and the staff does a great job keeping them engaged and motivated.  I would highly recommend if you or your child are interested, try a class! You will not be disappointed by the customer service and atmosphere.

resp.text: Thank you Mrs. Petry! We are so glad you're part of our TKD family!

name: Adrian Carraman
text: I like the place ,very clean

name: Bri Pena
text: My son takes Taekwondo here and they are awesome! They really take the time with each child to help them reach their individual goals.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words! We are so happy you're part of our World Class Family!

name: Gina Moncada
text: Our experience with Master Scarsella Family is amazing ,we're love the instructors, they're always polite and committed with all the students.

resp.text: Thank you! Looking forward to seeing a Black Belt in your family in the future!

name: Bryan on gaming
text: Don't expect to have frown in your face in this place, I am one student from taekwondo and this place is amazing, they used to have a small area near Inverness plaza and they had grown since then, this place is for all ages and has a great team. Master Scarsella and his team are very nice and will help you, they offer a free 3 day class and they'll let you try out if you dicide if you want to join taekwondo. They also have events every month like taekwondo championships and movie night. I been both of them and is really fun. Children can go to movie nights without their parents but the instructors will supervise them and is really fun. The championship is for all ages and for all belts. They take place in a school other than theirs because it is small. They are socially distant and if you don't feel safe doing in person, you can do taekwondo in home on zoom. Can't give the zoom code meeting for reasons but if you join, they will tell you the meeting code and instructions. A fun way and also a dedication to protect your self while having fun altogether!

resp.text: Thank you for the great World Class review! - MSWCTKD

name: Cheryl Ingram
text: Our daughter has attended training at Master Scarsella's for over 6 years and has grown in leadership and confidence. We are so glad we found Master Scarsella's.

resp.text: Thank you! We love having the opportunity to see her grow!

name: Jacqui Sweet
text: Awesome with children and teaches them respect and discipline.

name: Em M
text: Great experience! Master Scarsella and his staff are friendly, knowledgeable, helpful, and positive! Terrific location and building is really nice too!

name: jerry clements
text: The instructors are world class and work extremely hard to teach the best martial art to any age, and most importantly make it as fun as possible at any age.

name: Weldon Birdwell
text: Such an amazing program. Cannot say enough good things about the staff!

name: Mark Carlisle
text: My son has been taking Tae Kwon Do from Master Scarsella for 5 years.  From the very beginning, the staff has made the classes fun and exciting for the kids.  This is still my son's favorite activity after 5 years solid of participation.  It has been great for teaching my son the discipline required to achieve various goals along the way.  I think it has been great for teaching respect, hard work, and even public performance and confidence!  I would recommend Master Scarsella to anyone who has a child who is interested in martial arts or even just a fun activity.  Just be careful, because they will likely not want to stop once they have started!

name: Luis Resto
text: Great place; awesome instructors.

name: LIn Jo
text: me go liek I go go go win for vicory royalw

name: Rachel Ashcraft
text: Great experience for my son!

name: Jared Flach
text: Jacked athletics is a very high quality high intensity tough exercise and goal oriented gym with courteous and professional coaches who are well equipped to teach anyone of any fitness level. The atmosphere is one that you will find no where around, the workouts are in a group setting that are easy to follow and the people who attend are the most chill individuals that you will click with instantly and support and push you to try hard when you are at your breaking point, the owner Joe Peek will personally coach you during the work outs to correct your form, ensure that you’re within your means and capabilities, and make you better . You will see extreme results from the workouts relatively quick, i personally was able to drop over 20lbs in my first 2 months. Jacked is a great place for anyone to start, learn, and grow with.

resp.text: Thanks for the review, Jared!  You've come a long way since Day 1.  Specifically, we've seen your coordination and mobility improve tremendously.  Keep after it and congrats on making the fitness level leaderboard last month!

name: Eric Green
text: Amazing trainers, full of motivation and excitement throughout each workout. Highly recommended

name: Chelsey Smith
text: “Love this place! All the coaches make you feel welcomed from day 1.  I never picked up a barbell before then but the coaches have helped me every step of the way.  If your looking for a workout that will push you everyday this is the gym!  I can't say enough great things about Joe and his team."

name: Joseph Willis
text: Ive been at Jacked Athletics and Nutrition for a few months now. Coming in to this I had zero experience and a bit intimidated. Joe and his coaching staff really invest the time to teach proper technique. The atmosphere is wonderful, the gym members are a delight and the experience is very family-like.

name: Samuel Adams
text: Jacked is the best gym I’ve ever been a part of! The coaches are very knowledgeable and really keep you motivated. The programming is challenging but still offers something g for every fitness level.

resp.text: Love having you part of the gym and enjoy seeing the determination you have in climbing the fitness level leaderboard.  Keep up the great work!

name: Roxy Simmons
text: "I love the motivation and support you get from everyone! You are encouraged to step outside your comfort zone but not pushed beyond your capacity!"

name: Jessica Traywick
text: This is my favorite place. The workouts are challenging, the coaches are knowledgeable and the people are so supportive. My fitness has improved so much since I’ve been here.

name: TRACI COTTRELL
text: Love my gym, my family!!  This place isn’t just a gym it’s a home. Everyone makes you feel welcomed.

resp.text: Thanks, Traci!  You're our most consistent athlete at Jacked.  You truly live #nevermissaworkout.  We love you for it.

name: Donna Ridings
text: More than just a workout, a community. Love the support from all the people there!

resp.text: Thanks, Donna!  We enjoy seeing you each week in our morning classes.

name: Rachael Gordon
text: You won’t find a better gym! Amazing staff and gym members that cheer you on and become family!

resp.text: Thanks, Rachael!  It's been fun to watch your transformation and see such a huge strength increase.  Fantastic!

name: Michael C
text: Great atmosphere with awesome coaches and workouts.

name: Ashley Hamm
text: If your looking for more than just a gym then crossfit jacked is the place for you. Great atmosphere, with skilled coaches and great people who become family. You won’t regret joining!!

resp.text: Thank you, Ashley!  We love having you as a part of our community.

name: Beka Dollar
text: Great place to take your fitness and health to the next level. The workouts are insanely challenging but you will instantly feel stronger after just one workout. Come give it a try and meet some awesome new people and staff! Love CF Jacked!!

name: Donald Murrill
text: I've been with Crossfit Jacked for nearly three months and I not only lost 24lb but gained muscle. I have a six-pack that was buried beneath all that potential and hard work. It's not a walk in the park..., or maybe it is, it depends on how you look at it. Hold 35-50lb weight in each hand above your shoulders and then go walk in the park. However, you will meet good friend you never thaught you had. Its all worth it.

name: lynn Miller
text: IF YOU WANT A POSITIVE CHANGE WITH A GREAT TEAM OF COACHES THIS IS THE PLACE TO GO. I HAVE ONLY GREAT THINGS TO SAY ABOUT  CROSSFIT JACKED. THEY REALLY CARE ABOUT YOU!! THEY MAKE SURE TO GIVE YOU HEALTHY EATING RECIPES THAT TASTE GREAT. THEY MAKE SURE THAT YOU ARE DOING YOUR WORKOUT CORRECTLY. YOU DO NOT FEEL LIKE  ANOTHER NUMBER. THE TEAM ACTUALLY KNOWS YOUR NAME. TO ME THIS IS IMPORTANT. YOU WILL SEE RESULTS. THEY KEEP YOU MOTIVATED!!!!!!

name: Alisha Stoecker
text: I am on my third week, and everyday I feel stronger. It is such a great atmosphere and everyone is so friendly. All the coaches are amazing. They push you to do better.

name: Kane Foster
text: Best gym in Alabama hands down!! Great coaching staff and a great group of people to be there and push you towards your goals everyday!! Come try them out.

resp.text: Appreciate the kid words, Kane!  You're a pleasure to work with.

name: Daniel Bridgman
text: If you are interested in improving your health this is the place for you. The coaches are knowledgeable and ready to adapt any workout to your current ability. Don't plan on staying at that level for long though. The results are fast and long lasting. Come in this week!

name: Wilson Bryant
text: We've had a great experience with Crossfit Jacked for almost a year. We have meet great people that are now considered friends. I would recommend them if you are looking for somewhere for the whole family to workout or if you are a individual. Good people!

name: Latasha Bryant
text: One of my favorite places to go! This place makes me want to see how far I can push myself! Staff is extremely helpful, and members are very encouraging! Great place to get fit, have fun, and make life long friends!

name: Melissa Jones
text: Super great coaches that really put in the time to teach proper technique. Quality workouts that challenge beginners to experts! Highly recommend Crossfit Jacked!

name: Joseph Blaise III
text: I have lost so much much weight and gained more muscle and confidence in myself! Great staff and every memeber wants everyone to get better. Perfect place for anyone who is ready to make a change for better health!

name: CLB draws
text: I've been doing crossfit for 3 months now and I'm down 2 full pants sizes! I am stronger than I have ever been! Joe and Kelly are amazing owners!

name: Tonya Read
text: When I started I could only back squat 40lbs.  On August 10th, my 4-month anniversary, I did 10 sets of 2 reps at 160lbs. I think that is a pretty good improvement for me, along with losing 20lbs.  Thank you CrossFit Jacked!   Stay tuned for more improvements & weight loss results :-)

name: Libbi Cottrell
text: This gym has been the best decision of my life. I come from a back ground of all-star cheerleading and recently had to quit due to medical issues  I couldn't exercise for 6 months after quitting and since I've started crossfit I'm in the best of shape I've ever been! They have amazing coaches and such a great positive atmosphere!

name: Shemika Brown
text: Crossfit Jacked is a great place to take your workouts to the next level. You will be challenged but have fun at the same time.

name: Bo Crowe
text: Super nice people that just want to help you get in better shape!

name: Erica Bridgman
text: If your looking to start with CrossFit or continue with CrossFit this is the place for you! Very attentive staff! Crossfit Jacked is definitely a place to call your CrossFit home!

name: Keith johnson
text: Crossfit is something I’ve never done before, until I tried it this past summer.  The trainers at Crossfit Jacked are truly dedicated to helping ME as well as everyone else improve. I have never felt like I was asking a dumb question. I am so glad I’ve gotten stronger and feel great. Thank you Crossfit Jacked!  See you tomorrow!!  Shauna Johnson

name: Amber Chavis
text: I never thought I would be able to start crossfit at 40...but crossfit jacked help me see that 40 is just a number. Crossfit gives me such a feeling of great accomplishment every time I finish a session. The staff is great and help you feel like you belong.

name: Ethan Jordan
text: Great gym and staff, couldnt ask for a better environment to workout in. Coaches are very supportive and encouraging.💪🏻 #JackedAndStrong

name: Rian Melchiorre
text: I was always skeptical about crossfit, however, that all changed when I stepped foot into Crossfit Jacked. Joe and his staff are awesome. Not to mention the great people you meet at the gym that become like family. It's not like the "gym", it challenges you everyday. Thankful for my crossfit family. I am now a firm believer, I love it!!

resp.text: Thank you, Rian!  We're so grateful to have you part of our community.  Keep getting stronger.  You're doing fantastic! - Joe

name: Aaron Godwin
text: Crossfit Jacked is an awesome community of people trying to get healthier together.  Other places boast "the judgment free zone", but what's the point of working out and not seeing results. Crossfit Jacked is all about helping you get from where you are, to where you want to be.  The staff and members are so helpful to everyone of all fitness levels.  I hadn't lifted weights in 15 years when I started here, and I was in extremely poor condition.  Owner Joe Peek and staff helped me lose 53 pounds of straight up fat, in my first 5 months.  With their continued support, the sky is the limit for me!  Whether you are a seasoned gym rat, a couch potatoe, or somewhere in between, you won't be disappointed for giving Jacked a try.

name: Travis Chaos
text: Friendly and knowledgeable coaching staff.  Best programming in Mobile.

name: Lauren Read
text: Crossfit Jacked is amazing, I love it so much and it helps!!!

name: Destiny McCoo
text: Best place

name: Jay Elliott
text: Way to go Joe on your new box. I want to grab a drop in visit sometime soon.

resp.text: Come on in, Jay!  We'd love to have you!

name: Foster 5 Media
text: Kevin and his staff are incredible.  The attention to detail from a training standpoint is amazing.  My 8 year old son loves coach Kevin and looks forward to every training session he has with his youth training group.  I highly recommend Kevin and his company based on his sheer passion and his ability to not only train his clients effectively, but his ability to mentor and impact their lives as well.

name: Sebastian Goldman
text: KB is the best at getting you to where you want to be.

name: Jason Burroughs
text: Greatest trainer known to man! I recommend him to anyone whether you’re training as a professional or for lifestyle. This is next level!!!

name: Tracey Gann
text: Kevin Brown is an exceptional trainer! He is professional but pushes you to work hard toward your goals.  You have to give Extreme Fitness and Performance a try, I can't say enough words about them.  Awesome workouts!

name: Tamika M. Arnold
text: Kevin Brown runs a great program and the kids love him!

name: Remy Helu
text: Excellent place personal attention

name: RJ Love
text: Great Place! Good people

name: Jessica Wilkes
text: This gym is great! Best combination of challenging workouts and patient/ skilled coaching, the best crossfit gym around!

name: S F
text: The best gym in town with the most knowledgeable coaches to get you in the best shape possible!

name: Harrison Horton
text: As a 5-year Crossfit athlete that is a certified coach and has visited countless Crossfit gyms across the country, I will tell you that ALL IN Crossfit is a great community of like-minded individuals looking to improve their level of fitness along with the confidence they have in themselves. On top of the great workouts and coaching that you will get on a daily basis they offer many out of the gym events that help build camaraderie within the gym. Before making my decision on which gym to join, I visited each Crossfit gym in the area. I ended up choosing ALL IN because they were the ONLY gym that bothered to return my phone call and offered to show me around the gym before I made my decision. ***ALSO, ignore the unjustified 1-star reviews from people who obviously have no supporting evidence to back their claims.***

name: Mike Cahill
text: This is an AWESOME gym!  Great coaches.  Great folks.  A real feeling of community.  Athletes that encourage and push one another and have fun doing it!  Don't waste your time looking anywhere else...come join us at ALL IN Crossfit and get "Better Than Yesterday!"

name: Bert Schulingkamp
text: Started going here when I started college and would come home for the breaks. When I moved back home to auburn I was in search of a gym to get me back in shape and that offered a sense of community. All In has done an amazing job of getting me back on track with my fitness and offered not only a community but a family. I am thankful for the amazing coaches and members at All In and wouldn't go anywhere else.

name: Kyle Donaghey
text: Exceptional place, people, and experience.  I started going in April 2013 when I was new to Auburn and I can say 4 years later that was one of the best decisions I've ever made.  All In has given me much more than just a fitness experience (although they are great at that too); I've found friends through the coaches and members and made connections that have helped me both personally and professionally.  The business model is pretty unique in the fitness industry; you can pay as you go (which is how I started) so you are not bound to any long term contracts.  As far as the actual workouts go, All In changed working out for me from a chore to something I look forward to and enjoy, and is often the highlight of my day.

name: Anthony Dean
text: Outstanding! Great people! Amazing workouts. Absolutely top notch

name: Kanesha Blake
text: I could not say more great things about All In!! All In has the BEST community in Auburn, hands down. All of the coaches and members are awesome and make the atmosphere SO welcoming & enjoyable!! Great workout. Great people. Knowledgeable coaches.  All In is the way!!! #BETTERThanYesterday

name: Katherine Israel
text: Great gym! The coaches are fun and knowledgable and the members are supportive no matter what your level of fitness is at that time.  Walking in the door helps you be "better than yesterday"!

name: Brent Miller
text: I have been a member of All In CF for 3 years and could not picture going anywhere else. Chris Harris and Shelby Levy, along with the other coaches will teach you and push you to be a better you. Love my All In family!!

name: Ken Natori
text: Well established coaches that cater to all levels of athletes and makes everyone feel at home and comfortable. Truly tight community that will make you fall in love with All In CrossFit!

name: Christy Garner
text: It is a place that you can call home!  The coaches are wonderful the environment is friendly and welcoming.  No other place I would want to be....

name: catherine Lowder
text: I LOVE this gym, the coaches and the members.  It's truly like a family.  You will find yourself looking forward to the dreaded burpees!

name: S Kirkland
text: I love the coaches here. They are very helpful and experienced. I highly recommend ALL IN with no hesitations.

name: Robin Roberts
text: If you are looking at trying crossfit, look no further.  I have been a member of a All In since it opened and couldn't imagine being anywhere else.  Stop by for a great workout and the opportunity be a part of an amazing community of athletes!!

name: Stephanie Huff
text: I love All In Crossfit! The coaches are the best!Whatever your fitness level is, they will help you and encourage you to be better than yesterday!

name: Libba Brannon Harris
text: I love ALL IN! It's a welcoming and friendly environment. The coaches are super friendly and very knowledgeable.

name: Maddie G.
text: Unknowingly was put on the "auto pay" system when I specifically asked to be charged to go for ONE month. I even double checked to make sure I wasn't on auto pay, because a friend told me that is how it works. A worker went online to my account and said, "thank you for telling me you don't want to be on auto pay, because you were. I will take you off." They DID NOT take me off. When I called and asked for a refund, they said that it was my fault and did not give me my money back!! Poor customer service. Put themselves before the customer first. Was really surprised and frustrated that they did not give me my money back and acted like everything was my problem.
