resp.text: We pride ourselves in treating our customers like we want to be treated and will gladly cancel anyone's membership if we receive written notification within 7 days of their bill date. Our policy is clearly stated on the waiver our customers sign when they become a member. This customer was on our auto-pay system for six months before she contacted us asking for a refund. Out of courtesy, we refunded her one month of membership fees. We regret that she thinks she was treated unfairly, but we were only enforcing the policies we have in place and that were agreed to by her when she signed up.

name: Kathryn Gullatte
text: Great coaches, fantastic get pumped music, And people who have a passion for fitness!

name: Tracy Young
text: Knowledgeable coaches, clean gym, super people! I highly recommend!

name: Taylor Cooper
text: The coaches are fantastic and the atmosphere is very welcoming! The best box in Auburn.

name: john Israel
text: Great Gym for all ages.

name: Jeff Brittain
text: Dalton is great.  Well equipped box.   Friendly members.

name: Joshua Anderson
text: This is by far the best CrossFit box I have ever been to! The staff is ALWAYS in a great mood and the people are like family. I have NEVER had a bad day at this box. 10/10 would recommend to anyone who is looking to start or continue their fitness journey!

name: jonathan arrington
text: Professional Coaching. Friendly atmosphere. Great facility. This gym is the premier CrossFit gym in the Auburn Opelika area.

name: Kayla Casper
text: I am a traveling crossfiter and have been to many gyms across the states. CrossFit on the Plains is one of the best gyms I have had the opportunity to drop into. Programming is great, coaches are knowledge, and the community is very welcoming! If you are in the Auburn area and need a good quick work out stop by here!

name: Ryan Michael
text: I walked into this Box while visiting family in Auburn. I was/am new to Crossfit having only been working out for 2 months and I walked into The Filthy Fifty the day after Thanksgiving. The staff and owner were extremely nice and helpful with some of the movements that I was not familiar with. I spent a little over an hour here and had a great time, I will continue to attend this Box when I am visiting family. I would strongly recommend this Box to anyone that is thinking of giving Crossfit a try. As a side note The Filthy Fifty is horrible, but I would do it again.

name: Grant Middleton
text:
So my 3 stars isn’t based on the WOD. It’s simply based on how it started. I was dropping in since I was out of town from my regular gym and brought my friend who’d never done Crossfit before. As we walked in, we were told by a member to go talk to two guys in the corner away from the class. They then direct us to go talk to the coaches to get us checked in. As we’re walking away, Dalton (owner) asks if we’ve done Crossfit before and my friend says “no” as Dalton then kinda puts his hand in his face and says “Oh my goodness.” I was pretty shocked...as an owner of a box, you have the opportunity to gain maybe two members but after that first impression, definitely not.

With that said, the workout was great! The coaches were super helpful to my friend and we definitely got a good WOD in for the day. Potentially would go back, but definitely not for who owns the place. Afterwards, I heard a few other people say not the greatest things about the owner, so hopefully he learns some people skills and grow his gym more in the future.

name: David Heigl
text: Great staff, great community, owner puts his heart into the gym.

name: Brandon Rowland
text: Fantastic box. Knowledgeable coaches and strong community.

name: Marissa Gray
text: I completed the "exhausted to energized" program for the entire 28 days. I got great nutrition advice and guidance from Elliot. I felt like I truly got a custom fitted program to suit my lifestyle and body type. This program is a must if you need to kick start your journey to wellness. I am so thankful for everything I have learned and the welcoming "come as you are" environment. I also got great coaching on my form from taking classes with Jordan. The coaching alone is worth every penny.

resp.text: Thank you for the awesome review Marissa. We loved coaching you and having you as a member of the community!

name: Tabitha Eldridge
text: Live ready fitness is a great gym for beginners and professionals alike. The coaches are great at finding what works for you and offer the best advice whether it be something to do with nutrition or with an alternative work out. The environment is friendly and vibrant. The classes are hard work but worth it. I highly recommend to anyone ready to learn and put in work!

name: Cody Abbey
text: Elliot is an incredible coach. His knowledge, leadership, and mentorship will quickly assist anyone in ascending to the highest version of themselves. Anyone considering joining this program will join an environment that caters to the maximum growth of the mental/physical wellbeing of any individual!

resp.text: Cody thank you so much for the review. You help us to ascend to higher version of ourselves as well. Thank you again!

name: Lisa Fountain
text:
I met gym owner, Elliott Quinones, about 8 years ago. I was impressed with his knowledge and ability in the area of health and fitness. Elliott is all about community. He's played a huge role in helping me establish my non-profit, Scarlett's Closet . He's even a member of my board.
Last year, after attending one of the fundraisers Live Ready hosts for us annually, I saw pictures of myself at the event and realized I needed to take control of my life and be the healthiest version of Lisa I can be. I started doing workouts in my home and making better food choices. By May of this year, I'd lost 41Lbs, but the scales had stopped moving. I reached out to Elliott and he told me I was most likely in a calorie deficit.  I recall my response; I laughed at him. He encouraged me to sign up for  a "Love to Eat Challenge" Through this challenge, I was taught what to eat and how my plate should look. I am happy to report that I won the challenge and to date, I have lost 64lbs. I am wearing the smallest clothes I've ever worn as an adult. I recently had surgery and  Elliott has asked me to start training with him once my Doctor clears me to do so.  In the past, I would have said, "No way." Now, I have the confidence I need to accept the challenge.
If you are looking to make positive changes in your life, I urge you to contact Elliott and his team. They are not only the best at what they do, but some of the nicest and most encouraging people you will ever meet. You won't feel pressured or intimidated. I am grateful for all their help and encouragement. I've never felt better. Isn't it time you took the first step to a healthier you? call them today!
Lisa P. Fountain, Founder
Scarlett's Closet

resp.text: Thank you Lisa. We love and appreciate you very much and the entire staff could not be more proud of you.

name: Nina Fletcher
text: Upon arriving in Columbus, I was looking for a gym that would be mindful of past injuries and would help me build up to a healthy place.   Having been a gymnast I deal with a lot of neck issues and was worried I would not find a place that could help me work with through them. Thus, I spent a lot of time researching different options in the area and several individuals recommended Live Ready Fitness.  So I took a leap of faith and I scheduled a consultation.  I walked away feeling optimistic about their one-on-one approach.  I started working with Coach Elliott who has been instrumental in helping me make strides in my personal health journey. They have not only worked with my injury but also have shown me ways to make it better. Overall, I highly suggest you see Coach Elliott at Live Ready Fitness (or anyone of the amazing Live Ready staff!) if you are looking to make a change and interested in working with an all-star staff that provides the utmost competence!

resp.text: Thank you Nina! We appreciate you trusting us with your health. You are an All-Star client!

name: Fonda Board
text: I came from your regular “Globo gym", and let me tell you, I have never experienced a workout like this. It is challenging in the best way possible. Coach Elliott not only walked me through how to do every movement, but he also explained best nutrition practices, and taught me how to approach each workout with a purpose. The entire team and the community are so nice and were very welcoming. Since I’m coming to a new city with no friends that was very important to me. This has been an overall great experience.

resp.text: Fonda, we are so excited you allowed us to help you reach your goals and even more excited that you have a community of friends now!

name: Heidi Cummings
text: As someone who has worked in fitness for the last 8 years, I can say with confidence that Live Ready Fitness is the best gym in the Columbus/Phenix City area. Elliott has taken the time to become highly educated in all things fitness and nutrition, and he has built a professional, world class team of coaches around himself. Elliott invests in his employees, so that they can all collectively invest in their members. If you're in the area, do yourself a favor and try out Live Ready Fitness. Guarantee you won't regret it.

resp.text: Thank you for the amazing review. We are so lucky to have you as part of the team and community.

name: Chase Etheridge
text: This place will seriously get you in shape. I’ve lost 20 lbs and feel better than ever!

resp.text: Thank you Chase! We see the change in you and love it!

name: Rebecca Jungman
text: I waited to join Live Ready because the price of the gym is a little higher, but honestly after the first session, I realized they are worth every penny. The care and attention Elliott and his team give is unmatched. They truly care about every one of the people they work with. Oh and bonus the facility is amazing! I absolutely recommend joining this family, because that is exactly who you become to the coaches and fellow athletes.

resp.text: Thank you Rebecca. We truly appreciate our medical professionals and are honored to help take care of them because you all deserve it! Thank you again for being part of our community!

name: Stephanie Swoger
text: If you think that you are too injured to workout you are wrong. I have been recommended to have two knee replacements and a shoulder replacement (after one has already failed).  I was in constant pain. I had given up and being a former member of Live Ready and seeing all the new programs they had started I thought this is my last hope. Coach Elliott was completely honest with me and said there were no guarantees but he thought that he could help. After three sessions a week for the last month I already move better, see strength gains and my knees hurt significantly less. That is only outweighed by the fact that THIS TRULY IS THE BEST HOUR OF MY DAY. The coaches and community have so much care for one another it is inspiring. Everyday is new challenge but I am incredibly excited for what the future holds.

resp.text: Thank you, Stephanie Swoger. It is such a pleasure being able to work with you and seeing the amazing progress you have been making. The team and I are committed to getting you to your healthy happy place! Thank you again!

name: Stephanie Hawkins
text: Mom’s who don’t think they can do it, I am here to tell you that you can. I have twin toddlers, I was not eating enough food to keep my energy up throughout the day up and somewhere I lost myself. Coach Samantha and the Live Ready team changed that. After just a few sessions, my body started to change, my mood and sleep was so much better, and my confidence soared. My husband even noticed the change in me. I feel unstoppable and can do things for myself and my family that I didn’t ever think I could do. If you are hesitant and think it is not possible, SEE COACH SAMANTHA, she truly cares about her clients!Take back control of your life.

resp.text: Stephanie you are an inspiration to moms and people everywhere! Seeing that kind of change in someone fires us up!

name: Andrew Pate
text:
I will state that even know my time here was short. The staff of coaches are super supportive, knowledgeable, and dedicated to their team of clients.

Know that they have gone above and beyond in these difficult times. Providing continuous support and training with creativity.

Overall I would highly refer this gym to each and every individual I meet. You will not be disappointed.

Big Shoutout to Coach Sam, she is awesome. Very knowledgeable and has a keen ability to apply what’s most effective for any limitations you might have with your physical aptitude.

resp.text: Thank you Andrew. We are glad we could make an impact in such a short time. Please reach out if we can ever help you with anything!

name: Carli Culpepper
text: My knee pain was so bad I honestly thought I would never be able to do some of the things I loved again. It was affecting my workout, my job and my entire state of mine. Within 4 weeks of working with Coach Elliott and the Live Ready Fitness team I was pain free and back to living my life again. Elliott and his team are absolutely amazing. If you have joint pain go, see them!

resp.text: Thank you Carli! We are so happy we could help but it is is always so much easier when we have a fantastic client like yourself!

name: Sabrina Robertson
text: I was searching for something to help me get my weight under control and stumbled upon an ad for CrossFit Deprivation on Facebook. They were doing a 6 week challenge and that sounded like a great jump start. I worked with one of the coaches and she suggested just giving it a try. I did and I completely fell in love with the whole experience. The workouts were challenging but could always be modified to fit me and what I was able to do and they were always different. The community was so supportive and encouraging that I wanted to go back everyday for a new challenge. They helped me with nutrition and have taught me how to feel good by eating to fuel my body's performance and feeling good about how I look has been a pleasant side effect of trusting that process. I have gained confidence, motivation, strength, and friends. It's been 2 years now and I wouldn't want to go anywhere else. This place is like a second home and the people are like family. If you are a human and need help with health or fitness, this is the place to go! It's so much more than a gym! Give it a try and you will fall in love with it, too!

resp.text: Thank you Sabrina. You truly are such an impactful member of our community and have grown so much as well as helping us grow as coaches. Thank you again!

name: Kayla Brossard [Student]
text: Ya’ll I hated working out! And when I tried I would always feel some sort of pain in my knees and hips. I also always felt lost when I went to a gym. Elliott and the Live Ready team have changed my tune. Within 4 weeks my knee pain was gone. Not only that but, the workouts keep me interested and I feel so accomplished after. I can already see changes in my body as well! I am so excited to see what I can do and how I feel over the next few months. DO NOT WAIT. IT WILL CHANGE YOUR LIFE. #ConfidentAF #LiveReady

resp.text: Thank you Kayla! We had so much fun taking you through foundations and can't wait to see your progress in class!

name: Kurt F
text:
Excellent facility.  Staff is not only very knowledgeable, but extremely approachable you can feel that they care about your process just as much as you do.

My experience through the PT sessions was one of tailoring it to my ability and my schedule it didn’t just feel like some walk through you had to complete to get to the next level.

If your looking for a place to feel welcome and to be challenged, you’ve found the right place.

resp.text: Thank Kurt! We are so pumped to have you in classes and as a part of our community. Thank you for trusting us with your health, wellness and fitness. We look forward to crushing some goals with you.

name: Taylor Strawder
text: Hands down the best gym I’ve ever joined. I came to my first class a little over a year ago and was scared at first but the coaches work with every and anyone and they have made my experience with CrossFit AWESOME. The coaches always do their absolute best to make sure we are performing the movements correctly and most importantly safely. This gym has definitely taught  me I can do a lot more physically then I ever thought I could and I will forever be grateful for all the help from these amazing people!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the review Taylor! We will forever be grateful for the kind words. It is so awesome seeing your progress through your fitness journey and we all look forward to seeing you continue to kill it!

name: David Anderson
text: Elliott has a unique and elite approach to fitness. Whether your goals are general wellness or higher levels of performance Elliott and the other coaches will be able to accommodate. I have been to CrossFit gyms on 6 continents and I have never seen this model or been so catered to my needs. Elliott is a positive coach that has an understanding of each individual’s fitness goals and how you can achieve them. I am currently an athlete at CFD and cannot speak highly enough about the coaches or facility.

resp.text: Thanks David. We truly appreciate the review and love watching you absolutely crush it in and outside of the gym.

name: vicki ijames
text: I really respect the coaching staff with Crossfit Deprivation. They pay attention to safety and which is so important in Crossfit. If you have a pain or an injury, the coaching staff ensures that athletes are going to workout safely without further injury.  I appreciate coaching I've received and the personal attention to my injuries and training needs. The staff is cohesive and work together as a team and is such a welcomed experience!

resp.text: Thank you Vicki. Coming from an incredible athlete like yourself that means alot. We appreciate you!

name: Thomas
text: One of the most professional businesses.  Best coaches I have worked  with Sam and Jacqueline are awesome.  I give them 2 thumbs up👍👍

resp.text: Thomas thank you for that absolutely awesome review. We look forward to helping you crush all of your goals moving forward!

name: Thestayathomepawmom
text: This is an amazing gym and community! The coaches at the gym are there for you 110%, there is never any judgment, only people cheering you on and helping you be successful and reach your goals. You get a coach for life and Allison Shiver is my girl! She knows her stuff, is funny, kind and genuinely there for you. You not only get an amazing coach with her but a great friend. It doesn't matter your skill level this place will challenge you in the best ways! If you have any doubts go see coach Alli, she'll change your mind 😉

resp.text: Thank you so much for the love! We love being your coaches and friends for life.

name: Hillary Stamey
text: CrossFit Deprivation is the best gym that I have ever walked into. The positive attitude and sense of community is absolutely contagious. The staff and coaches are kind and attentive. They work along side you, encouraging you, and pushing you to reach your full potential. I decided to participate in a weight-loss challenge on a whim and have found a place that I have come to love. Put in the work and give it a chance, this place will change your life.

resp.text: Thank you so much Hillary. Working with clients like you changes our life as well!

name: Britney Moffett
text: I’m so glad I joined! I’ve never done Crossfit before and I love it because it feels like one big team/family. The workouts can be challenging, but that’s expected. The meal plan is something that I can definitely stick with and the team is so helpful. I will definitely continue after the 6 week challenge!

resp.text: Thank you for the review Britney! We are glad we could help and thank. you for being part of the family!

name: gregory walters
text: I love this place, it’s one of the best decisions I have made in a long time. The staff/coaches are amazing. Every workout gets broken down step by step before the start of every workout. All the coaches are super approachable and knowledgeable. Everyone gets treated with respect, and it’s a judgement free environment!

resp.text:
Thank you so much for this absolutely amazing review Gregory. We love having you as a part of this community and look forward to working with you. We work so hard because of people like you!

-CFD Team

name: D. Neely
text: I participated in the 6 week challenge and I loved every minute of it. The staff is very knowledgeable and motivated to helping you reach your goals.  Not only is the staff/trainers awesome the atmosphere is amazing and very positive. The members are just as encouraging and supportive. I would recommend this gym to any and everyone!

resp.text: Congrats on your 6 Week Challenge, Deej -- isn't it a great feeling? We're so glad you joined us. We hope to see you again soon! -Elliott Q, Owner

name: Emily Clymer
text: Seriously one of the best gyms I’ve ever been to! Super personalized and everyone is crazy friendly and supportive!

resp.text: Thank you Emily. You have been such an incredible addition to our community we feel like w should be thanking you!

name: Jayson Teague
text: This place amazing.  It is a real personable experience to work out here.  Every class time has multiple coaches that actually take the time to coach and not just watch you workout. I did the 6 week challenge there and became a member afterwards.  Great place and family.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the awesome review Jayson, though I think it should say I crushed the 6 week challenge there and stayed as a member. :-). We are so happy to have you as part of the community and we look forward to help you achieving your goals not only in fitness but in life! Keep on killing it and we look forward to seeing your progress!

name: Brian McNally
text: CrossFit Deprivation is a phenomenal Box with world class facilities and friendly and knowledgeable coaches. Coach Elliott's programming is top notch. My fellow athletes and I are consistently improving our form, strength, and mastery of the more complex skills. Our Box is very family friendly and you will not find a better facility, available classes, and programs for the price!!!

resp.text: Thank for the great review! You will always be a part of the CFD family.

name: Avery Mclean
text: I just finished my 6 week challenge and I have nothing but amazing things to say about this gym. When the coaches say trust the process that could not be more sound advice. It doesn't matter if this is your first time in the gym or if you are athletic they will treat you with dignity and respect every moment. I am excited at my progress and I can honestly say Deprivation is worth your time. The coaches are helpful and very knowledgeable and can fine tune a plan that will help you reach maximum success! If you haven't signed up you are missing out!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the awesome review! We absolutely loved working with you and thank you for allowing us to be your guides on this fitness journey!

name: Johran Bethea
text: I did the 6-week challenge. Crossfit Deprivation is a wonderful place. The coaches keep you motivated and are very attentive and knowledgeable. They also break down every excercise step by step before the workout so you know exactly what to do and provide plenty of modifications for people of all fitness levels.

resp.text: Thank you Johran. You are a wonderful client!

name: William Kinsey
text: I was traveling to Columbus and did a drop in at Crossfit Deprivation.  It was a fantastic experience.  Coach Daniel was the 5:30am instructor and he was outstanding.  He made me feel welcome and was very attentive during the workout by giving me tips to improve my form/performance.  I really appreciated this.  The box is amazing.  It is very large and has a lot of equipment.  I travel to Columbus quite a bit on business and have worked out at other gyms in the area.  Crossfit Deprivation is by far the best.

resp.text:
Thank you William for the absolutely stellar review. We are committed to helping every athlete that steps foot through our doors and making sure that they have a home when they come visit. We very much look forward to seeing you again.

-CFD Staff

name: James McKnight
text:
Crossfit Deprivation is the best crossfit gym I have ever been to in 10 years of crossfitting around the world and is worth every penny.  Whether you are an elite athlete looking to eek out the next level of advanced skills and fitness, or  total couch potato, CFD will program for you.

You will get detailed personalized food (I won’t call it diet) planning that will help you lose the weight while barely noticing it; they will refine and adjust the plan for YOU!

The coaches are locked on for your workout and they will not let you get away with bad form on anything.  How many times have you seen a coach make up the warm up as they go?  Not here.  The warm ups are carefully designed to get you ready to do the workout of the day.

Above all, this place will make you feel like a member of a community that is fun and serious about fitness the moment you walk in the door.  We have a special gym in the Columbus and Phenix City area and you do not want to miss out on this place.

resp.text: Jim thank you 1000 times for those word. You and your wife are such and amazing part of this community and it would not be what it is without you. We look forward to working towards continued health for many years to come! Thank you again!

name: Brianna Netzinger
text:
The BEST Coaching staff and overall community... AND ITS HUGE!!!

I used to be leery of Crossfit in general but I decided to join anyways because nothing else was working out for me since I left the military. I am so happy with my decision to start because this is more than just a gym, it is a family. <3

resp.text: Many thanks for this review, Brianna! We're glad that you found a great fit in your post-military fitness career. We look forward to seeing you again soon! -Elliott Q, Owner

name: Joey Kitt
text: I did a 6-week challenge here. CFD is a great place with awesome people and amazing coaches who keep you motivated.

resp.text: Thank you for the review Joey. We always greatly appreciate it!

name: Little Slips
text: Definitely THE best gym around! Great atmosphere and amazing and supportive coaches. What I like most is how they basically do the work for you, I show up, my workout is written and explained to me and I have an amazing group of people to workout with and motivate me. Not to mention the coaches there are like your own personal trainer who are eager to help you reach your goals. They also offer open gym all day AND  CHILDCARE during certain times which my kids love. CFD is for all levels of fitness and have a FREE Workout every Saturday at 9 with childcare for anyone wanting to try it out!!  I just love this place <3

resp.text: Thanks for the review lucky! You will always be huge part of this gym and watching you grow as an athlete has been an amazing experience for the CFD team.

name: Thaddeus Skaggs
text:
Positive atmosphere and everything you want from a CrossFit gym. 3 stars, because $120 a month is the most steep price I think I've ever seen from a gym. That's $1440 for a year. I think what turned me away was the amount of willingness to work with folks like myself, whom are rarely here due to work. It was pretty clear that $120 was the price and nothing less than military orders would change that. Even then the offer sounded less than ideal. So, that's the business side.

The workout side of this facility seemed... Alright. The facility was great as were the staff and customer personalities and support. Going back to the money, I definitely don't believe the training I saw warranted the price. I saw more flexion in lower back than I care to see-not just from young/new members. My fear of CrossFit gyms is always seeing atrocious form, and although that wasn't the case here (form wasn't... Terrible...) It still wasn't good enough for the hefty price. I could get a personal coach for the same and get precise, individual training for less money and same or better quality.

resp.text: We are so sorry to hear that you do not agree with the price we charge. We strive to make our service/coaching worth every penny you pay. However we feel it is a fair price considering you get a planned workout and coaching daily, access to the facility all day, mobility classes, access to Wodify, a one on one and group session with a coach, nutrition advice/planning and any clinics we run are free to you as a member. We also realize that people’s form are less then perfect but everyone comes in moving different, with different mobility problems and different degrees of fitness and athleticism. Some of those people take years of work to make the smallest change but I assure you that our coaches work tirelessly to do so and our athletes make dramatic improvements in quality of movement and life! We would love to have you come visit again and check us out but if not we appreciate the review and feedback and we will continue to work to make the gym the best place possible!

name: paula pritchett
text: Great staff & great workout

resp.text: Thank you for the review Paula!

name: Brittany Ward
text: Amazing and very knowledgeable coaches. I love the atmosphere and the people. No matter what your fitness level you should definitely come give this box a try.

resp.text: Thank you for the Review! We love having you and it's a pleasure seeing your daily progress and positive attitude!

name: Liz Wise
text: I used to feel very intimidated about going to a new gym by myself.  I was worried that I would be lost and look stupid but the coaches and members were so welcoming and supportive, I was worried for nothing. Now I feel very comfortable there, so comfortable that I can walk into open gym and do the workouts by myself when I need that flexibility.   It is MY gym, my place to work and push myself as hard as I can and when I think I cant, the coaches and other members help me push myself. Love that place and its people! <3 I highly recommend Crossfit Deprivation to anyone that is not just looking for a gym but an actual community of people invested in your success.

resp.text: Thank you for the Review Jett!. We love having you as part of our community and are so happy that you can call this place home. Athletes like you is one of the many things that makes our facility great!

name: Cody 1256
text: Set up an appointment for the free 6 week challenge. They wait till the end of there pitch then tell you there is a $500 deposit to keep you accountable. The place is probably good but I hate high pressure sales tactics and won't do business with a place that does this bait and switch.

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Cody -- we do appreciate your input. I am sorry that you feel that way but the challenge is absolutely free if you commit to it and use the tools we give you. We have an extremely high success rate with over 90% of the challengers becoming full time members because of the amazing results they see. We genuinely want to help people and try to get them to get out of their own way and see that they can live a healthy lifestyle. But again we always appreciate feedback no matter what it is. So thank you for taking the time to write a review! -Elliott Q, Owner

name: Benjamin Bunn
text: I've worked with the head coach and owner (Elliot) in the past. Great coach with a real passion for the sport of CrossFit, he's also a pretty damn good athlete! Fun community and a huge facility. Go check em out!

resp.text: Thanks for the review! Don't forget to drop in when you are in town!

name: Daniel Lecour
text: Great coaches, awesome workouts, and everyone is supportive of eachother no matter your fitness level. Also, the child care is great and my kids love going. A great environment to make friends and get in shape.

resp.text: Thank you for the review! You will always have a second home here.

name: Chelsea Navara
text: I could not be happier at this box. Excellent programming and I have seen tremendous results in myself and others. There's no need to feel intimidated because everyone is so welcoming and encouraging, I've met some amazing people here. Every workout can be modified to meet your needs. What truly makes this box so great is not how huge it is, but the awesome coaches. Every coach is fully dedicated to making sure you get the most out of each class. Not only are they making sure we are safe and effective throughout our movements, but care about our process and make huge efforts to follow up on it. It means a lot to have the coaches and or fellow athletes/friends/family get just as excited for an improvement as you do. I would recommend this box to anyone as it is for everyone no matter your fitness level or age. Come get your long term fitness goals started at crossfit deprivation!!

resp.text: Thank you for the review! You are a big part of CFD and we can't imagine the gym being the same without your hard work , dedication and drive inspiring us all to be better.

name: Dexter Morgan
text: Deprivation should be ashamed of theirselves. I saw an ad on Facebook for a free six week course. I accepted the ad and made the “appointment” to start the course. It turned that it was actually a lecture not an assessment and it wasn’t just me but room full of people. Then after listening to the one hour lecture that explained how the people at this gym had found the “magic” to help you lose weight when you had failed on your own they dropped the bombshell of its free but it’s $599 down and you get your money back if you are successful. That’s not free!!!!! They are an example of why the fitness industry has a bad name. I’m sure they are capable competent coaches. But, that doesn’t mean they are allowed to lie to get people in the door. If I could give zero stars I would. I’m ashamed that I was fooled by your ad.

resp.text: Hey Dexter. I am very sorry to hear that you feel fooled but the program itself is very very effective and we have changed 100's if not 1000's of lives doing this program. The program is free if you commit to it and do what the coaches are telling you and many people take advantage of that fact. We also understand that the program is not for everyone and that is completely O.K. We thank you so much for taking the time out of your day to come check us out and we appreciate any and all feedback. I wish you all the best on your fitness journey!

name: anthony judge
text: Awesome bunch of people, felt very welcome dropping in here for a few days. Great coaches, facility and community.

resp.text:
Thank you Anthony. We are so glad that you enjoyed your experience here because we try so hard to ensure everyone feels welcomed. We look forward to seeing you again some day soon.

-CFD Team

name: Teysha Thomas
text: I LOVE THIS PLACE! The trainers are awesome and everyone is very friendly!

resp.text: Thank you Teysha! We lobe you too and it is people like you that make this place amazing.

name: Sarah McGrew
text: After being a “CrossFit hater” for years, I decided to finally give it a shot during a six-week challenge a few months ago. I’m thankful every day that I saw the ad on Facebook and decided to give Cross Fit Deprivation a shot. From my first day at the gym, I was welcomed by staff and members with smiles and excitement and it has continued every day since. Elliott has put together an amazing team of coaches that focus on form and are able to scale any movement as needed based on each individual’s abilities. They are not only an incredible coaching staff with diverse backgrounds but great human beings as well, who have fostered an environment in the gym full of positivity and encouragement. Whether you’re a seasoned athlete, have been working out for years, or never done a push-up or lifted weights in your life - there’s a place for everyone at CFD, definitely the best facility with the best staff in the area.

resp.text: Sarah! You have become such a huge part on this community and team. We appreciate this review and your presence so so much. All I can say is Thank you, Thank you, Thank you!

name: Ruby Heintzelman
text: This gym so where my transition into Crossfit began and I couldn't be more thrilled with the progress I'm making due to the amazing coaches. Every day I look forward to coming back and seeing everyone working so hard together.. Couldn't imagine working out anywhere else!

resp.text: Thank you for the awesome review! You will always have a place at our gym and so glad we could help you with your transition into CrossFit and Powerlifting!

name: Adam Farmer
text: I regularly travel to the Ft. Benning area for work and CrossFit Deprivation is a must for me. Very friendly environment from both the Athletes and the Coaches. Being a Coach myself, I find it refreshing to go other places and get coached. CF Deprivation makes that an even more enjoyable experience. Very attentive and knowledgable, coaching cues are always on point and they spread themselves throughout the class wonderfully. Can't wait to get back down to Georgia!!!! I recommend y'all to everyone!

resp.text: Thank your the review and recommendations! You will always have place here Adam.

name: Trevor Hull
text: Great community, good programming. I'm seeing good results after only a few months of regular attendance.

resp.text: Thanks Trevor! Glad to have you as part of the CFD community and we have noticed your results as well! Can’t wait to see where you are in a couple more months!

name: Glasha Redding
text: I can't wait to get started

resp.text: We couldn't wait either!

name: Amber Richter
text: Crossfit Deprivation is the best in the area! The coaches are knowledgeable, and so positive! The programming works- and the coaches celebrate your accomplishments with you! Love this gym!!

resp.text: Thank you for the review! We love that you always give us a reason to celebrate!

name: Austin
text: This place is massive. Great people, tons of equipment, definitely a great place for new/old/newbie/novice alike! Thanks Elliott!

resp.text: Thank you Austin! Look forward to seeing you again soon.

name: M. Riz
text: Huge gym. Versatile coaches. Excellent equipment. Community of all levels of fitness. You can Crossfit or powerlift or train for any type of military school or challenge you want. I worked out here for three years and am sad to move away. Highly recommended.

resp.text: Thank you for the excellent review. We miss you guys!

name: Brad Nelms
text: I enjoyed every second of interaction with CFD. I did the 6 week challenge about 7 months ago and not only met, but exceeded my personal goals. Although I am no longer a member, due to work/financial complications, I would recommend this gym to anyone! I do what I can at home and still jave maintained my nutrition. Eliott and his AWESOME coaches took me from a size 38 to a 32. It feels good to be 46 and wear the same waist size you wore in High School. You get tons of 1 on 1 instruction on everything from nutrition to technique. If you have the money it’s worth EVERY penny. I miss CFD tremendously and if financial stresses ever resolve you can bet I’ll be back! It will truly change your life!!!

resp.text: Thanks for the awesome review Brad! We definitely miss you but we are still soooo proud of your accomplishments during your time at CFD!! We can't wait to see you back here. You will always be part of the family.

name: Daniel Parker
text: CFD is a great box that offers so much more than the other local box. The coaches do a great job at working with you to ensure proper form and technique. You will see great gains from the programming. Great place for family and friends to build new frienships. I recommend Crossfit Deprivation to everyone.

resp.text: Thank you for the review. Your positive attitude is truly infectious and continues to make this place better and better

name: Brandon Oliver
text: Great coaches and awesome training. The services provided are well worth the investment and the presence of child care, nutrition counseling/planning, in addition to mobility WODs really help CFD to provide a holistic environment for improving health, fitness, and overall wellness.

resp.text: Thank you for the great review. Your constant thirst for knowledge and work ethic continues to inspire the CFD team and community

name: Michael Beres
text: Crossfit Deprivation is top notch!! As a Chiropractor people are always asking why I do Crossfit.  They always follow it up with aren't you afraid of hurting yourself.  I quickly follow up that I feel that the exercise you get while doing crossfit is the only exercise routine where you are working all parts of your body.  BUT the key to staying injury free is finding a box like Deprivation where the coaching is the best.  Elliott knows his stuff and you will not only get in shape but be prepared to gain muscle and get stronger.

resp.text: Thanks for the review Doc. And thank you for the continued support of our community.

name: Pat McLendon
text: This place is what a good Crossfit gym should be. Great people, fantastic coaching, high energy in a supportive environment for all fitness levels.

resp.text: Thanks for the review Doc. It is a pleasure seeing you come in and you always brighten our day!

name: Chris
text: My second home for nearly 3 years.  Met many great friends here.

resp.text: Let's go for 3 more years and many more great friends!

name: Patricia Dixon
text: The Coaches are great, the community of athletes is awesome and it's affordable.

resp.text: Thank you Pat! You have been such a blessing to our gym. Your daily motivation smiles and motivation is an inspiration to so many.

name: John Gailey
text:
As a member of the military I had to go on leave and thus wasnt properly informed of how the freeze account works. While on leave I was charged again for another month (paying month to month) but thought account was frozen. After contacting the owner( former Army NCO), he didnt care, wouldnt give refund for his miscommunication, and essentislly stole $280 from me; I only got to work out for 5 days for $280.

STAY AWAY FROM THIS PLACE IF YOU ARE ACTIVE DUTY MILITARY.

resp.text: John I am sorry that you feel this way about our facility. We work everyday to improve our communication with members about the gym and it’s policies. We did however exchange emails about your options to cancel or freeze and because you did not answer back the charge went through. I also offered to freeze your account after you were charged since you said you would be back from leave and wanted to work out and you said no to just cancel you out giving up your month that we offered you. We normally do not freeze for anything less then a month and I still offered this to you understanding you were in a tough situation. Again, I am sorry it didn’t work out but we are huge supporters of the military and we have adjusted policies to benefit military persons as much as we can. Thank you for coming to our facility for the short duration and I wish you the best moving forward

name: Regina Dozier
text: Great staff. Love this place

resp.text: We appreciate you taking the time to leave us those stars, Regina. Don't hesitate to reach out if you ever need anything. -Elliott Q, Owner

name: Lex Egea
text:
Elliott used to be a member at my old gym and I knew immediately he was going to be a great CrossFitter and probably become a coach sooner than later.  Anything I told him to do he did it and then some.  Once he became a coach he dove into the books and online literature to learn and teach people the right way.  Now he's a successful box owner running one the biggest facilities in the southeast.
Not only does he have the certifications to coach but he can back it up by coaching and demonstrating it all to you.  Top notch coaching at CFD and people who really care about YOU! Don't settle for less; go to CFD for the best/safest experience of CrossFit you can get in the Columbus/Phenix City area. Prepare for all the heart and soul you can get here because you're going to need to give it right back.

resp.text: Thank you for the awesome review! You started a lot of this team down this path and you will always have a second home here!

name: Natana Chaney
text: Crossfit Deprivation has the most inviting and family friendly atmosphere. People are genuinely kind and caring. The coaches are devoted to seeing improvement in their athletes as well as each other. Crossfit is all about the community that embodies it and other crossfit gyms in the area can't hold a candle to that of Crossfit Deprivation. It's been a privilege of mine to be apart of the legacy that is being built here.

resp.text: Thank you for the review! It's been a privilege having you as part of the CFD team!

name: Laura Murphy
text: Just started my crossfit journey. All the coaches are super helpful and inspirational.

resp.text: We're so excited to be on this journey with you, Laura! Thanks for choosing us. We'll always be here for you. -Elliott Q, Owner

name: Joshua Williams
text: Great coaching staff, they really care about everyone that walks through the door. They push you to do your best without being pushy.

resp.text: Thank you for the review! We are so glad you joined our community and it is amazing to see the progress you and Brittany have made since joining. You continue to be an example for new and old members.

name: Bridget Fitzsimmons
text: Love the staff and programming here!

resp.text:
Thanks for the 5 stars. We appreciate it so much and we love you!

-CFD team

name: Debra Carter
text: Hard work but feel great afterwards

resp.text: We love hearing this, Debra! Thanks so much for working out with us. We hope to see you again soon. -Elliott Q, Owner

name: Patricia Adams
text: The only thing free is the speech they give you, as they try to convince you to pay a lot of money

resp.text: Sorry to hear that you did not see the value of what we offer. I hope that we were able to at the very least send you to a place that could help you with what you were looking for. At the end of the day our goal is to bring health and wellness to everyone no matter where you end up. Good luck with your fitness journey

name: Sharon Hoskinson
text: It was really 😎 inside the gym

resp.text: Thank you! We take pride in our facility and glad that you got to see that

name: Timothy Grantham
text: Typical 3 tooth services

resp.text: Thanks for the review Timothy. We always appreciate any and all feedback. We would love to hear your thoughts on what it would take to get us to a 5 star review! Feel free to talk to any of the staff to let us know. Thank you for checking out and being a part of the gym!

name: robert williams
text: Coaches are second to none.

resp.text:
Thank you for the 5 stars! You are a second to none athlete!

-CFD Staff

name: Iris Blaylock
text: Signed up for the 6 week challenge..will see how it goes

resp.text: Get ready for a life changing experience Iris!

name: Wendy Hall
text: Love this place, the coaches, and the community.

resp.text: We love you!

name: Melony Whitlock
text: A little pricey for my taste

resp.text: Melony, thank you for your feedback. We always appreciate honest opinions about what we offer. Hopefully one day you can partake in one of our programs!

name: Jeff Mcgee
text: Scam, plain and simple.

resp.text: Hey Jeff thanks for the review. I would love to talk to talk to you about why you think we are running a scam. We always look for feedback on how we can improve our products/service. I am sorry that we were not a fit for you and wish you the best on your fitness journey.

name: Southern Ga Peach
text: Wonderful staff

resp.text:
Thank you for the awesome review

-CFD Staff

name: Luz Karakozian
text: Not welcoming I guess be my nationality

resp.text: Luz I am very sorry to hear you felt unwelcome at our facility. We truly strive to make sure every single person that walks in feels like they are part of the family. I can assure you that we do not welcome or unwelcome people based on there nationality so again I am extremely apologetic if for some reason you felt that way. I would love to talk to you and see if you would give us a second chance to prove that we are who we say we are or at least let us know how we can improve. If not I completely understand and hope you find a place that fits for you! Thank you.

name: Migdalia Marrero
text:
(Translated by Google) My daughter-in-law and my granddaughter work out there, very good.

(Original)
Mi yerna y mi nieta se ejercitan alli, muy bueno.

resp.text: Migdalia, thank you so much for the kind words and glad your family lies it here.

name: Sharon Zekoff
text: Everyone is so amazing and encouraging. The coaches care so much and are so invested in my success. I have never been comfortable in a gym and definitely not a typical gym goer. However, Iron Tribe Homewood is such a positive environment. Even when I can’t do something there is always a way to modify and encouragement given, not only by the coaches but also the tribe family. I genuinely believe that I can succeed in making a life change in regards to my nutrition, physical abilities, and overall health due to finding Iron Tribe. I started Iron Tribe to be a better mom to my kids, set a healthy example, and not be limited by my weight and physical abilities in raising them. I’m so thankful to Iron Tribe Homewood for helping make this dream of a healthy lifestyle a reality! I can’t recommend them enough!

resp.text: Iron Tribe strives to maintain a positive environment, so we are pleased to hear that you were encouraged and pushed in your workouts. Making healthy life changes like nutrition and physical abilities are quintessential for a healthy mental state which will waterfall into becoming the best version of yourself. Thanks, Sharon!

name: Trisha Trigg
text: After having been an Iron Tribe member for many years, my husband and I had not been attending regularly since the pandemic.  After speaking with Chris, we knew the Prime program might be the answer.  The encouragement from Lauren and Caleb has been just what we needed.  Great programming plus diet tips that have made a huge difference.  We have also been impressed with the safety precautions and the emphasis on doing movements the right way.  The personal attention of Lauren and Caleb has been invaluable in our making progress in the workouts and in strengthening us in our everyday life.  I could not recommend the Prime program enough.

resp.text: Trisha, we love having you at the Tribe. While the past year has been difficult on a lot of us, it's great to see our members like you continue to reach their fitness goals. Thanks for your review!

name: Barry King
text:
I have been at iron tribe for nearly 10 years. It has been a great facility with great training.  They now offer a personal training component. After talking with Chris and Caleb, I decided to try this to work on some areas I felt were neglected. After a physical and dietary evaluation, Caleb put together a personalized fitness routine as well as a dietary plan. After the first few sessions, he adjusted the workouts to isolate certain muscle groups to improve my core, strength and stamina.I have been doing the "Prime" classes going on for three months and seeing a change in body composition. My weight has stayed the same but I have increased my skeletal muscle mass by 2 lbs while my body fat percentage has dropped from 13.8% to 12.1%.  My basal metabolic rate has increased as well.  I was skeptical at first but now I see improvements. I feel sore after the workouts but don't feel beat up.

Overall I am enjoying the Prime fitness at Irontribe. I would recommend Caleb as he is excellent at evaluating your fitness level and adjusting the workouts based on your personal limitations so goals can be met.

resp.text:
We love Caleb and we're glad he's been able to help you continue to reach your personal fitness goals! Your dedication to getting stronger and more fit is awesome to see.

We love having you at the Tribe! Thanks Barry!

name: Garrett Blaising
text: Biggest thing is the community - I look forward to working out everyday because I love spending time with friends and coaches who push me to be better! I’m in the best shape of my adult life and am so grateful to Iron Tribe for the opportunity and accountability to continue improving my health.

resp.text: Thanks Garrett! We appreciate the kind words and we're glad you've been able to CRUSH your fitness goals!

name: Jami Wadkins
text: I've been an Iron Tribe member for about two years and have seen great success thanks to structured program-based coaching in strength and nutrition.  I recently joined ITF's PRIME program because I have some specific physical goals.  After discussing the goals, the coach, Lauren Pursell formulated my workouts with progressions toward those goals.  Due to the low athlete to coach ratio, I get a tremendous amount of personal coaching toward my goals.  In just four weeks, I'm already achieving movements I previously could not perform.  I highly recommend Iron Tribe and PRIME.

resp.text: Thanks Jami! We're glad you're already seeing success with the PRIME program. Our gym members who are involved and active are who make our gyms so strong!

name: Jack Burnette
text: I have been a member of IronTribe for 10 years. After missing 8 weeks while recovering from abdominal surgery, I decided to sign up for the newly offered Prime program. My goal is to get back to my previous fitness and strength  level as soon as possible. I am very happy with the customized workouts as well as the nutritional counseling. My coach, Lauren Pursell has been very strategic in developing my workouts that are challenging and targeting my goals. I have no doubt that in just a few weeks I will be back stronger and more fit than ever.

name: Stan Felton
text: I’ve been a member of ITF for 9 years and I couldn’t speak any more highly about this program, the quality of coaches and the community. If you really are ready to improve your health and have fun in a great environment, this is the spot for you.

resp.text: Thanks Stan! We've loved having you with us and we've loved seeing you crush your goals!

name: Chandler Ancona
text: I started virtual one on one coaching with Jessica almost a month ago (because you know, quarantine life) and I have absolutely loved it. She’s been an incredible coach and able to use so many resources from ITF to provide me with a good nutrition plan meant for me and customize workouts to help me reach my goals. It hasn’t been long but I’ve already seen great results and know I’m well on my way to reaching them. I would recommend ITF, and Jessica’s awesome coaching, to anyone looking for a push to get back/stay in shape and feel great.

name: Jake Barnett
text: Just finished my 6 week challenge and could be more pleased with the  time that I spent here. The coaches are great and want each person to do the best that they can while understanding that each person is created differently. Not to mention you will get the results you are looking for with workouts that will kick your butt and a meal plan that will get you the physic you thought you couldn't have.

name: Melvin Upchurch
text: I was always hesitant to join Iron Tribe. I am in my mid 50's and I felt like the workouts would be overwhelming. I tried the 101 just to see if it would be a good fit. I liked the basic class so I joined. The trainers are excellent. They work hard to make sure your form is right to prevent injury. They always  know your name & they are warm and encouraging. All the members make you feel at home from your first day. But, the key to Iron Tribe is their formula pushes you to work harder than you ever thought possible. They measure and record everything you do for all to see. Competition is friendly, but it is real. You do not want to be the slowest or weakest person, so you will push yourself to do better. All the members are encouraging to each other. It has proven to be one of the best decisions of my life. Great coaching, nutrition and supplement advice, friendly people working together to improve their lives. I love Iron Tribe & you will too.

name: Danielle Wisse
text: Just over a year ago I skeptically signed up for an Iron Tribe 101 class fully expecting to be underwhelmed and out the door after the six week trial ended. Here we are 18 months later and I could not have imagined belonging to a place where I feel consistently challenged by knowledgable coaches and supported by such a community of friendship. Now I can't imagine being anywhere else!

name: David Patton
text: Choosing to join Iron Tribe has been one of the best decisions I've made.  It's helped in all aspects of balancing my life.  Iron Tribe has been the only fitness program that has worked successfully for me and delivers with fast & measurable results.  You get challenging group workouts with one-on-one attention from coaches that are invested in your success.  You also have access to the coaches & trainers for skill development, goal setting, and nutrition.  Avoid the attitude of "I could never do that."  All new athletes go thru the 101 program where Iron Tribe spends 3 nights a week for 1 month getting you familiar with equipment, skills, and proper nutrition.  Life's short, Live Healthy!

name: Sheri Spaine Long
text: I am currently in Iron Tribe 101.  Carrie and Caleb are truly talented coaches.  They break down every movement into easy-to-digest steps and take the stress out of learning new activities.  At 56, they have been key to making me comfortable and keeping me grounded during workouts – thank you!!  Burpees for both of you!!

name: Lucy Farmer
text: I start my 101 class at the end of this month. From what I've seen from friends that are tribers, I can't wait to get started! Everyone has had incredible results. Not only in there outside appearance, but they feel better. This is not just another gym. It's a life changing experience.

name: Jeremy Carter
text: I love Iron Tribe. I recently rejoined after a 4 year hiatus and I'm so glad to be back. Trainer, Matt Lavender, has helped me set some challenging goals and pushed me to achieve much more than I would have on my own. Mentally and physically I feel stronger than ever.

name: Justin Weaver
text: Best gym in town. Two highly trained coaches every class - and every one of them is friendly and motivational. Tons of classes every day to fit your schedule. Clean floors, restrooms, and showers. So worth it.

name: Owen Stayner/ThisWorkplace360
text:
This is the first Iron Tribe location...technically, it was across the street.
Amazing place for a hardcore workout.

name: Sarah Shaffield
text: Joining Iron Tribe 2 years ago was the best thing I've ever done for my health. I rave about it to everyone I know (I'm one of "those" people that can't shut up about it 😉). They've gotten me in the best shape of my life, and I'm still driven to improve every day!

name: Keith Jackson
text: These folks love what they do and they care about the people they coach. I delayed joining for 4 years with every excuse I could come up with - cost, available time, the commitment, and most of all the doubt that I would ever understand how to do all those mysterious Olympic lifts. All of my worries were misguided. The coaches are skilled both at challenging the younger, stronger athletes while also making newbies feel comfortable and helping those of us who may be further along in age learn, develop, and get stronger and faster, all while staying safe. And the cost? I wish I knew then what I know now - I can't afford NOT to go.

name: Angela Ginder
text: Iron Tribe is changing my life physically, mentally and spiritually!!  I love the workouts and the camaraderie.  Chandler, Matt and all the other coaches are great.  They make you feel good even during the workout!!  I feel more confident in my daily activities due to the confidence I'm gaining with the workouts.  Overall I love Iron Tribe!!  Ok Chandler 5 burpees for you!!

name: Margaret Scott
text: Painful; difficult; torturous. But the results are worth it. Big time for me. This is not a workout I would ever do on my own, which is why it is so beneficial. Endurance is so much better than when I started, and my baby fat is almost gone. Still more work to do, but can't think of a better way to get it done than at Irontribe or I would be doing that. No pain-No gain!!!

name: Gina Cox
text: I'm an over 50 year old woman who started iron tribe 3 years ago - the coaches are helpful in scaling the workouts and I always leave knowing that I've accomplished something hard.  I've never had any type of injury despite my age and prior lack of training!

name: Jason Lovoy
text: I'm a creature of habit which is great when you have accountability - At Iron Tribe you get that with great coaches, great work outs, and a great tribe of athletes.

name: Anna Kittinger
text: Hands down, one of the best decisions I have ever made was to join Iron Tribe!  The physical benefits are rivaled by the benefits of the community you find here. Invest in yourself through Iron Tribe - it's worth it!

name: Jeremy Allen
text: Fantastic coaching, safety first, results I couldn't have imagined.  THANKS GUYS!

name: Matt Bradford
text: Best coaches in the business, they are well trained and do a great job of giving that extra push just when you need it.

name: A Google User
text: The skills the coaches possess are only exceeded by their rock hard abs!

name: Sonja Doss
text: False advertising. Super expensive. Judgemental and pushy staff.

name: Michelle Shroyer Mathis
text:
I grew up being a competitive dancer, and I had never been overweight until graduate school when life turned into sitting around studying and then grabbing something quick and convenient to eat. I soon found I was not happy with my new body as I gained 20lbs, and running on the treadmill for 30 minutes a few times a week was not giving me any results. I signed up for the Irontribe 101 class having never lifted anything heavier than 5lb hand weights. I now have been a member for almost 2 years and I never want to quit.
I have lost 30lbs, made new friends, built lean muscle, started running 5Ks, become confident in my body, decreased my anxiety, and proved to myself I can do more than I ever believed I could. I love the sense of community at Irontribe. Having people to hold you accountable and cheer you on makes a huge difference in your progress. I love my coaches who have helped me embrace the paleo lifestyle and are willing to answer any food or health question I may randomly email them. I trust and respect my coaches, and they are a crucial part of my success. I am so thankful I joined Irontribe and become a better version of myself.

name: Shawn Mcculley
text: Nice small gym in Homewood.

name: maxfield mayeaux
text:
Page loaded.
maxfield mayeaux's profile photo
maxfield mayeaux
Public
9 mins ago
Arrived at Iron Tribe in 2013 after having worked out at the Y knowing I could not do all that much. You see I had a heart transplant in 2011. I regained some strength and conditioning but came down with pneumonia a year later and was on a vent. After not really being able to walk I slowing did physical therapy and was about were I was before. So I joined Iron Tribe and the rest is history. The greatest part is by far the coaches. I'm not sure how they are always in such a great mood. They can really will turn around a bad day. The coaches will improve your mental and physical ability with the solid understanding they have. All you need to do is show up and give a 100%. The other enjoyment is friends you will meet to compete with and pull you along. I hope to continue to improve and would highly recommend this to anyone who wants to get in shape.﻿

name: Caleb Bagwell
text:
I will be forever grateful to Iron Tribe Fitness for changing my life. A sudden move to Birmingham, AL introduced me to ITF last year and the rest is history.  I lost 60lbs in the first 5 months, my waist size has dropped 8 sizes, and when I started I couldn't run one mile and ITF helped me prepare and complete my first marathon!

ITF gives me the community and the coaching that I needed to succeed.  The coaches are professional and give me all the tools I needed from nutritional training and accountability, to personal attention on all the workouts to help someone who new very little about this stuff stay safe and get fit.

This group will meet you where you are and pushes you to be better physically, and just when you think you've seen it all you learn about WOD for water, or Tribal Wars.  ITF has giving back in its core.  They actually get that having a six pack is not the ultimate goal and that you can use your fitness to do good in the world and have fun at the same time.  I am very thankful that from the top down making a global impact is the heart of ITF.

I would highly recommend ITF.

name: Natalie Chastenay
text:
My experience at Iron Tribe was for the most part rewarding, motivating and overall a good experience. The coaches are great and work with and they are in it to help you  achieve all of your personal goals. MOST of the coaches are warm, inviting and friendly. My experience mostly took place in the Homewood location. Although I enjoyed the classes I did feel that the class I attended in the evening had a "clicky", "club-like" kind of feel to it.
They do offer a lot of products, paleo meals, clothing and other accessories branded with their name but I felt that was pushed a bit much. I also felt the more they started growing the more flashy and uppity some of the staff members became. I would occasionally see some of the coaches out and about on my daily runs and routines and it was rare they even aknowledged me.
The gym is way overpriced. After about a year I decided it was not realistic for me to continue paying the rate they charge. I very much wanted to continue crossfit and found a few other gyms, one of which I am a new member now, that offer more than Irontribe offers at a significantly lower rate. The membership I have now allows both me and my husband to go unlimited for the same cost of one membership at Irontribe only allowing me to go 3 days per week.
Would I recommend Irontribe? Probably not. There are just too many other crossfit gyms in the area more feasable and some offering even more than what Irontribe has to offer and at a much lower cost without making you feel like you have to belong to a club to fit in. Wearing makeup, fashion gym wear, and men who gel their hair to come to the gym..not for me!

name: Katherine Gorham
text: If I can do this, anyone can!  Great gym, great coaches, great partners and friends!

text: It is, by far, the best gym in sylacauga. Every other gym in town thinks they have to charge way too much in order to stay in business. This place proves you don't. They just have a good formula for success. Ignore the negative reviews on here. No business is perfect. This one is is too good to lose. Sylacauga needs more places like this.

text: The gym itself was clean and very spacious. Great, easy to operate treadmills and bikes. My only complaint is I asked the staff to show me how to operate a few machines and give me a tour but was told they would do that when I became a paying customer. I had a 14 day pass trying to see if it was somewhere I would feel comfortable. I didn't get what I expected and haven't been back since. It shouldn't matter if I had a pass or had paid for services; if I needed assistance it should have been offered to me. I hope they don't do all visitors that way

text: Nice set up! I opted for a trainer to be sure I wouldn't damage arthritic joints. Upscale system for measuring body and adapting training towards your goals. Good job guys!

text: The staff is amazing but sometimes you definitely feel judgement by the other patrons

resp.text: Noel, thank you for your review. It is always our goal that ALL our members feel welcomed and fully supported at our gym.  While we are not aware of members judging other members, we  would hope  that  what you experienced was most likely distracted, preoccupied members in their own "zone" while working out. This could easily be misunderstood, and more than likely the member has no idea they are interpreted as insensitive.  We will continue to strive for excellence in all areas, and hopefully earn an update in your review! Thanks again!

name: Matt Rolling Star (MattRollingStar)
text:
I'm not giving this low score based solely off the amenities provided at the gym (although a laughable number of machines were broken or in a state of shoddy repair) but rather the pitiful customer service I received. A friend of mine and I used the Snap Pass feature to get a paid trial of this gym and weren't really feeling the features provided and the fact it was a little bit of a drive for us.

So we kept the pass and planned to cancel. A week before our memberships were set to auto-renew we tried to get it touch with whoever operated this gym to cancel our memberships since the official website directed us to. We made multiple calls to the gym with no response or return calle and I sent several e-mails trying to see about cancelling. No actual response BUT I did receive a blank e-mail from them which tells me that they have seen my attempts to reach out them. They have already billed my account so I can be confirmed of one thing:

Whoever operates this gym is not in the business of self improvement but rather thievery. I wholeheartedly cannot recommend this gym to any person unless they have a desire to feel the sting of being swindled or receiving the worst customer service ever. A disreputable and disgusting business.

The coaches- they are amazing and get to know you on a personal level and care about your progress.
The people you meet in the classes- that ultimately you bond with and become friends with.
I’ve gained muscle and my endurance is up! I love my Tribe Family. We work hard and play hard together!
All good things!

name: Kevin Coleman
text: I enjoy Iron Tribe due to the friendly atmosphere, cleanliness of facility, up-to-date equipment that is maintained, reliability of staff to start/end on time, life-long friendships made by attending, professional/business contacts and networking, positive attitude of staff, and workouts that are progressive and promote improved fitness.

name: Angelia Sprott
text: Where do I start?!?! My experience at Iron Tribe Fitness has been nothing short of amazing. I just completed the 6 week challenge, and it was one of the most challenging yet rewarding experiences I have ever been through. The coaches helped me find the confidence to keep pushing even when I wanted to give up! Some of the members would step in to encourage me to keep going when I wanted to quit. For the first time I KNOW that I have what it takes to live a fit and healthy life. Anyone at any fitness level and be great at Iron Tribe. If you can’t do something, the coaches will work with you to find something you can do. If you are thinking about giving them a try please do, you will not regret it!!

name: Taja Dotson
text: I started the 6 week challenge at Iron Tribe and not only was I surrounded by a motivating group of individuals the coaches played a HUGE role in it too! Every single coach there was beyond supportive and really made sure to help as much as they could! I joined right after the challenge because I fell in love with the energy that I got from going to a class. I would 110% recommend at least trying it, it is a great, positive,  and warming environment!

name: Michelle Davis
text:
I did the ITF 6 week challenge. It was amazing, and I would recommend others to try it!!

The coaches are very knowledgeable, helpful, and pushed me to be the best version of me I could be! They want you to succeed.

This gym (meaning coaches and members) are amazing! There is such a great atmosphere here!!

name: Hannah Garrison
text: Love this place! I'm stronger than I've ever been. The coaches constantly push you to do your best and you get great results because of it! Also, the community that you gain just by being a member is amazing. Iron Tribe has brought me so many close friends! Basically, I love Iron Tribe.

name: Sarah (Sarah Kathryn) Bonds
text: Iron Tribe Fitness is fantastic! The coaches are wonderful, the workouts are challenging, and you always leave feeling better than when you came. ITF is a family and they care about their athletes. Their 6 weeks challenge was hard, but one of the most rewarding things I've ever done. Extremely worth it and I miss them already!

name: Barry Darden
text: Iron Tribe has exceeded my expectations! In less than 4 months I have lost 35 pounds and am well on my way to being in the best shape of my adult life. I have a higher energy level with the ability to be more productive throughout all aspects of my life.  The atmosphere is completely supportive and includes caring accountability. The coaches at Iron Tribe make each session time efficient and tailored to my individual ability to provide a safe, effective pathway to fitness. There have been numerous friendships made with the other athletes.  I look forward to attaining my life fitness goals in the next couple of months at Iron Tribe. Iron Tribe-come get you some-

name: Hunter James
text: Great people, great results. I absolutely recommend Iron Tribe Fitness for anyone looking to kickstart a fitness program or to bring their fitness to the next level. The coaches push you to your limits and help support a holistic approach to healthy living. The ITF community will be there to support you throughout your time there. Go Tribe!

Kanon Burt, and the rest of the coaches, understand the importance of meeting you where you are at in your journey to bring about a sustainable change. You will love the culture!

As of 01/17/2019 this is the current condition of thos gym(pictures I submitted).I joined this gym franchise due to frequent job travel. It's slowly becoming obsolete. Tuscaloosa recently closed without warning. Oxford, AL is in poor condition as well. Find another gym. I'm looking for other options.

Note: I didn't leave these notes in the Gym. However,  I fully support whomever did write these notes.

name: Jessica Rogers
text:
I really used to love this quaint little gym.  It's easy to get to and not super crowded and the equipment does what I need it to do.....BUT ever since the new owners bought it last year, it's gone downhill quickly.  Repairs are never made to equipment, unless one of the trainers takes it upon themselves to do it.

Two elliptical machines have had "Maintenance has been called" for over 9 months now.  Their idea of repairing pads from normal wear and tear is to use matching duct tape to cover the rips.  AC is constantly going out and the latest insult to injury is that the power has been out in the cardio and classroom for at least 4 days now.  One treadmill and a couple of bikes work.

I really love the convenience of the gym and most of the people that go there are nice and friendly and the two ladies that I've seen working there are always nice.  I keep hoping that one day enough will be enough and they'll put some money back into the gym, but..........

name: Frank Fowler
text: I am a Snap Member out of town and have been 1 for over 8 years. Drove 20 minutes to this gym just for the door NOT to unlock. This unacceptable! If you are out of town, I would not waist time coming this. This is the 2nd time I have tried a Birmingham area Snap and for some reason the card just doesn’t work. One of the benefits of Snap is having access to other SNAPS!

name: Jeremy
text: Do not under any circumstances join this gym. First off, you won't be able to do it in person because no one works there. If you choose to join online, you will get a access card in the mail that doesn't work because there is no one there to activate. Snap Fitness has the worst customer service of any corporation I've encountered. Just go somewhere else.

text: Great box, highly recommend.  The gym is clean and organized with ample equipment.  Coaches Braden and Andrew have created an inviting and fun atmosphere for athletes at all levels. Most importantly, I see results. I feel stronger and healthier than ever.

text: Great atmosphere. The owner Braden is simply awesome. He really cares and you can tell he is passionate about what he does. From new members to older ones, he makes sure everyone gets the move right. I haven't joined yet, but plan too! Great location, great workout, and everyone is super friendly.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words Christy!  We truly do love what we do! We enjoyed the opportunity to train with you and look forward to working out again with you more in the future!  Thanks again Christy!
