text: Horrible I got sick every time I went in there the DON'T CLEAN THERE EQUIPMENT!!

name: Tip T
text: Desiree is the best trainer in Montgomery! She is an expert in nutrition and the science of exercise. The gym is immaculate and they are very professional. Be prepared for a great workout.

resp.text: Thank you so much

name: Chord O'Roy
text: First time working out via video conferencing but I have benefited more than I would at Planet Fitness...thank you Jamie and Desiree for your hard work putting this together

resp.text: Thanks for the shout out! We appreciate the support. Your consistency and dedication makes it all worth it! Keep working towards your goal 💪

name: Pam Carden
text: I absolutely love everything about Pure Barre Huntsville!  My husband said it's the only workout I've ever stuck with!   It's effective and fun!  The staff went above and beyond during the early months of Covid by providing online classes.   Very proud to be part of the Pure Barre Huntsville Family.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind review and high praises, Pam. We are honored to have an amazing community of clients and we are delighted you are among them. Pure Barre is a great work out and we are glad that you have kept up with it! Keep it up!

name: Angelica Lee
text: Pure Barre Huntsville is an effective yet safe workout. The clients and staff are all such a joy to be around and I couldn't be more proud to be apart of an outstanding community. I highly recommend anyone, regardless of their fitness needs, to give Pure Barre a try.

name: Fannie Proctor
text: I absolutely love Pure Barre Huntsville! The staff is amazing and it’s the best workout. I would highly recommend giving PB a try for a great full body workout.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind review, Fannie. We are delighted that you are apart of our community. Pure Barre is a great and safe work out. We highly recommend everyone to try it out at least once.

name: Andrea Schilling
text: Amazing owners, staff and instructors. I always get a great workout whether it has been a day or weeks since I have been to class!

name: Samantha Key
text: I love love love Pure Barre!! I have tried numerous workouts and this was the first one that I got the results I was looking for: The results are amazing plus I really enjoy the workout. I really love how the instructor is always checking your technique to make sure you are getting the most from your workout.  Everyone is so positive and uplifting. It's the PERFECT way to start your day. If you have been on the fence about trying it, you should def give it a try!!! You won't be disappointed! :)

name: Jacqueline Weaver
text: Wonderful facility,  friendly staff, great full body workout!

resp.text: Jacqueline, thank you so much for your kind words! We are so thankful to have you at Pure Barre Huntsville! We are so glad you have had a positive experience, and appreciate you sharing this review!

name: Emily Rogers
text: One of my favorite ways to work out. Don't go anymore as I've been working out at a different gym but this place is always so welcoming and full of a lovely staff. Helpful and encouraging team makes for a great workout regardless of your fitness level.

name: Melissa Trapp-Petty
text:
As a hard-core yogi and runner, I've found it to be a great way for me to work on strengthening specifically my backside and hips. In the short time I've been doing it (two weeks), I've noticed changes to my body mechanics and figure.

Last, the class times are convenient around my schedule, and the people are lovely and welcoming. I appreciate the program.

name: Liz Helton Bullard
text: Pure Barre Huntsville rocks! The girls in the studio immediately made me feel very comfortable and welcome. All of the instructors and employees, even those that I hadn't spoken to initially, knew my name by the time I came back for my second class (pretty incredible, considering that they hadn't taken a picture or anything to know me by) and greeted me by name upon coming in and encouraged me during class. The instructors and employees are very down-to-earth, kind, and cool, which you sadly sometimes don't see in small, upscale studios. The atmosphere there has motivated me to go every day after work!

name: Stephanie Rauseo
text: Pure Barre is a great way to get a total body workout in 55 minutes. I love the core strength and flexibility I have achieved by coming to classes. The teachers are always there to help put you in the correct form as well as motivate you to push harder and go lower for the extra shaking.

name: Caroline Kirk
text:
Pure Barre is amazing! I have an inner ear condition called Meniere's Disease that causes intermittent dizziness with chronic disequilibrium.  Balance is like a muscle and must be worked out continuously for optimum performance.  Pure Barre does this for me. Meredith and the staff are amazing.  They have flexible class schedules with clean, comfortable facilities and equipment. The changes to your muscles and weight is great for self confidence.  Highly recommend Pure Barre as a lifestyle change for most people!

Kari Kingsley
Nurse Practitioner

name: susie walter
text: I just love it!  Everyone is always in good spirit and the workout is so different. Works my legs and butt muscles in a unique way.  I find legs difficult to work with a bad back so I like the no weights.  I have to really focus and I like that.  Instructors are nice and always willing to answer questions.  Susie

name: Jackie Kachele
text: Love this workout. Pure Barre is a workout for everybody no matter what your level of fitness is and if you have any complications, the staff/instructors will work with you to find alternate moves. I love this studio and the staff. It becomes a fun place to go daily.

name: Rebecca Cockrell
text: Great low-impact workout that produces results! I love the way I feel! (& look!) I stand all day at work, & the increase in my core strength has greatly diminished my lower back pain! The staff are always welcoming & available to help!

name: Marianne McConnell Zollar
text: The first time I took pure barre I was hooked! As an instructor I always tell new clients that the 55 minutes will go by so fast. Arrive at least 10 minutes early to complete paperwork, get all set up, and allow you to talk to the instructor or other clients about how the class works. Within 10 classes you will feel so strong!

name: Kendall Frawley
text: LOVE pure barre! Instructors are so nice and willing to help you. Amazing workout and great apparel!!

name: Kayla Brazelton
text: I have just started pure barre and am already seeing changes. It's a very fun and efficient way to work out. If you haven't tried pure barre you should definitely give it a chance.

name: Susan Geoghegan
text: Fabulous classes and great instructors! PB Huntsville is my happy place where I can forgot about real life for a while.

name: Ashley Rather
text: Great full body work out. Staff is friendly and helpful. Studio is big enough to not feel too crowded. Love the retail clothing!

name: Lee Satterfield
text: I have been a client at Pure Barre Huntsville for 3 years now and I still love it! It is always challenging and fun. I never stop seeing results unlike many other things I have done in the past that either I got burned out on or just stopped producing the same results. You can count on Pure Barre Huntsville to always be pushing it to the next challenge!

name: Katie Kleiner
text: Awesome workout that is always a challenge! It produces results while being safe and fun. Love the 55 minutes I set aside to better myself.

name: Jessica Stroud
text: I'm in Huntsville for Thanksgiving with family and went to this location. Wanda and Marianne were so friendly and helpful. They made me feel right at home. The studio was clean and the workout was great! Thanks ladies!

name: Stephanie Nelson
text: If you are looking for a fun low impact routine, Pure Barre is for you. The instructors are great they make you work for every calorie you burn. You will Love and Hate them at the same time.

name: Krystina Berens
text: Absolutely loved my first class with Pure Barre! The staff was incredible and so welcoming. The instructor was very personable and helpful. I will definitely be returning!

name: Ann Ever Ainsworth
text: Love Pure Barre! It is a great workout for the beginner or the experienced. The front desk ladies and the teachers are all so nice and welcoming. Huntsville Pure Barre is my favorite workout in town!

name: Megan Johnson
text: Although I have tried Pure Barre in the past (in another city), this was my first class in over 6 months. I felt very welcome and very comfortable even though I'm very out of shape! I've already signed up for my next class tomorrow!

name: Amy Delahoussaye
text: Everyone was very welcoming and they set me up as a new client with great ease! I loved the class, instructor, and studio and cannot wait to attend again!

name: Jennifer Helton
text: Pure Barre is a great workout, try a few classes and you will be addicted!! Great instructors, awesome retail selection, and friendly environment! It's the only workout I have stuck to after almost 3 years!

name: Maria Homolka
text: I enjoy the ambiance, the clients, the teachers.  Every class is unique so there is not chance of getting monotonous.

name: Grace Alexander
text: I really love that all levels of experience feel comfortable in the classes! There is no judgement if you aren't at the same level as everyone else.

name: Amanda Hunter
text: Staff is always helpful and kind!  I love the "me" time I get out of Pure Barre and the difference in makes in my body!

name: Allison Ash
text: Very friendly staff! Excellent instruction and very encouraging. I am sore so I know I got a great workout!

name: Nicole Pacino
text: I'm a huge fan! The work out is low impact but always a challenge, and the instructors are great.

name: Lisa Pourhassani
text: Great overall body workout and you can get in and out quickly!

name: PC Oysterland
text: Great workout. Fast paced small movement lots of burn.

name: Denise Carter Pelham
text: Marianne is great. Everyone is super friendly. Getting stronger.

name: Kristy K
text: Love going to Huntsville PB! The staff is amazing and the workout goes by super fast!

name: Carrie Smithson
text: Wonderful, empowering instructors! Incredible workout!

name: Brandi Alldredge
text: Amazing full body workout !! Always challenging!! Love the instructors and staff !

name: Amy McConnell
text: You WILL see major results. Amazing workout!

name: Kindall Tucker
text: All of the instructors are very encouraging and helpful. One class and anyone would be hooked!

name: Debra Lynn Thomas
text: Everything!  Positive, beautiful, sincere, living employees that motivate you to the extreme!

name: Tara Hartis
text: Really enjoy my time spent here

name: emily clemons
text: It's the easiest way to work out!

name: Claudia Coker
text: Awesome studio & amazing instructors!!

name: Leslie Lausee
text: Great exercise!

name: Jennifer Tarkington
text: Love it ! Great results too .

name: Rebecca Goins
text: Amazing workout, welcoming staff.

name: Santiago Palacios
text: I miss this family driven place so much. It made me love crossfit!

name: Nick B
text: I attended this box for a gymnastics course 2 weeks ago. So no familiarity with membership or the culture. But it was your standard CrossFit box with possibly a side of ninja warrior added in. And I noticed they may do a faith-oriented class on Sundays which is cool if that's your thing.

name: Antonio Maceo
text: Came to J19 for a Crossfit Gymnastics seminar and was instantly welcomed by the owners. Friendly people that are supportive and run a great gym. Highly recommend J19 to anyone in the area that needs an awesome place to get fitter and healthier.

name: Brice Jackson
text: I am loving the new Fit Boot Camp Classes!!! Exactly what I need. Last week one of the classes events was broken up into parts of a meal. So cleverly we went through a work out in 4 parts: an appetizer, salad, a meal, and even dessert!

name: Mark Jenkins
text: J19 is a great place for anyone of any fitness level to get in shape. The workouts are challenging, but they can be scaled for any level. Also, the community there is a huge part of why I'm sold on CrossFit as a whole. Give it a try, you won't regret it.

name: Jeff Lindsey
text: Great place to get in shape.  The staff is very supportive.  Workouts are intense but scalable to allow for those of us who are not up to speed to succeed and grow as fast as we can.

name: Tee Thomas
text: J19 is a awesome place to workout.   I was a beginner to crossfit and they took me in and taught me everything I needed to know.  They have an experience to a beginners class.  It is an awesome place to join.

name: scabbeus
text:
Phenomenal instruction and great community...everyday a new challenge and everyday I push myself to that next level. Thank you J19 coaches for keeping me motivated.

See you tonight!

name: Merin Graves
text: nothing but wonderful things to say about J19! Coach Kelly is tremendous. was there on a short term basis & thoroughly enjoyed my time there!

name: Cary Miller
text: Good people

name: Lindsey Pourciau
text: Their team was quick to get me in to be seen. Chris took so much time to hear about my issues, be proactive about treating, and providing me information to use at home! Very pleased with the service and care!

name: Alison Singerhouse
text: Chris Allison and Andrew Darwin are excellent physical therapists. Best in the area as far as I am concerned. I send many patients over there for care and they are always happy. They are professional and educated you on what you are doing and why you are doing it. Also excellent at relieving pain associated with therapy. I surely appreciate them for all they do for me!

name: Stephen Sistrunk
text: I have been to see Andrew Darwin now for a knee surgery rehab and two unrelated back issues. On all three occasions, he has gotten me feeling better and back in action much quicker than I would've expected. This guy is very skilled! Across the board, the service and treatment at the Riverchase office is top notch. I would highly recommend going there for your rehab needs.

name: gary dutton
text: Chris Allison is the best. My boys play baseball and have been seeing him at the clinic for the past several years for normal recovery and rehab. He has great knowledge, cares about and communicates great with his patients.  He is very innovative with therapy.  Chris and the clinic also are very accommodating in working with their patients in regards to scheduling.

name: Jo Nicholas
text: Andrew is very knowledgeable, efficient, and patient. Highly recommend. Appointments are easy to make, building way to find.

name: Robert Scott
text: The Therapists are the greatest. Even though I’m a terrible patient and complain constantly, they continue to work with me. The improvements are obvious, and I am so grateful for the results.

name: Morgan Henderson
text: I come to get dry needled in my upper back and neck and always feel so much better afterwards. Chris does a great job!

name: Avione Allgood
text: Amazing!!! They make treatment and rehab enjoyable and interesting instead of overly repetitive. The best part it always and actually works. Great team at Therapy South

name: Sherri Dunn
text: The staff is great! So convenient to my work and home!

name: Brandon Hoggle
text: These guys are awesome! I had injured my shoulder in a softball accident and needed to do some basic rehab. Andrew and Chris quickly identified exercises, along with dry needling, to expedite the healing process. I’ve seen steady improvement since my last visit with them and wouldn’t hesitate to pay them another visit when/if needed. Highly recommend!

resp.text: Thanks for the food truck schedule!  Our pleasure man!

name: Barry Harrison
text: Therapy South has been great ! Chris and Andrew have both been amazing. After my first session Chris messaged me to check and see how I was doing. Andrew and  Chris both really showed me they  genuinely care and wanted to get me back to my training. It isn’t a cooking cutting place where they treat everyone the same , I felt that each time I was in there that they had a personalized workout just to help me with my sport. (MMA) I recommend them to anyone even if  it’s for your grandma just wanting to walk better or if you’re a pro athlete !! I think everyone there is great and they  even make it fun !

resp.text: Cool man. We loved having you!

name: Valley Tax Partners
text: I was referred by a friend and am so grateful. All the staff is friendly and attentive. Chris and Andrew have been great to work with to figure out what is going on with my situation. Looking forward to getting better but still continuing to be a patient and benefiting from all the services they offer.

name: Kaitlyn Poff
text: Chris Allison is so great! He worked me in very quickly for shoulder pain. He is super knowledgeable and works well with athletes! I do CrossFit and it was nice to have someone who relates to the sport and could me advice on what and what not to do that pertains to what I do in the gym. Will definitely be going back in the future!

resp.text: Appreciate you seeing us!

name: Stacy BARRENTINE
text: The first time I used TherapySouth Riverchase was 4 years ago when I tore my ACL and meniscus. Chris and Lauren were amazing at getting me back on my feet. The latest issue was for a strained muscle in my shoulder which Garrett Hawkins helped get me prepped and ready for dry needling. He was very helpful with any questions or concerns I had before and after the procedure. I have and will always recommend the Riverchase location to my friends and family because they truly care about you and work hard to help you properly overcome an injury.

name: Jesse Masters
text: Recently hurt my back squatting during a workout. I have never had an experience with physical therapy and was skeptical of some techniques such as dry needling. Andrew took a holistic approach to treatment and made sure that I was educated about the anatomy, techniques and recovery. As a former athlete, it’s important to be treated by a professional with the same eagerness that I have to get me well. Incredible experience and noticeable results after my first session. I would highly recommend seeing Andrew Darwin!

resp.text: Glad you came !!  Look forward to seeing back on the squat rack.

name: Garrett Hawkins
text: Lauren was very polite when I came in. Chris and Andrew were extremely knowledgeable, upbeat, and helpful. I wouldn’t want to go any other clinic.

name: Baker Chambliss
text: Awesome personalized care. Getting my hip back on track again!

name: Keith Dukes
text: Great facility. The team is very knowledgeable, thorough, and friendly.

name: David Wolnski
text: Andrew Darwin is incredible! As an active athlete eager to get back to work, Andrew sold me on his effective aggressive style of PT to get me back to work safely. Well it has worked! Go see him!!

name: Brock Hill
text: I’ve been to multiple pt clinics and therapy south Riverchase has by far been my favorite experience!

name: Richard Key
text: The therapists here were truly interested in my wellbeing. The exercises exactly what I needed to help me with my goals. I would recommend TherapySouth in Hoover to anyone.

name: Kim Cullum
text: I went to the Riverchase location of Therapy South for issues with my lower back.  I selected it based on positive reviews and I was not disappointed!  I received treatment over 4 weeks that included dry needling that really helped.  Chris gave me the tools I needed to keep myself healthy with stretches to do on the tennis court before I play along with exercises that I can easily do at home.  I would definitely recommend Therapy South for treatment.

resp.text: Thanks Kim!  Enjoyed having you!

name: Ramsey White
text: Andrew did an excellent job dry needling my calves after I jumped back into running post college. I would highly recommend working with him if you are a competitive athlete wanting to improve your body’s overall health

name: Frankie shine III
text: Outstanding group of professionals with superior experience and results.

name: Davis Looney
text: Go see Andrew!!! I went to see him for a dry needle treatment, and it was so helpful. I was having neck/back pain, and after spending time with Andrew, I had immediate relief, and I  continued to get better over the next day or two after I left. I highly recommend him!

name: Christen Colvert
text: They were so attentive and got to the root of the problem I’ve been dealing with on and off for a couple of years now. After he worked on my shoulder and dry needled I had instant relief and more mobility. When I had seen chiropractors I got relief but the issue came back or never really went away.

resp.text: Thanks for makin the drive over!  We really appreciate you.

name: Courtney Callahan
text: Chris Allison is very knowledgeable and a pleasure to be with. I got such great results from coming here!

resp.text: Thanks Courtney!  Pleasure is all ours.

name: Summer Smith Lee
text: Chris and Corey are the best around!! I workout next door to their office and they are so welcoming and helpful every time I come in. I have referred many people to them and will continue to! They are so knowledgeable and have kept me active with recovery techniques and dry needling. They are also fun and just the best guys you’ll ever meet!

resp.text: Thanks Summer!  It was a pleasure working with you!

name: Jim Callison
text: Chris and Corey are awesome and I would recommend to anyone.  I used them pre and post hip replacement and they have been very helpful in my recovery.  I started with Chris, who did a great job of assessing my condition and working with me.  I have also used Corey and find him to be excellent as well.  They listen to you and value your input and adjust as needed.

name: Jacob (Jake) Fagan
text: Came to see Andrew after soreness from working out. He dry needled, scraped, and cupped. Definitely worth the visit. If you are sore, tight, or injured, see Andrew at Therapy South Riverchase.

resp.text: Andrew is great. Thankyou for comin in!

name: Wendy Malone
text: Great facility.  The staff is awesome and used a variety of techniques to work with me to help with my back, knee and foot issues.  I love the way they explain the treatment and text exercises for me to do at home.  Keep up the great work!!!

resp.text: Will do!  Thank you!

name: Deanna Dupree
text:
I have received excellent individual therapy for my rehab. The office is ran on schedule I have never waited to be seen. The entire staff works as team. The therapist assigned to me has been wonderful to work with and I would highly recommend him ( Andrew)
D. Dupree

resp.text: We really appreciate you!  I give you 5 stars!

name: Boo Bailey
text: Chris Allison and staff at Therapy South helped me completely get back to normal life after having “frozen shoulder”. I only had 30% mobility of my left arm and it was very painful, especially during the night. Today I finished my therapy and now have complete mobility of my arm and was able to go on a planned family vacation. Thank you Chris and all the staff❣️❣️

resp.text: Pleasure was ours. Thank you for buying into the process!

name: Matthew Kilgore
text: I always feel better when I leave here. My body feels aligned and back to normal after therapy here. I highly recommend Therapy South.

name: Jan Bradford
text: Such a great group of professionals.  I tried therapy and have had excellent results.  The caring attention and success were outstanding.

name: Crystal Knezek
text: I came in after I tore my rotator cuff. I was super disappointed and frustrated that it wasn't healing and I had lost so much strength. Chris and his team have been patient, understanding, and willing to push me. He was great about really getting to the core of my weakness and creating a plan to help me get back to normal. I trust and respect the whole team here and will recommend them to my friends.

name: F Blanchard
text: Great place to go for physical therapy! Chris, Corey, and the entire staff is friendly and professional. I had surgery for rotator cuff tear.   Doctor installed a shoulder anchor and instructed me to keep immobilized for 10 days before starting therapy.  The 1st day of therapy, I could not move my arm.  I had to wear a pillow sling for 6 weeks.  After 12 weeks I have total movement back and am now working on weights to strengthen. If you need any therapy, this is the best location.

resp.text: Glad your shoulder is doing so well.  It was a pleasure working with you!

name: Dana Duell
text: The team at Therapy South Riverchase are excellent.  They are helpful and have offered me a lot of relief.  They have been informative and patient with teaching me the exercises that will aide me in reaping the best results health wise.  I would highly recommend them to friends, family and anyone who might need help along the way to feel better.

resp.text: Thank you Dana!  It was a pleasure working with you.

name: Dakota Goodwin
text: I'm a massage therapist and have been experiencing issues with my right shoulder/neck/hand due to an impingement on some nerves.referred from a client,I tried dry needling for the first time and I cannot believe the amount of relief I have in my arm after one session. I'm able to use it like normal and finally able to sleep without my hand going numb.ill definitely be back and will be referring anyone I think may benefit from this type of therapy.

name: Jonna Wallace
text: I had a car accident in December 2015 and have been going to Therapy South for a neck/hand/nerve injury.  Chris and Corey are both excellent!  I have nearly fully recovered and credit my recovery to their expertise in the field. They are attentive and kind.  I've been impressed with watching them treat a diversity of people and injuries from athletes to senior adults.  Lauren is a great billing admin too.  Will hate to say goodbye!

name: Darla McMullen
text: Wonderful staff! They have a wide selection of equipment to help and all the therapists are very knowledgeable.

name: Amecha Franks
text: Andrew, Chris and Madison are just wonderful!! They listen to you and structure a plan to get you to where you need to be! Highly recommended!!

name: Matt Howard
text: Chris is great! Any time he has something open he always makes time for me. He cares about all clients and isn't somebody that just sees you and then ushers you out. He takes time to explain things and tells you ways that you can help yourself. All his treatments have worked wonders on me and I will continue to see him regularly.

name: Scottie Hawkins
text:
Chris, Andrew & Garrett took care of me !!!!

Thank you guys

name: John Tipton
text:
I don't always fall off of my motorcycle, but when I do I head to this Therapy South location. The doctors and staff are fantastic. Scheduling is painless and flexible. Dr Chris explained the mechanism and anatomy behind each treatment and excercise. Shoulder was 20/100 before treatment and today every bit of 95/100.

Thanks to the team.

name: Kayla Anthony
text: One word to describe this place- AWESOME!!   Chris and his whole staff are excellent! They always take great care of me and the service is always amazing!  I highly recommend them!!  😃

name: Brayden Blythe
text: The staff helped me fully recover from ACL reconstruction. Could not have done it without their hard work and dedication to make me better.

resp.text: So glad to hear you fully recovered following your ACL surgery.  It was a pleasure working with you!

name: Brice Jackson
text: Chris & Andrew are fantastic! Thank you both for your kindness & expertise.

name: Corbin Ellard
text: Absolutely love this place! Chris and Corey did a great job. I was having trouble with my left elbow, which was such an uncomfortable spot on my arm and they got it all sorted out. They will be the only place I refer people to when it comes to PT

resp.text: Thank you Corbin!

name: Brian Black
text: Great Staff! Recovering from hand surgery and they have been great! Would definitely recommend them for physical therapy!

resp.text: It was a pleasure working with you Brian!

name: tesla nichole
text: I visit TherapySouth Riverchase periodically to receive Dry Needling therapy. The entire staff is so nice and professional, and the facility is clean, open and welcoming. Chris always takes great care of me each visit. If you're looking into physical therapy I highly recommend Chris Allison and the entire staff at TherapySouth Riverchase!

name: lauren philen
text: I had an excellent experience at TherapySouth Riverchase.  Chris and Corey were both very knowledgeable and helped me tremendously in my recovery.

resp.text: Lauren, that is great to hear!  We are excited that your goals for physical therapy were met.

name: Christina Van Der Hulst
text: Service is great! Very attentive and always happy to answer any questions/concerns! Highly recommend them!

name: Katrina Chapman
text: I had two surgeries before the age of 20 because of wear and tear from over a decade of swimming. Both were done by the same surgeon. My first surgery was in November of 2015. I did physical therapy at another Hoover clinic (not a therapy south) and I grew to hate physical therapy, physical therapists, anything associated with them. I honestly believed the profession was a crock because of the poor care I had received at that clinic. I didn’t know any better! My hip never got better, it was much weaker than before, and three years later, is still in pain and lacking the function I had prior. My skepticism towards physical therapy as it turns out, was just because I went to the wrong place. After a shoulder surgery in May of 2016, I was referred to Chris and Corey from a friend and my outlook could not be more different now. Not only did they cater my shoulder rehab to my specific sport (weightlifting), they also helped me repair my hip and alleviate some of my pain. I’m a true believer in physical therapy now, even going as far as changing my career path so I can also change someone’s outlook. Chris and Corey go above and beyond for you and Lauren is always a friendly face when I come into the office. I can’t say enough good things. Thanks y’all!

resp.text: Thank you, thank you!  It was a pleasure working with you!

name: Melissa Bryant
text: I could barely walk and had pain every day. I came to Therapy South Riverchase and Chris and Corey helped me progress all the way to running marathons! Thank you so much!

name: John Hunt
text: Chris and the staff are committed to getting you back to break condition.

name: Matt Snow
text: Friendly staff, clean facility, professional care!

resp.text: Thanks Matt!  It was a pleasure working with you!

name: Logan McNaughton
text: I have been to Therapy South for multiple injuries and the team there is always welcoming and make you feel at home every time.

name: Nicole Jara
text: Orange Theory Fitness has gone above and beyond my expectations!! The facility is stunning, the coaches are motivating, the music ROCKS and the staff at the front are always so helpful! Alex has been such a rockstar from day 1!! As for the workouts... they are never the same and they don’t get easier, but I find myself pushing myself harder each and every time! That’s what I love about this place, I never regret going!! 10/10 would recommend!

name: mac cuffe
text: Orange Theory classes area awesome! Intense and quick, gotta love em!

name: Sydney Schmidt
text: I was once a huge OTF advocate, but have since realized that they are only interested in collecting money from you. In the middle of COVID, I had to move out of Mobile to an area that did not have OTF. I emailed the gym asking to cancel my membership and they replied saying that it would be canceled once the studio was back open. I assumed they canceled the membership, since they said they were going to. However, they have been trying to charge me every month since, and have now sent me an email saying that I owe all membership dues for these months. They also will not respond to any of my emails that provide proof of my membership being canceled back in April clarifying that I do not owe any money.

resp.text: Sydney, We're sorry you were disappointed but you were never billed after you notified us of your move. While we were closed due to COVID 19 we were locked out of our system and all accounts were put on freeze. We simply couldn't process your request until we re-opened as we had no access.

name: scarlott guillory
text: I dropped in to a class just to get in my workout while I was out of town. I’m originally from the Destin OTF. Coach Kathryn was such an amazing coach. She cheered me on by name even though I’m not her regular member. And it wasn’t just a one time encouraging word. She is consistent. She paces back and forth and DOES what a coach is SUPPOSED to do. She is active the ENTIRE time. She was so good that I reached my max workouts for this time period and bought more classes just so I can attend hers again. I also want to thank the front staff for being so nice. I know tourists and out of towners can be boggling considering we have no idea where to go, have a ton of questions and have to fill out paperwork. But thank you for doing your part to make the whole experience enjoyable.

name: Tanzila Watts
text: Love the group setting. The staff is nice, welcoming, and friendly.

name: Jessica S
text: Came into Orangetheory last week looking to compare prices, staff member Scotty was extreme knowledgeable and very insightful about services, and so incredibly encouraging and sweet. 10/10 recommend this gym!

name: KB Biv
text: I enjoyed the classes during my visit to Mobile. Great coaches and staff. The studio had a nice setup and was clean. I also like being on the newer treadmills (my home studio still has the old treadmills).

name: Stacy Williams
text: I attended the free class and LOVED it, however I had to quickly leave for work and the front desk wanted me to sign up for a membership. I hesitated and told her that I would like to look over the paperwork and sign up next time I come.  She didn't want to hear that, instead she insisted I go ahead and sign, without reading the terms and conditions. That was an error on my part. I was unable to afford a membership at the time due to two kids in braces, and when I called to cancel they said I had to give a 30 day notice. I only went to the free class, I never attended a real class. I spoke with the manager, Abbie, who was no help. She basically told me that 2 months will automatically be charged before it is cancelled on their end. And when I told her I couldn't afford it, her response was, "that's not my problem".... Yep, that's what she said. I politely asked if I could get the number to corporate, but she wouldn't provide it. She would have her manager call. Very frustrating. Bottom line, if you try it and love it, please read the paperwork before you sign. Don't let them talk you into signing it and then email it to you. I'd hate to know how many others got caught in this situation as well.

name: Dr. Lofton Troy
text: If you are looking for a new fitness place, look no further. Orange Theory is the place to be! It was a very challenging workout but yet you can complete it because you can do it at your own pace. The first person I came in contact with was Deanna at the front desk. She was very sweet and gave me the first run down of how Orange Theory worked. Then I met my coach, Heather. Heather was awesome and was understanding of any orthopedic issues that you may have and had variations for some of the exercises. The music was great and Heather always continued to motivate and push you though the workout. There was a moment when I had to slow my own pace and that was okay, the workout continued and I finished it to the end. Overall Orange Theory will be my gym of choice for years to come. A+ for Orange Theory and an A++ for Deanna and Heather! I look forward to seeing them tomorrow morning!

name: Linda Knight
text: Trainer  today was not helpful and music way to loud. Bring ear plugs. Bought heart rate monitor never told had to be  charged or how to charge. The trainer named Missy is always hrlpful

name: Adrienne Grant
text: I love that I don’t have to think about what I’m going to do, they lay it all out for me. I despise running and somehow they make running enjoyable and have helped build my endurance. They motivate and encourage but most importantly they were patient with my shoulder recovery and took time to check in and make sure I was okay. Their workouts are never the same and always fun. They welcomed me in and sent me off with cheering and goodbyes!! Great group at the Daphne location

resp.text: Thank you for the five star review, Adrienne! Can't wait to see you in class soon!

name: Michelle Tice
text: I am a few days shy of 40...I am not an avid fitness buff... I'm not even a moderate fitness buff and this was perfect for me.  Having someone coach me the entire time and tell me exactly what I needed to was amazing. I loved the rapid movement of the workout. It didn't give me time to think about how hard I was working (although I can feel it today LOL). I LOVED monitoring my heart rate and having the goal of splat points to achieve.  Super gratifying.  Overall additive, amazing experience.

resp.text: We are so glad you love the workouts! Having someone to coach you really helps you and pushes you to your limits! Keep on burning!

name: Scotty Stimpson
text:
Absolutely love Orange Theory. It’s an amazing full body workout. I actually just came from Air Force BMT and Technical Training and the workouts here meet and exceed Air Force BMT workouts. Lol!
Lemme just say the staff is amazing! Coach Missy, Katherine, and Allie are hands down some of the best people I’ve ever meet! And let’s not forget about Nikki and Abbi! Amazing people!!!!!!!

name: ronald mcbay
text: OTF is a good middle ground between a personal trainer and going it alone. Every workout is different. I enjoy being around others who share the goal of doing your best, whatever that best may be.

name: Wayne Douglas
text: I give 5 stars to the staff and trainers but because the pricing is ridiculously expensive including having to purchase mandatory cheaply made monitors and premium prices and the owners have zero customer service acumen other than being able to hire great staff. They sold me a monitor for $100 that last 2 months before the velcro strap wore out and then tried to sell me a replacement strap. The monitor is supposed to have a one year warranty to begin with and the fact that you keep a stock pile of straps in inventory is acknowledgement that you know you're selling junk.

name: Rhonda Winder
text: This is a complete workout! The coaches keep you motivated. The music is great, the routines will work you out hard and the group atmosphere keeps you on target. High intensity. Not for weaklings! :)

name: Karen Nunnery
text: Excellent experience. Dominique, the trainer, was high energy and very attentive to each member. The music was a great fit to keep you motivated!

resp.text: Hi Karen! Thanks for the five stars! We're so happy that you love our coaches! We love having you as part of the OTF Family! Can't wait to see you in class!

name: al eyen
text: Expensive for what it is , a work out. Plenty of gadgets and tech that really are only interesting the 1st few months or less. Staff can be rude at times and you will be harrassed about upper to the highest level of membership by lots of text messages or calls. <1 year personal experience>

resp.text: Sorry to disappoint, we tried to look into this but we have no records of anyone by this name

name: Catherine Quackenbush
text: The staff is super nice! The place is always clean. Each person working out wipes off the equipment after each use! The perfect cardio plus weights workout. Anyone can do it!

resp.text: Hey Catherine! The staff is great and we love them for all that they do! It is a workout for anyone!

name: Mandy Clark
text: Five stars all the way around! It's the best place to go if you're looking for a quick intense workout that gives you results! There's so much energy in every class, it almost feels like I had my own personal trainer! I love love love this workout. No wonder it's the best one hour workout in America!

name: Claris Leigh Feibelman
text: I love the high energy and high intensity of the Orange Theory workouts! The instructors keep you motivated while also making sure you are doing the workout/movements correctly. I always know I'm going to get a good workout in at Orange Theory.

name: Robby Smith
text: Workout is intense but doable. Staff is extremely friendly. Results are noticeable. The environment in the class is relaxed and encouraging.

name: Frela Wojciechowski
text: What do I like about Orange Theory?  Everything!  The staff, coaches, facility, and members!  The concept is the best program out there for getting in shape. Everyone should at least give it a try!  I did and I am in better shape than I was 15 years ago!  Angie and Griff are wonderful people and are doing a great job with the Daphne facility!  Thank you all at OT in Daphne, Alabama!!!!!!!

name: Monica McIntosh
text: Great place to work out with a circuit training program. You can get it in within an hour with the help of a group trainer. Work at your fitness level and achieve your goals!

name: marvin fox
text: I liked how interactive the session was. I loved the challenge of the workouts. I will definitely be joining around the first of the year. Heather is a phenomenal trainer.

resp.text: Hi Marvin! Thank you so much for the positive review! We're thrilled that you love our coaches and our versatile workouts. Keep burning! We'll see you in class soon!

name: Anna Hunt
text: Love love love OTF! I have lost 25-30 lbs of baby and taco weight! The coaches constantly push you to your best and the members are friends who are there to push and inspire. No one there is judging OR looking at you! Everyone is dying but it’s a good death:)

resp.text: Hi Ana! We are so glad you love OTF! Congrats on the lost weight! We are a judgment free spot!:) Keep on burning!

name: Kelsey Swanzy
text:
I've always wanted to go to the gym and feel like I was being coached!! I'm getting this and more at Orange Theory!! I played soccer when I was younger and loved competing with myself to be better at the sport. Getting a Performance Summary at the end of my work out has pushed me to set goals when I come into my next class, and I've only been to TWO!! At the office i'm in a position to make decisions all day, so to come to a place to work out and have someone else making decisions on what to do next is AMAZING. I LOVE being able to push myself but still go at my own pace during the work out if needed. I like the way the room is set up with numbers, there is no confusion for who is to be where, and I appreciate the organization of the entire program.

-Kelsey

(Mobile, Alabama)

name: LIL BAMA
text: I love this place every time I enter the door I am happy the energy is always positive and I feel great. I love the trainers they are all very professional and each one  brings something different to each class its exciting.  I have lost 40 pounds doing these workouts 3 times a week. but the thing I like most is when I was heavier I didn't have to be embarrassed or uncomfortable  to do the workouts because everyone helped me and encouraged me to push myself and go all out and that's just what I did. Orangetheory Fitness is  really amazing !  I love working with a great team  of professionals and that is what I experience everyday; there is always someone reaching out offering a helping hand. Most importantly I love the members they all make my job what it is, they truly Light up my day. Each  and every Member  is an electrifying spark that  fires me up ! and shots me to Excellence . Orangetheory fitness is not just a gym it's a  family that drives you and pushes you  to reach your goals. Orangetheory Fitness has   Cutting edge technology , integrates  extreme research ,core integrity and  highest standards. We set the Bar!

name: Kaitlin Carr
text: Orangetheory Fitness is the place to be if you want to achieve your fitness goals. My husband and I have been going since they opened in February 2016. In addition to losing weight, I have hit many fitness goals. I am able to lift heavier weights and run faster than when I began. All the trainers are great, and they treat you like family. Orangetheory is great for every age and fitness level, from power walkers to runners.  Plus your first class is FREE so there's no harm in trying it! Be prepared to get hooked on OTF.

name: Kathryn Gwin
text: Top notch facility with a great staff! Highly recommend.

name: Kat Moore
text: I have really enjoyed this experience since May 2016.  63 years old and found out that losing balance and strength isn't a given with age.  I have lost 60+ pounds since February 2016 and now use 15 lb weights in my workouts. Love this system and would encourage all older couch potatoes to get involved and MOVE!

name: Allyson Fulcher
text: Every single day is challenging and different. I also love how I've seen major results not only in my body, but also my stamina and strength. Plus, the coaches are great and Sandra at the front desk is AMAZING.

name: Pat Macy
text: The best workout I've gotten in years. I travel to Mobile for work, and spend all three nights I'm in town at OT Mobile. Sometimes I come in thinking I'm going to dog it and take it easy, but without fail I end up getting my butt kicked. I could spend thousands for gym memberships and never get the same level of intensity that I get by going to orange theory. The coaches are knowledgeable and push you while being mindful of proper form, putting together a workout to optimize your time. The heart rate monitoring technology reinforces the interval training concept and provides a visual to push you past your wall. Every workout is painful, challenging and rewarding. I'm the most fit I've ever been as a result.

name: Meridy Jones
text: I like every single thing about Orange Theory! I love the fact that each workout is different than the day before’s workout. The staff is friendly and helpful. The workouts are challenging, and the music and atmosphere are fun, high energy and motivating. The instructors are awesome. I am obsessed!

name: Christin Lisenby
text: I have recommended OT to my family, friends, and company!  I love the way I feel after the work out more than anything... I have always exercised, but never to this level! Cant wait to see the changes that I know  are starting to happen!

name: Carol Boyd
text: I know why Orangetheory Fitness was voted the #1 one hour work out in the country. High energy, a different workout everyday and the music and trainer keeps the place rocking. Very motivational. Love it. I'm hooked

name: Johnny Burgard
text: Best HIIT training you will find!!  As both an exercise enthusiast and a trainer, I have tried just about every workout that's out there and Orange Theory has hands down mastered the interval training method.  It's one thing to try to “feel” the intensity level you are at, and another entirely to see it precisely measured up on a screen so you know exactly where you're at and where you need to be!  The  5 heart rate zone structured workouts couldn't be easier to follow and understand so all you have to do is “push” yourself to go “all out” and achieve those results you are after!  I can't wait till the next class!

name: Kiara Bryant
text: This place is wonderful for people who need the motivation to get fit. It's such a fun atmosphere and everyone is so nice and makes you feel welcomed. You'll  be surprised at the progress that you make once you start working out here!

name: Pat Macy
text: The best workout I've gotten in years. I travel to Mobile for work, and spend all three nights I'm in town at OT Mobile. Sometimes I come in thinking I'm going to dog it and take it easy, but without fail I end up getting my butt kicked. I could spend thousands for gym memberships and never get the same level of intensity that I get by going to orange theory. The coaches are knowledgeable and push you while being mindful of proper form, putting together a workout to optimize your time. The heart rate monitoring technology reinforces the interval training concept and provides a visual to push you past your wall. Every workout is painful, challenging and rewarding. I'm the most fit I've ever been as a result.

name: Debbie Harris
text: I always enjoy my workouts at the Mobile,AL OT. My workout last night really pushed me and my splat points were real high without spending a lot of time in the red. OT always pushes me more than I could ever push myself on my own and they push me more than anyone else has ever pushed me. My last 1/2 marathon time was 9 minutes faster and my only training is OT. The interval training was/is just what I need.

name: Lisa Loots
text: I love how the workouts change from day to day. The trainers are awesome at motivating you to push past your limits.

resp.text: Hi Lisa! We like to keep it different! The trainers are definitely the bomb!

name: Cody White
text: Alyssa and Oliver are awesome. Coach Leslie has been top notch. Worth the investment for your health!

resp.text: Thanks for the five stars, Cody! We're glad that you had a great workout. Keep burning!

name: christina griffin
text:
I don't know how I ever survived without Orange Theory LOL!! Love Love Love the workouts! The atmosphere is amazing, staff is awesome and supportive, the workouts are challenging and fun! Full body workouts that test strength and endurance everytime, never the same
workout twice!

name: Bobbi Parker
text: I loved my experience at Orange theory ! I did not mean to leave a one star review last week! The facility, coaches and staff are all amazing !!! I had such a great workout . I recommended everybody give orange theory Mobile, Al a try .

resp.text: Thanks Bobbi, We do our best to make sure everyone has a great experience. We offer a FREE TRIAL for everyone and a 30 Day Money Back Guarantee.

name: Tammy Dwyer
text: Outstanding staff! Very supportive and motivational! This is one work out where you instantly feel the difference!

name: Mary Megan Parker
text: Loved OTF! It is designed so you can shut your brain off and simply workout. Plus, the music selections are fabulous! Two thumbs up!

name: Joyce Jiles
text: Wonderful experience! Best workout ever! Staff and trainers are great. Love I can go in and workout and done in one hour

name: Meg Schaffler
text: OTF Mobile is awesome! I have enjoyed every workout here.. From the helpful staff to the amazing trainers, everyone makes you feel at home and comfortable. The facility is very clean as well!

name: Erik Poston
text: My whole staff and I got our 1st workout for the first time this last Sunday. It was AWESOME to say the least! I'll will be recommending this to our customers regularly ! Thank you Ashley & John! 💪💪💪

name: Danielle Williams
text: I love this place! When I heard it was coming into town and immediately signed up! I've been working out here since it opened in February and I've loved every minute of it!

name: Brandi Marino
text: Such a great workout! I love getting my results at the end of the class. Everyone is friendly and helpful.

name: Celeste Razzamista
text: This place and these people have changed my life for the better. 30+ lbs gone since I started. Best thing I've ever done for my health. Period.

name: Chase Sims
text: I can personally recommend this place for all your fitness needs! I'm a bigger guy and they know how to work with you! Trained staff, great environment, awesome gains!

name: Kelly Nguyen
text: Orangetheory has helped me grow as an athlete and a person. I have gained so much strength and confidence because of the amazing coaches! LOVE THIS PLACE!

name: Ashley Weikle
text: Don’t sign up for a free class unless you want to be constantly harassed to join via calls and texts for months on end. I’ve tried telling them I’m not interested, but the calls and texts continue. I’ve had to block the number. The cost is insane and they aren’t upfront about it until after your trial class, and then they are pushy and insistent. It’s predatory business practice and if I ever was interested I’m not now after being harassed.

name: Willis Willcox
text: The flexibility to adjust to all fitness levels and the hospitality of the staff.

name: Paxton Gordon
text: Orange theory is the best workout that you could possibly get!! It is what gets me through my day! The coaches and staff are AMAZING!!!! I LOVE ORANGE THEORY!!!

name: Andrea Presley
text: The only workout that fits into my crazy schedule and that I have ever been able to stick to. The 1 hour time slot is perfect and the awesome trainers are so encouraging and make the time worth while.

name: leigh parks
text: Excellent service.... staff, trainers and facility.  Makes exercising fun.

resp.text: Thank you for the five star review, Leigh! Can't wait to see you in class soon!

name: Lindsey Maurer
text: Amazing!! So encouraging and motivating. Such a tough workout but I actually look forward to going now!

name: Mary Jane kikuchi
text: Best one you full body workout, love that it is heart rate based and that I can see my results in real time! Awesome trainers and fun workout, that can be done by all fitness levels!

name: Lori Albrick
text: I love how the Orange Theory coaches push us beyond our comfort zone at the same time encouraging us to reach and expand our goals.

name: Maryl Bobinger
text: Best place to workout in Mobile! Friendly knowledgeable coaches.

resp.text: Hi Maryl! We are glad we can be your workout spot!

name: Brian Billett
text: Couldn’t be happier with OTF. The trainers at the Daphne location were awesome. They got me ready for my training camp. Thank you guys!

resp.text: Thanks for the five star review, Brian! We're glad that you had an awesome workout and can't wait to see you soon!

name: Laura Rose
text: Absolutely love Orange Theory Fitness Mobile!! Amazing staff and incredible fitness coaches! Highly, highly recommend!!

name: Claudia Corral
text: Didnt like that you compete against all the others even if you are a beginner.

name: Paul Carbo
text: Like having a personal trainer, keeps me motivated, the real time feedback helps me stay on course.

name: Shana Jones
text: I love the fact that no two workouts are ever the same so I never get bored and nor do I want to give up.  I love OTF Mobile and the Staff, they are amazing!

name: Hannah Dewberry
text: Best workout I've ever had.. It's addicting!! Love everyone there!

name: Ashley Moore
text:
I've been doing Orangetheory for six months now, and I absolutely love it! If you've never been to an Orangetheory class, I can explain it simply - in my own words, it's a 60 minute 5 zone heart rate based group personal training session that includes cardio and weights. I've never been much into cardio but the class provides you ways of doing cardio through walking, jogging or running - you choose. I LOVED that! I really like the group exercise classes, because they always make me push harder than I would on my own. In addition to that the use of heart rate monitoring is unique and something that enabled me to track my performance and challenge myself...which I really enjoyed.

Overall I would def recommend this place to anyone. If your looking for a fun, safe and effective workout that offers amazing results, then Orangetheory Fitness is the solution for you!

name: Paul Gonzalez
text: What a great place to get your high intensity workout in! Run by a great manager and a dedicated, knowledgable training staff :)

name: Karen Clark
text: Best 1 hour workout anywhere!  Keeps me very motivated!

name: kelsey kendrick
text: Love working out here!!! Best energy from the staff and kept us motivated

name: Debi Jefferson
text: Best workout ever for busy people. No chatty patty time with the girls....come  to get your workout on!

name: Terry McDonald
text: Had a great total body workout in a wonderful facility

name: Marcella McDow
text: I love this place. The workouts challenge me.

name: Sarah Griffin
text: Americas best one hour workout. loved it

name: Tory Saunders
text: OrangeTheory has been a phenomenal experience! I have tried multiple fitness classes/programs including Crossfit, D1, etc and have not found a program that I enjoy more. OT offers the perfect combination of cardio as well as weight training (26 min of each). When I am done with the workout, I am exhausted, drenched in sweat, and do not feel as if I missed a certain compenent of my workout (strength or cardio) bc it is all wrapped into one. I have a very busy schedule and so I love that I am finished in one hour. I have worked out for a few years now and also work in the healthcare profession and it is very evident to me that all of the trainers are here are well trained and highly competent.

name: Haleigh Willcutt
text: Love. Love. Love Orange Theory! Best work out & owner ever!!

name: Brian Anderson
text: You certainly get what you pay for with Orange Theory.  Great class!

name: Gabriela Gratarolli (TomoeGabi)
text: Very Dynamic workout. The best IMO!!!!

name: Candice Goff
text: Had a blast and worked it out!

name: Courtney Martinez
text: AMAZING PLACE!!!

resp.text: Hi Courtney! It really is an amazing place! We love what we do and could not be happier to have you!

name: Jessica Brown
text: Awesome workout! Feeling the burn

name: Tracee Andrews
text: Awesome!

name: carrie ivy
text: The Best!

name: tasha carter
text: Love orange theory family!!!

name: Teresia Jones
text: I really enjoyed the workout

name: Angela Pressley
text: I canceled our membership in July due to Covid. I called and the owner assured me we would not be charged in August and that the account was closed. Well guess what the money come out and when I called him back he said they would refund my money back not to worry. I then asked him if it would be going the same thing in September he once again assured me it wouldn’t. Oh but yes it did oh and I still haven’t gotten my refund from August. So now I paid for two months after my account had been closed. Well then to top it off no one will return a phone call,text or email about my money. Then today I get another email saying they are trying to take another payment out of my account! I was stolen from,lied to and just completely ignored. Today I called and asked for corporate’s phone number well guess what they didn’t answer either. I maybe out of all that money but if I can stop someone else from getting treated the way I was, it will be worth it.

name: hayden bryars
text: The place is always dirty, short on weight plates and constantly has malfunctioning restrooms.. I cancelled my membership and was charged a month later. When I called about it, the employee told me there was no membership change from on file (not accurate) then he called me an a**shole. This place is a JOKE!

name: Tam Nguyen
text: They closed and move when I came back in my routine bad service ever

name: Reginald Ingram
text: It's great for a small town gym. The membership pricing is affordable. They offer a great mix of free weights as well as machines, they have a cardio room that's great for stretching, and now has a punching bag in it (major plus since no other gyms in the area has a punching bag). They do have some good personal trainers, and offer classes. One major benefit is its 24/7. You can work out on your own schedule to fit your lifestyle.  I prefer working out at 4am, and this gym affords me that luxury. I've never had a wait time to use any machine, that's also a major plus. The staff keeps all areas of this gym very clean, and most patrons usually wipe down things after they've used them.

name: Kanina Crosen
text: Suddenly stopped honoring free passes that we have handed out for years! Didn’t bother to actually call us and let us know. I guess they don’t like getting more business.

name: Brent Sewell
text: This was a great gym when Regan was here. Filthy now.  Bathrooms are horrible. Equipment always torn up.  On Demand aerobics always down. That’s why my wife joined. Very disappointed

name: New Looks Painting
text: Patricia is the best mananger we had everything is clean and fresh .owner should take it in consideration

name: Christian Turley
text: The place kinda stinks. I work out at the Pell City one and that one is miles ahead of this gym. The Oxford snap fitness has holes in the wall, dust that gets in your eyes, exposed insulation, unorganized equipment, smelly weights, and broken equipment. A treadmill has a broken incline button where it's falling off. A aerobic machine sticks and nearly threw me off whilst trying to use it. Don't use this gym. Go to a different SnapFitness. The one in pellcity is clean, kind and has amazing staff/patrons.

name: sethrath
text: Been  a member for a few years is a nice location and  close to everything

name: Lacorey Jackson
text: My experience with Pamela Hollis has been the worse experience to date never encountered racism until now ..... thanks for letting me know it still exists

name: Norma Herrera
text: The manager is always very nice and cleans everyday, the equipment is very easy to handle

name: Mark Huckaby
text: Our problem is they quoted us one price and every month they keep going up.

name: FAP Logistics
text: Disgusting

name: Tommy Lee
text: I had to cancel my membership because I have to travel so much due to my job.  The staff at Snap Fitness were very professional and helpful.  I will definitely renew my membership when the time is right.

name: Karen Mainous
text: Very clean, not crowded, good choice of machines

name: Stan Man93
text: The place is great but I haven’t been in 4 months or more and I just got a txt saying that I just paid for my membership fee when I haven’t been to Snap at all

name: Katherine Stephens
text: I have tried different gyms off and on throughout the years, but SNAP is my ABSOLUTE FAV!! The gym is always nice and so clean. Jessica Baines is my go to! She is always helpful and you can tell she loves her job and all of her members! I highly recommend snap!!

name: Lizzie Clark
text: The staff at this club are amazing caring people that know their business! They get you the results you  are looking for!  It is spotless too! wow!

name: Jennifer-Draven Cook
text: The staff is AMAZING!!  The gym is clean and well organized.  They have a wide varity of cardio machines and strenght training.  Plus all of the equipment is functional.  They even have a room where you can choose workout video's from an online catalog (for example like Julian Michaels).

resp.text: Thanks so much Jennifer! We love our community and strive to be the very best at what we do. Its so nice to hear people like you are getting what you need at Snap Fitness PC!

name: Christian Turley
text: Great, small sized gym. Clean and has something for everyone. The environment is great for anyone who wants a quiet gym or just starting out!

name: Laura Serrano
text: Fabulous gym! Fabulous staff!

name: Jacob Grayson
text: I would not ever recommend this gym again. They pretend they want to help you at the end of the day they only want your money.

name: Brenda Hayes
text: Nice friendly people

name: Brent Bodily
text: Great facility

name: Daniel Lainez Laguia
text: Honestly, best Crossfit box I have ever been. I was doing a road trip and stopped by today and worked out there. Amazing atmosphere. Charlie is a great coach and he also gave me a t-shirt and a hat from the box. I strongly recommend everyone to workout there. Thank you Charlie!

name: Brandon Carmichael
text: Been going for about 5 months now and I couldn't have chosen a better box to join. They literally take you in with open arms. Charlie and the staff are the most caring people! They always get the job done.

name: Alicia Lanier
text: This is more than just a gym.. It's where people get together to push themselves farther than they know.. Supportive people who help you achieve your goals what ever it maybe.. Not only do you get in shape, but you get an extended family.. Who will get on the floor next to you an cheer you on till your finished.. I love this place!

name: Matthew Coleman
text: This was my first experience with a CrossFit gym, and I was very impressed with CrossFit Spanish Fort! The coaches are very engaged and eager to help you push yourself forward in a high intensity without. The people are great, everyone is nice and supportive. It's a great place to work out for men and women of all ages!

name: Piper Waddell
text: I had no experience with cross fit coming into this gym. All of the coaches are very personable and patient. They truly care about you and want you to excel in the workouts and your personal strength. This is not only a gym, it's a community. Often they gather just to hang out and do life together. It's a great environment for all ages. When you join this gym you join a family that pushes you to your limits. Crossfit Spanish Fort is an amazing gym.

name: Rochelle Yantz
text: I joined this gym as soon as I moved into the area and right away could tell that this was a great community to be a part of.  The coaches and owner's are amazing and are very accommodating/understanding to your personal fitness goals/needs.  Everyone is very kind and encouraging.  The schedule is also the best I have ever experienced, they have classes throughout the day and have a big window of time for open gym.  Would recommend this gym to anyone!

name: Walter Holloway
text: Good people, thorough workouts

name: Hunter Graham
text: I am blown away by the commitment our coaches have to creating an atmosphere full of encouragement, health, and community for anyone and everyone! If it was just another gym, it'd be miserable. But, it's not. The community and encouragement is what drives me to finish each workout and a reason to take time out of my week to come. I believe it's enough for everyone to give it a shot, I promise you won't regret it!

name: Jacey-Blaire Mitchell
text: Come prepared to fall in love with this place and the people! The facilities are great, the coaches are amazing, and you'll have 30+ new work out buddies to support you. This gym is about getting you to be YOUR best, not someone else's best.

name: Cole Stringer
text: The best CrossFit box on the Eastern Shore. Wide range of class times, friendly and knowledgeable coaching staff, and a great facility!

name: Daniel Williams
text: Pathetic people and gym.   Ymca is so much better.  The fort price jumps and will steal your money.    I had email sent to me from this gym about my year contract renewal so I replied to the email that I would not be renewing.     Little did I know they will automatically keep taking your money even after you cancel.    Pathetic to customers

resp.text:
Hey Daniel. You left your review on the wrong gyms google page. This is CrossFit Spanish Fort. We are not affiliated with The Fort/TFX CrossFit. If you will please remove this & redirect to their Google page.

Thanks,
Charlie Bender

name: Mallory Rambo
text: One of the best!  Great equipment, friendly folks, awesome coaches!   What I look forward to during the week...going to this place and getting a great workout!!!

name: Alex Jones
text: Smart staff that leads fun, creative, healthy, & challenging workouts! Great community that provides accountability and a judgment free gym!!! I strongly recommend!

name: Clara Blacksher
text: My husband and I joined recently and we have been so pleased with all of the great coaching and the people we have come to know! Great place!

name: Trent
text: CFSF has an amazing community with phenomenal coaches! Charlie designs these workouts extremely well and you'll be sore every time you work out if you're pushing yourself hard enough. Don't be afraid that crossfit will be too intense for you because there's plenty of stretching and practicing of the movements you'll be performing before you actually do them! If you're looking to change yourself physically and mentally you need to give this place a shot!

name: Derek butters
text:
Today was my first time back in a long time... I have missed this place!! What better way to come back only to start with FRAN as the WOD !!!
I have to brag about this place for sec.. if your looking  for a life style change come check out CrossFit Spanish Fort,, the atmosphere is great the members all motivate one another and challenge each other to be the best they can be!! Charlie Bender has really created something special there that you have to experience.... Don't worry about failure when you go bc that's the only way to test your limits and to improve!!!

name: David W.
text: My kids do cross fit here Great staff.

name: Crystal Yarbrough
text: Extremely thankful for CFSF!! Charlie, Elana, Allison, & Will are fabulous! They have made us feel welcome and instantly made us part of the family!

name: Tiffany Anderson
text: Great facility, awesome coaches and great programming for whatever your goals may be. Highly recommend this box!

name: George Ferral
text: Great coaches and members. Very welcoming environment.

name: S. Johanna Johnston
text: Crossfit at Spanish fort has been amazing experience! The coaches are very helpful and encouraging, if anyone who has been in crossfit or is looking to start crossfit this place is perfect! Everyone at the gym is encouraging and is there to push you to the best of your abilities!

name: Harrison Horton
text: I have been doing Crossfit for over 5 years with 3 of those years being a coach. I have been to Crossfit gyms all around the world and I rank Crossfit Spanish Fort as being up there with the best. Great people, high quality coaching with attention to detail, and a clean/well equipped facility. I highly recommend this gym for anyone looking to try Crossfit for the first time or anyone who falls into the classification of a Crossfit veteran.

name: Rich R
text: Good coach, Good vibe. Highly recommended.

name: Allison Smith
text: Powerhouse community!!! The willingness and support from everyone is awesome, and truly my home away from home!!!

name: Scot Dorger
text: Good equipment, Large Facility, Great Coaches, Great Community

name: William Dudley
text: Very welcoming

name: John Sipperley
text: Great people!

name: Muamer Karamovic
text: love this place
